calc_xscore.f90
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 ! (C) 2000 Uppsala Molekylmekaniska HB, Uppsala, Sweden
2 ! calc_xscore.f90
3 ! by Peter Hanspers & Martin Nervall
4 ! Qcalc trajectory analysis main program
5 
6 module calc_xscore
7 ! v.2003.11, Structure-Based Drug Design Toolkits, developed by Dr. Renxiao Wang
8 ! F90 implementation and QCalc5 integration by Peter Hanspers
9 ! Most of the structure from the original xscore source code is ported to f90.
10 ! Before scoring, protein and ligand data structures are translated to xscore format.
11 
12  use calc_base
13  use maskmanip
14  use trj
15  use topo
16  use prmfile
17  use indexer
18  use qatom
19  use misc
20 
21  implicit none

23  type txmolecule
24  integer :: xtool_format
25  integer :: id
26  integer :: valid
27  character(len=256) :: name
28  character(len=256) :: formula
29  real :: weight
30  integer :: num_hb_atom
31  integer(2) :: num_rotor
32  real :: logp
33  real :: surface,nsur,psur
34  real :: volume

37  type(txatom),pointer :: atom(:)

40  type(txbond),pointer :: bond(:)

79  end type tabs

84  real :: pkd1,pkd2,pkd3

93  type bond_pointer !pointer to the datatype q_bond
94  type(q_bond),pointer :: qb !needed for array of q_bonds in type q_atom
95  end type bond_pointer
96 
97  type q_atom
98  integer :: top_nr ! atom number in topology
99  integer :: n !number of bonds
100  type(bond_pointer),dimension(1:6) :: bd !pointers to the bonds
101  logical :: contact !if closer than r to any receptor atom
102  integer :: at_type !if lipophilic 2, if other heavy 1, if hydrogen 0
103  integer :: hybrid !if included sp3 then 3, if included sp2 then 2, others 0
104  logical :: been_there !flag used in recursive routines, to avoid eternal loops
105  logical,pointer :: cyclic(:) !array of logicals, one for each ring, 1 if part of that ring
106  logical :: active !same as been_there
107  end type q_atom
108 
109  type q_bond
110  type(q_atom),pointer :: a,b !pointers to two bonded atoms
111  logical :: rotatable !if not part of ring and sp3-sp3 or sp3-sp2 bond
112  logical :: acontact,bcontact !if a and b in contact with receptor, only used if rotatable
113  logical :: been_there
114  integer :: a_nonlip,b_nonlip !number of non-lipophilic heavy atoms on a-side and b-side of bond
115  integer :: a_lip,b_lip !number of lipophilic heavy atoms on a-side and b-side of bond
116  logical,pointer :: cyclic(:)
117  logical :: active
118 
119  integer :: cod
120  end type q_bond

132  integer :: ring
133  character(len=3):: pmftype
134  end type tatomstruct

179  end type tpmf_def

181  type thb_def

185  real :: low_cutoff_a2, high_cutoff_a2, step_a2
186  integer :: num_bin_d, num_bin_a1, num_bin_a2, num_bin_total
187  real, pointer :: pmf(:)
188  end type

283  type txatom
284  integer :: topindex ! topology index
285  integer :: id !* atom id
286  integer :: valid !* valid indicator
287  integer :: mask ! mask flag
288  character(len=10) :: name ! atom name
289  character(len=10) :: ttype !* basic atom type
290  character(len=10) :: xtype !* xtool atom type
291  character(len=10) :: type2 ! another atom type when necessary
292  character(len=10) :: residue !* residue name
293  character(len=10) :: old_residue ! old residue name, helps debugging force field translations
294  character(len=10) :: res_id ! residue id: must be a string for PDB
295  integer :: atom_res_id ! atom number within residue
296  integer :: iscofactor ! flag indicating if atom is part of a cofactor (1) or not (0)
297  character :: chain ! chain label
298  real,dimension(0:2) :: coor !* coordinates
299  real,dimension(0:2) :: root !* HB root's coordinates
300  real :: weight !* atomic weight
301  real :: r !* vdw radius
302  real :: eps !* vdw epsilon value
303  real :: q !* partial atomic charge
304  real :: XR ! X radius
305  real :: logp !* atomic hydrophobic scale
306  real :: solv !* atomic solvation parameter
307  character(len=3) :: hb !* HB property
308  real :: occupancy ! occupancy probability, for protein atoms
309  real :: bfactor ! B-factor, for protein atoms
310  real :: score ! atomic binding score
311  integer :: ring ! ring indicator: 1=normal 2=aromatic
312  integer :: origin ! atom origin indicator: 1=ligand 2=protein
313  integer :: part ! component indicator:
314  ! for protein atoms: 1=ATOM 2=HETATM
315  integer :: num_neib ! number of neighboring atoms
316  integer :: num_nonh ! number of non-H neighboring atoms
317  integer,dimension(0:6) :: neib ! ID of neighboring atoms
318  integer,dimension(0:6) :: bond ! ID of neighboring bonds
319  integer :: temp ! for misc uses, e.g. cofactor merge
320  end type txatom
321 
322  type txwater
323  integer :: id ! atom id
324  integer :: valid ! valid indicator
325  character(len=10) :: name ! atom name
326  character(len=10) :: type ! atom type
327  character(len=10) :: xtype ! another atom type
328  character(len=10) :: residue ! residue name
329  real,dimension(0:3) :: coor ! coordinates
330  real :: r ! vdw radius
331  real :: eps ! vdw epsilon value
332  real :: q ! partial atomic charge
333  real :: logp ! atomic hydrophobic scale
334  character(len=3) :: hb ! HB property
335  real :: depth ! buried depth
336  real :: score ! score value
337  end type
338 
339  type txbond ! full version
340  integer :: id
341  integer :: valid ! valid indicator
342  integer :: atom_1 ! ID of the atom_1

344  character(len=3) :: ttype ! bond type
345  integer :: part ! ID of the component

348  integer :: num_neib ! number of neighboring bonds
349  integer,dimension(0:5) :: neib ! ID of neighboring bonds
350  end type
351 
352  type txtorsion ! full version
353  type(txatom) atom_1
354  type(txatom) atom_2
355  type(txatom) atom_3
356  type(txatom) atom_4
357  character(len=3) :: ttype ! type of the torsion between 2-3
358  integer :: angle ! torsion angle, in degree
359  real :: V ! potential barrier
360  integer :: n ! periodicity
361  integer :: S ! sign
362  real :: e ! torsion energy
363  end type
364 
365  type txgroup ! full version
366  integer :: valid
367  integer :: num_neib ! number of neighboring atoms
368  integer :: num_nonh ! number of neighboring non-h atoms
369  integer :: num_h ! number of neighboring hydrogen atoms
370  integer :: num_hetero ! number of neighboring heteroatoms
371  integer :: num_pi ! number of neighboring pi atoms
372  integer :: num_car ! number of neighboring C.ar
373  integer :: num_nar ! number of neighboring N.ar
374  integer :: num_db ! number of double bonds
375  integer :: num_tb ! number of triple bonds
376  integer :: db_type ! double bond type
377  integer :: amide ! indicator for amide group
378  type(txatom) center ! center atom of the group
379  type(txatom),dimension(0:6) :: neib ! neighboring atoms
380  type(txbond),dimension(0:6) :: bond ! bonds
381  end type
382 
383  type txhbond
384  integer :: valid
385  integer :: ttype ! 1: donor=latom, acceptor=patom
386  ! 2: donor=patom, acceptor=latom
387  ! 3: donor=metal, acceptor=latom/patom
388  ! 4: donor=latom, acceptor=latom
389  ! 5: donor=patom, acceptor=patom
390  ! 0: invalid, no H-bond
391  integer :: d_type ! donor type: 1=straight 2=angled
392  integer :: a_type ! acceptor type: 1=straight 2=angled
393  integer :: sb ! flag for neutral HB or SB
394 
395  integer :: latom ! id of the ligand atom
396  integer :: patom ! id of the protein atom
397 
398  type(txatom) H,D,A ! not pointers to atoms but real atoms
399 
400  real :: dd ! D-A distance
401  real :: a0 ! D-H-A angle
402  real :: a1 ! DR-D-A angle
403  real :: a2 ! D-A-AR angle
404 
405  real :: score ! strength of this HBond
406  end type
407 
408  type txring
409  integer :: valid ! 0 = invalid 1 = valid
410  integer :: ttype ! 1 = normal 2 = aromatic
411 
412  integer :: num_member
413  integer, pointer :: atom_id(:) ! worst case
414  integer :: atom_count = 0 ! actual count
415  integer :: atom_max = 0 ! size of allocated mem
416  integer, pointer :: bond_id(:) ! worst case
417  integer :: bond_count = 0 ! actual count
418  integer :: bond_max = 0 ! size of allocated mem
419 
420  real,dimension(0:3) :: centroid
421  end type
422 
423  type txdot
424  integer :: valid ! status indicator
425  character(len=10) :: ttype ! type
426  real,dimension(0:3) :: coor ! coordinates
427  real :: unit ! contribution, in either A^2 or A^3
428  real :: score ! score on this dot
429  end type
430 
431  type txdotset
432  integer :: num_dot = 0 ! current number of dots
433  integer :: max_dot = 0 ! number of dots for which mem is allocated
434  type(txdot),pointer :: dot(:) ! array of dots
435  real :: r
436  character(len=10) :: ttype
437  real :: unit ! default contribution of each dot to total
438  real :: total ! total volume or surface
439  end type

467  end type txscore

505  type(q_atom),private,allocatable,target :: q_atoms(:) ! atoms in ligand
506  type(q_bond),private,allocatable,target :: q_bonds(:) ! bonds in ligand
507  integer, allocatable :: iqatom(:) !one element per atom, 0 if not Q-atom,
508 
509  type(q_atom),private,allocatable,target :: aHQ(:) ! heavy atoms in ligand
510  type(q_bond),private,allocatable,target :: aHB(:) ! heavy bonds in ligand
511  !else number in iqseq (ligand)
512  integer :: nHQ ! number of heavy q-atoms
513  integer :: nHB ! number of bonds between heavy q-atoms
514 
515  integer(AI), allocatable :: lph_r(:) !topology number for all lipophilic atoms in the receptor
516  integer(AI), allocatable :: lph_l(:) ! '' the ligand
517  type(donor), allocatable :: hbd_r(:) !H-bond donor in receptor
518  type(donor), allocatable :: hbd_l(:) ! '' ligand
519  integer(AI), allocatable :: hba_r(:) !H-bond acceptor atoms in receptor
520  integer(AI), allocatable :: hba_l(:) ! '' ligand
521  integer(AI), allocatable :: met_r(:) !metal atoms in the receptor
522  type(wat), allocatable :: waters(:) !water molecules
523 
524  integer, allocatable :: pol_con(:)!connections for potentially polar atoms
525 
526  !numbers of each of the atom types
527  integer :: nlph_r, nlph_l, nhbd_r, nhbd_l
528  integer :: nhba_r, nhba_l, nmet_r, nwaters,nqbonds
529  integer :: nhbd_prot, nhba_prot
530  integer :: nrings !number of rings in the ligand
531 
532  ! System
533  type(txprotein),public :: protein
534  type(txligand), public :: ligand
535  type(txligand), public,allocatable :: cofactor(:)
536  type(txff),public :: ff
537  integer,pointer :: top2prot(:) ! topology atom index -> protein atom index translation matrix, used in bond translations
538 
539  ! Mask
540  integer, public,parameter :: MAX_MASKS = 10
541  type(mask_type), public, target :: masks(MAX_MASKS)
542  integer, public :: Nmasks = 0
543 
544  ! Results
545  type(txscore), pointer :: xscores(:) ! xscoring stats for each frame
546  integer :: nXScores, maxXScores
547

549  integer :: bDoTopCalc ! flag to indicate whether to score initial topology or not
550  type(txinput) :: input
551  character(len=20) :: chTranslationKey
552  character(len=80) :: chInput
553  character(len=80),allocatable :: cofactor_def(:)
554  integer :: num_cofactor
555

557  type(atom_type_conversion), allocatable :: atomtypetable(:)
558  integer :: num_atomtype

560  integer :: num_patomrestype
561  type(residue_name_conversion), pointer :: residuetable(:)
562  integer :: num_residue
563 
564  ! Consts, params and misc
565  integer :: MAX_BOND_NEIB = 10
566  integer :: MAX_ATOM_NEIB = 6
567 
568  real :: LOGP_HYDROPHOBIC_CARBON = 0.211
569  real :: LOGP_INTERNAL_HBOND = 0.429
570  real :: LOGP_HALOGEN_PAIR = 0.137
571  real :: LOGP_NAR_PAIR = 0.485
572  real :: LOGP_O3_PAIR = -0.268
573  real :: LOGP_ACCEPTOR_PAIR = 0.580
574  real :: LOGP_AMINO_ACID = -2.166
575  real :: LOGP_SALICYLIC_ACID = 0.554
576  real :: LOGP_SULFONIC_ACID = -0.501
577  type(tlogpfactor), dimension(0:9),public :: logp_factor
578 
579  real :: LARGE = 1.0e+6
580  real :: DIST_CUTOFF = 8.00
581  real :: WATER_R = 1.40
582  real :: POCKET_DEPTH = 4.00
583  real :: LAYER_DEPTH = 3.00
584 
585  integer, parameter :: max_atlib = 500
586  real :: PI = 3.1416
587 
588  integer,public :: err ! public allocation error indicator
589  integer, private :: warn ! flag to inidacte if warnings were displayd
590 
591 contains
592 
593 subroutine xscore_initialize
594  nxscores = 0
595  maxxscores = 16
596  allocate(xscores(maxxscores))
597 end subroutine xscore_initialize
598 
599 subroutine xscore_finalize
600  if(warn.ne.0) then
601  write(*,'(a,i3,a)') 'WARNING: There were ', warn, ' warnings.'
602  else
603  write(*,'(a)') 'X-Score finished succesfully.'
604  end if
605 end subroutine xscore_finalize
606 
607 integer function xscore_add(desc)
608  !arguments
609  character(*),intent(out) :: desc
610  ! locals
611  character(len=400) :: chbuf
612  character(len=80) :: chsmallbuf
613  integer :: i,ats
614 
615  if(nmasks == max_masks) then
616  write(*,1) max_masks
617  return
618  end if
619 1 format('Sorry, the maximum number of score calculations is ',i2)
620 
621  !add a new score mask
622  nmasks = nmasks + 1
623  call mask_initialize(masks(nmasks))
624  ats = maskmanip_make(masks(nmasks))
625 
626  !discard if no atoms in mask
627  if(ats == 0) then
628  call mask_finalize(masks(nmasks))
629  nmasks = nmasks - 1
630  xscore_add = 0
631  return
632  end if
633 
634  chbuf = ''
635  do while((trim(chbuf).ne.'yes').and.(trim(chbuf).ne.'no'))
636  call getlin(chbuf,'Score initial topology? (yes/no)')
637  call locase(chbuf)
638  end do
639 
640  if(chbuf.eq.'yes') then
641  bdotopcalc = 1
642  else
643  bdotopcalc = 0
644  end if
645 
646  call getlin(fep_file,'Q-atom (FEP) file: ')
647 
648  allocate(cofactor_def(1:16)) ! initially allow up to 16 cofactors
649  num_cofactor = 0
650  do
651  call getlin(chsmallbuf,'Cofactor (. or EOL terminates): ')
652  if(chsmallbuf.eq.'.'.or.chsmallbuf.eq.'') exit
653  num_cofactor = num_cofactor +1
654  cofactor_def(num_cofactor) = chsmallbuf
655  end do
656 
657  call getlin(chtranslationkey, 'FF translation key: ')
658  call getlin(chinput,'Scroring parameters: ')
659 
660  xscore_add = nmasks
661  write(desc, 2) nat_pro
662 2 format('X-Score calculation using ',i6,' atoms')
663 end function xscore_add
664 
665 subroutine xsort_bonds !identify pairs of atoms involved in q-bonds and/or hydrogen bonding !in start
666  integer :: atom1,atom2
667  integer :: i,j,k
668  logical :: polar
669 
670  !allokera listor
671  allocate (q_atoms(nqat))
672  allocate (q_bonds(nqat*5)) ! worst case?
673  allocate (hbd_r(nat_solute),hbd_l(nqat))
674  allocate (pol_con(nat_solute))
675 
676  nhbd_l = 0
677  nhbd_r = 0
678  q_atoms(:)%n = 0
679  nqbonds = 0
680  pol_con(:) = 0
681 
682  do i = 1,nbonds_solute ! loop over all bonds between solute atoms
683  polar = .false.
684  atom1 = bnd(i)%i
685  atom2 = bnd(i)%j
686 
687  !store all bonds between q-atoms, pointers relating arrays q_atoms and q_bonds
688  if ((iqatom(atom1) /= 0) .and. (iqatom(atom2) /= 0)) then
689  j = iqatom(atom1)
690  k = iqatom(atom2)
691 
692  nqbonds = nqbonds+1
693  q_bonds(nqbonds)%a => q_atoms(j)
694  q_bonds(nqbonds)%b => q_atoms(k) ! pointer to atom in q_atoms
695  q_bonds(nqbonds)%cod = bnd(i)%cod ! some sort of bond type
696 
697  q_atoms(j)%n = q_atoms(j)%n +1 ! number of bonds to atom j
698  q_atoms(j)%bd(q_atoms(j)%n)%qb => q_bonds(nqbonds) !pointer to bond in q_bonds
699 
700  q_atoms(k)%n = q_atoms(k)%n +1
701  q_atoms(k)%bd(q_atoms(k)%n)%qb => q_bonds(nqbonds)
702  end if
703 
704  end do
705 end subroutine xsort_bonds
706 
707 subroutine xreadatomtypeconversions(filename, chType)
708  character(len=256) :: filename
709  character(len=20) :: chtype
710  integer :: fp, p,p2, num_heading = 0, column, count = 0,filestat,mark,i,j
711  character(len=256) :: buf,buf2
712  character(len=12),allocatable :: tmp(:)
713 
714  fp = freefile()
715  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
716  do
717  ! First, find the right section
718  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
719  if(filestat.eq.0) then
720  call locase(buf)
721  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then
722  goto 11 ! skip blank line
723  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
724  goto 11 ! skip comment
725  elseif(trim(buf).eq.'{ligand atom type translations}') then
726  exit
727  end if
728  else
729  write(*,'(a,a)') 'Fatal: Unable to read ligand atom type translations from ', trim(filename)
730  stop
731  end if
732 11 end do
733 
734  do
735  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
736  if(filestat.eq.0) then
737  call locase(buf)
738  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then
739  goto 1 ! skip blank line
740  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
741  goto 1 ! skip comment
742  elseif(buf(1:5).eq.'sybyl') then
743  p = index(buf,'#')
744  if(p.ne.0) buf = buf(1:p-1) ! remove traling comment
745 
746  ! First find out how many headings (including xscore) are present
747  p = 7
748  num_heading = 1
749  do
750  read(buf(p:256),*,iostat=filestat) buf2
751  if(filestat.eq.0) then
752  num_heading = num_heading +1
753  p2 = index(buf(p:255),buf2(1:len(trim(buf2))))
754  if(buf2(1:len(trim(buf2))).eq.chtype) then
755  column = num_heading
756  end if
757  p = p + p2 +len(trim(buf2))
758  else
759  exit
760  end if
761  end do
762  elseif(buf(1:1).eq.'{') then
763  exit
764  else
765  count = count +1
766  end if
767  else
768  exit
769  end if
770 1 end do
771 
772  rewind(fp)
773 
774  if(column.eq.0) then
775  write(*,'(a,a,a,a)') 'Fatal error: Column ', adjustl(trim(chtype)), ' not found in ', adjustl(trim(filename))
776  stop
777  end if
778 
779  num_atomtype = count
780  allocate(atomtypetable(1:num_atomtype))
781  allocate(tmp(1:num_heading))
782 
783  count = 0
784  do
785  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
786  if(filestat.ne.0) goto 10
787  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 2 ! skip blank line
788  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 2 ! skip REM
789 
790  call locase(buf)
791  if(trim(buf).eq.'{ligand atom type translations}') then
792  do
793  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
794  if(filestat.ne.0) goto 10
795 
796  buf = adjustl(trim(buf))
797  if(buf.eq.'') goto 3 ! skip blank line
798  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 3 ! skip REM
799 
800  if(buf(1:5).eq.'SYBYL') then
801  mark = 1
802  goto 3
803  end if
804 
805  p = index(buf,'#')
806  buf = adjustl(buf(1:p-1)) ! remove traling comment
807 
808  if(mark.ne.0) then ! read translation table
809  tmp(1) = ''
810  tmp(column) = ''
811  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) tmp(1:column)
812  if(filestat.ne.0) goto 10
813 
814  if(buf(1:1).eq.'{') then
815  goto 10
816  elseif(tmp(column)(1:12).ne.'') then
817  count = count +1
818  atomtypetable(count)%xscore = tmp(1)
819  atomtypetable(count)%other = tmp(column)
820  end if
821  end if
822 3 end do
823  end if
824 2 end do
825 10 close(fp)
826 
827  do i = 1, size(atomtypetable)
828  if(atomtypetable(i)%other.eq.'.') cycle
829  do j = i,size(atomtypetable)
830  if(atomtypetable(j)%other.eq.'.') cycle
831  if(trim(atomtypetable(i)%other).eq.trim(atomtypetable(j)%other) &
832  .and.trim(atomtypetable(i)%xscore).ne.trim(atomtypetable(j)%xscore)) then
833  write(*,'(a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a)') &
834  'Fatal: Ambiguous entries in type translation matrix (file ', &
835  trim(adjustl(filename)), '). ', &
836  trim(adjustl(atomtypetable(j)%other)), &
837  ' maps to both ', &
838  adjustl(trim(atomtypetable(i)%xscore)), &
839  ' and ', &
840  adjustl(trim(atomtypetable(j)%xscore))
841  stop
842  end if
843  end do
844  end do
845 
846 
847  write(*,'(a,i4,a,a,a)') 'Read ', count, ' atom translations for force field ', adjustl(trim(chtype)), '.'
848  return
849 
850 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
851  stop
852 end subroutine xreadatomtypeconversions
853 
854 subroutine xreadresidueconversions(filename, chType)
855  character(len=256) :: filename
856  character(len=20) :: chtype
857  integer :: fp, p, filestat
858  character(len=256) :: buf
859  type(residue_name_conversion),pointer :: tmp(:)
860 
861  fp = freefile()
862  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
863  do
864  ! First, find the right section
865  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
866  if(filestat.eq.0) then
867  call locase(buf)
868  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then
869  goto 11 ! skip blank line
870  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
871  goto 11 ! skip comment
872  elseif(trim(buf).eq.'{residue type translations}') then
873  exit
874  end if
875  else
876  write(*,'(a,a)') 'Fatal: Unable to read residue translations from ', trim(filename)
877  stop
878  end if
879 11 end do
880 
881  num_residue = 0
882  do
883  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
884  if(filestat.eq.0) then
885  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then ! skip blank line
886  goto 12
887  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then ! skip comment
888  goto 12
889  elseif(buf(1:1).eq.'{') then
890  exit
891  else
892  p = index(buf,'#')
893  if(p.ne.0) buf = buf(1:p-1) ! remove traling comment
894 
895  num_residue = num_residue +1
896  ! Make sure storage has been allocated
897  if(.not. associated(residuetable)) allocate(residuetable(9))
898 
899  ! Expand table if it's too small
900  if(num_residue>size(residuetable)) then
901  allocate(tmp(size(residuetable)+4))
902  tmp(1:size(residuetable)) = residuetable(1:size(residuetable))
903  deallocate(residuetable)
904  residuetable => tmp
905  end if
906 
907  ! Read table
908  read(buf,*) residuetable(num_residue)%xscore,residuetable(num_residue)%other
909  end if
910  else
911  exit
912  end if
913 12 end do
914 
915  close(fp)
916  return
917 
918 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
919  stop
920 end subroutine xreadresidueconversions
921 
922 subroutine xpatomnameconversions(filename, chType)
923  character(len=256) :: filename
924  character(len=20) :: chtype,name1,name2
925  integer :: fp, p, i, filestat, mark
926  character(len=256) :: buf
927  character(len=10) :: head
928  character(len=10) :: section(1:5)
929  integer :: stackpointer,current_res
930  !type(RESIDUE_NAME_CONVERSION),pointer :: tmp(:)
931 
932  call locase(chtype)
933 
934  fp = freefile()
935  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
936  do
937  ! First, find the right section
938  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
939  if(filestat.eq.0) then
940  call locase(buf)
941  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then ! skip blank line
942  goto 1
943  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then ! skip comment
944  goto 1
945  elseif(trim(buf).eq.'{protein atom name translations}') then
946 
947  ! Read and make corrections
948  mark = 0
949  stackpointer = 0
950  do
951  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
952  if(filestat.eq.0) then
953  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then ! skip blank line
954  goto 2
955  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then ! skip comment
956  goto 2
957  elseif(buf(1:1).eq.'{'.and.mark.eq.1) then
958  exit
959  else
960  p = index(buf,'#')
961  if(p.ne.0) buf = buf(1:p-1) ! remove traling comment
962 
963  ! Prepare buffer
964  call locase(buf)
965  read(buf,*), head
966 
967  if(head(1:1).eq.'<') then
968  p = index(head,'>')
969  head = head(2:p-1) ! extract head
970 
971  if(head(1:1).eq.'.') then ! end of section
972  head = head(2:len(head))
973  if(head.ne.section(stackpointer)) then
974  write(*,*) 'Syntax error in ', filename
975  stop
976  else
977  section(stackpointer) = ''
978  stackpointer = stackpointer -1
979 
980  if(stackpointer.eq.0.and.mark.ne.0) goto 3
981  end if
982  else ! beginning of section
983  stackpointer = stackpointer +1
984  section(stackpointer) = head
985 
986  if(stackpointer.eq.2) then ! residue name
987  do i = 1,num_patomrestype
988  call upcase(head)
989  if(patomnametable(i)%res.eq.head) then
990  current_res = i
991  exit
992  end if
993  end do
994  elseif(stackpointer.eq.1) then ! forcefield name
995  if(head.eq.chtype) mark = 1
996  end if
997  end if
998  else
999  if((mark.ne.0).and.(current_res.ne.0)) then
1000  read(buf,*) name1, name2
1001  call upcase(name1)
1002  call upcase(name2)
1003  do i = 1,patomnametable(current_res)%natom
1004  if(name1.eq.patomnametable(current_res)%xname(i)) then
1005  patomnametable(current_res)%xname(i) = name2
1006  exit
1007  end if
1008  end do
1009  end if
1010  end if
1011  end if
1012  else
1013  exit
1014  end if
1015 2 end do
1016  exit
1017  end if
1018  else
1019  write(*,'(a,a)') 'Fatal: Unable to read residue translations from ', trim(filename)
1020  stop
1021  end if
1022 1 end do
1023 
1024 3 close(fp)
1025  return
1026 
1027 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
1028  stop
1029 end subroutine xpatomnameconversions
1030 
1031 character(len=12) function xtranslateatomtype(othertype)
1032  character :: othertype, buf !removed (len=12) to compile on linux
1033  integer :: i
1034 
1035  read(othertype, *, iostat=i) buf
1036 
1037  do i = 1,num_atomtype
1038  if(atomtypetable(i)%other.eq.buf) then
1039  xtranslateatomtype = atomtypetable(i)%xscore
1040  return
1041  end if
1042  end do
1043 
1044  xtranslateatomtype = 'Un'
1045 end function xtranslateatomtype
1046 
1047 subroutine xreadlib(filename)
1048  character(len=256) :: filename
1049  integer :: i,fp, filestat,p,count,b_atomsection
1050  character(len=6) :: slask
1051  character(len=256) :: buf
1052  integer :: atom_count(1:200) ! worst case
1053  type(patom_name_conversion), pointer :: tmp_table(:)
1054 
1055  fp = freefile()
1056  count = 0
1057  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
1058  do
1059  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
1060  if(filestat.eq.0) then
1061  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then
1062  goto 1 ! skip blank line
1063  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
1064  goto 1 ! skip comment
1065  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'*') then
1066  goto 1 ! skip comment
1067  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'!') then
1068  goto 1 ! skip comment
1069  else
1070  p = index(buf,'!')
1071  if(p.ne.0) buf = buf(1:p-1) ! remove traling comment
1072 
1073  if(buf(1:1).eq.'{') then
1074  count = count +1
1075 
1076  ! now count the number of atoms in this residue
1077  b_atomsection = 0
1078  do
1079  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
1080  if(filestat.ne.0) then
1081  exit
1082  elseif(trim(buf).eq.'') then
1083  goto 2 ! skip blank line
1084  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
1085  goto 2 ! skip comment
1086  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'*') then
1087  goto 2 ! skip comment
1088  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'!') then
1089  goto 2 ! skip comment
1090  elseif(index(buf,'[atoms]').ne.0) then
1091  b_atomsection = 1 ! set flag
1092  elseif(index(buf,'[').ne.0.and.b_atomsection.ne.0) then ! reach end of [atoms]-section
1093  b_atomsection = 0
1094  exit
1095  else
1096  if(b_atomsection.ne.0) atom_count(count) = atom_count(count) +1 ! if no rules triggered, this is an atom line
1097  end if
1098  2 end do
1099  end if
1100  end if
1101  else
1102  exit
1103  end if
1104 1 end do
1105 
1106  rewind(fp)
1107 
1108  if(.not. associated(patomnametable)) allocate(patomnametable(1:count))
1109 
1110  if(size(patomnametable)<num_patomrestype+count) then ! increase table size
1111  allocate(tmp_table(1:num_patomrestype+count))
1112  tmp_table(1:num_patomrestype) = patomnametable(1:num_patomrestype)
1113  deallocate(patomnametable)
1114  patomnametable => tmp_table
1115  end if
1116 
1117  do i = 1,count
1118  patomnametable(num_patomrestype + i)%natom = atom_count(i)
1119  allocate(patomnametable(num_patomrestype + i)%qname(1:atom_count(i))) ! allocate name tables
1120  allocate(patomnametable(num_patomrestype + i)%xname(1:atom_count(i))) ! - " -
1121  end do
1122 
1123  ! now read the residue and atom name information
1124  count = 0
1125  do
1126  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
1127  if(filestat.eq.0) then
1128  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then
1129  goto 3 ! skip blank line
1130  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
1131  goto 3 ! skip comment
1132  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'*') then
1133  goto 3 ! skip comment
1134  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'!') then
1135  goto 3 ! skip comment
1136  else
1137  p = index(buf,'!')
1138  if(p.ne.0) buf = buf(1:p-1) ! remove traling comment
1139 
1140  if(buf(1:1).eq.'{') then ! begin residue information
1141  count = count +1
1142  p = index(buf,'}')
1143  patomnametable(num_patomrestype + count)%res = buf(2:p-1) ! read residue name
1144 
1145  ! now read atom name table
1146  i = 0
1147  b_atomsection = 0
1148  do
1149  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
1150  if(filestat.ne.0) then
1151  exit
1152  elseif(trim(buf).eq.'') then
1153  goto 4 ! skip blank line
1154  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
1155  goto 4 ! skip comment
1156  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'*') then
1157  goto 4 ! skip comment
1158  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'!') then
1159  goto 4 ! skip comment
1160  elseif(index(buf,'[atoms]').ne.0) then
1161  b_atomsection = 1 ! set flag
1162  i = 0
1163  elseif(index(buf,'[').ne.0.and.b_atomsection.ne.0) then ! reached end of [atoms]-section
1164  b_atomsection = 0
1165  exit
1166  else
1167  if(b_atomsection.ne.0) then
1168  i = i +1 ! read name information
1169  read(buf(1:256),*,iostat=filestat) slask, &
1170  patomnametable(num_patomrestype+count)%xname(i),&
1171  patomnametable(num_patomrestype+count)%qname(i)
1172  end if
1173  end if
1174 4 end do
1175  end if
1176  end if
1177  else
1178  exit
1179  end if
1180 3 end do
1181  close(fp)
1182 
1183  num_patomrestype = num_patomrestype + count
1184  return
1185 
1186 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
1187  stop
1188 end subroutine xreadlib
1189 
1190 character(len=10) function xtranslatepatomname(atom_res_id, res)
1191  ! returns the correct aton name as found in residue table
1192  ! dependant on the correct ordering of atoms within residue!
1193  integer :: atom_res_id
1194  character(len=10) :: res
1195  integer :: i
1196 
1197 
1198  do i = 1,num_patomrestype
1199  if(patomnametable(i)%res.eq.res) then
1200  xtranslatepatomname = patomnametable(i)%xname(atom_res_id)
1201  return
1202  end if
1203  end do
1204 
1205  xtranslatepatomname = 'Un'
1206 end function xtranslatepatomname
1207 
1208 character(len=10) function xtranslateresidue(res)
1209  ! Translates some residue names used by Q to XScore equivalents
1210  character(len=8) :: res
1211  integer :: i
1212 
1213  do i = 1,num_residue
1214  if(trim(res).eq.trim(residuetable(i)%other)) then
1215  xtranslateresidue = residuetable(i)%xscore
1216  return
1217  end if
1218  end do
1219 
1220  xtranslateresidue = res
1221 end function xtranslateresidue
1222 
1223 subroutine xreadinput()
1224  integer :: i,fp,filestat,p
1225  character(len=256) :: buf, head, chval
1226  character(len=256) :: line, restofline
1227  integer :: res
1228 
1229  chinput = adjustl(trim(chinput))
1230 
1231  if(chinput.ne.'default') then
1232  ! Open file
1233  fp = freefile()
1234  open(unit=fp,file=chinput,err=999,action='READ')
1235  do
1236  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
1237 
1238  if(filestat.eq.0) then
1239  if(trim(buf).eq.'') then
1240  goto 1 ! skip blank line
1241  elseif(trim(buf(1:1)).eq.'#') then
1242  goto 1 ! skip comment
1243  else
1244  p = index(buf,'#')
1245  if(p.ne.0) buf = buf(1:p-1) ! remove traling comment
1246 
1247  read(buf, *,iostat=filestat) head
1248  call upcase(head)
1249  head = adjustl(trim(head))
1250 
1251  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, chval
1252 
1253  select case(head)
1254  case('SHOW_ATOM_BIND_SCORE')
1255  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%show_abs
1256  case('SHOW_TOTAL_SCORE')
1257  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%show_total
1258 
1259  case('APPLY_HPSCORE')
1260  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%apply_hpscore
1261  case('HPSCORE_CVDW')
1262  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hpscore_cvdw
1263  case('HPSCORE_CHB')
1264  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hpscore_chb
1265  case('HPSCORE_CHP')
1266  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hpscore_chp
1267  case('HPSCORE_CRT')
1268  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hpscore_crt
1269  case('HPSCORE_C0')
1270  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hpscore_c0
1271 
1272  case('APPLY_HMSCORE')
1273  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%apply_hmscore
1274  case('HMSCORE_CVDW')
1275  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hmscore_cvdw
1276  case('HMSCORE_CHB')
1277  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hmscore_chb
1278  case('HMSCORE_CHM')
1279  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hmscore_chm
1280  case('HMSCORE_CRT')
1281  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hmscore_crt
1282  case('HMSCORE_C0')
1283  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hmscore_c0
1284 
1285  case('APPLY_HSSCORE')
1286  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%apply_hsscore
1287  case('HSSCORE_CVDW')
1288  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hsscore_cvdw
1289  case('HSSCORE_CHB')
1290  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hsscore_chb
1291  case('HSSCORE_CHS')
1292  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hsscore_chs
1293  case('HSSCORE_CRT')
1294  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hsscore_crt
1295  case('HSSCORE_C0')
1296  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%hsscore_c0
1297 
1298  case('SHOW_LIGAND')
1299  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%show_ligand
1300  case('SHOW_PROTEIN')
1301  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%show_protein
1302  case('SHOW_COFACTOR')
1303  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%show_cofactor
1304  case('SHOW_BONDS')
1305  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%show_bonds
1306 
1307  case('RESIDUE_DEFINITIONS')
1308  read(buf,'(a256)') line
1309  read(line,*) head
1310  !workaround to allow / in strings
1311  input%residue_def = adjustl(line(len_trim(head)+1:len(line)))
1312 ! read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%residue_def
1313  case('ATOM_DEFINITIONS')
1314  read(buf,'(a256)') line
1315  read(line,*) head
1316  !workaround to allow / in strings
1317  input%atom_def = adjustl(line(len_trim(head)+1:len(line)))
1318 ! read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%atom_def
1319  case('LOGP_DEFINITIONS')
1320  read(buf,'(a256)') line
1321  read(line,*) head
1322  !workaround to allow / in strings
1323  input%logp_def = adjustl(line(len_trim(head)+1:len(line)))
1324 ! read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%logp_def
1325  case('SURFACE_DEFINITIONS')
1326  read(buf,'(a256)') line
1327  read(line,*) head
1328  !workaround to allow / in strings
1329  input%surface_def = adjustl(line(len_trim(head)+1:len(line)))
1330 ! read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%surface_def
1331  case('ATOM_TRANSLATIONS')
1332  read(buf,'(a256)') line
1333  read(line,*) head
1334  !workaround to allow / in strings
1335  input%atom_translations = adjustl(line(len_trim(head)+1:len(line)))
1336 ! read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) head, input%atom_translations
1337 
1338  end select
1339  end if
1340  else
1341  exit
1342  end if
1343 1 end do
1344  close(fp)
1345 
1346  input%num_method = 0
1347  if(input%apply_hpscore.eq.'YES') input%num_method = input%num_method +1
1348  if(input%apply_hmscore.eq.'YES') input%num_method = input%num_method +1
1349  if(input%apply_hsscore.eq.'YES') input%num_method = input%num_method +1
1350 
1351  input%qatom = -1
1352  else
1353  input%show_abs = 'NO'
1354  input%show_total = 'YES'
1355  input%show_ligand = 'YES'
1356  input%show_protein = 'NO'
1357  input%show_cofactor = 'YES'
1358  input%show_cofactor = 'NO'
1359 
1360  input%num_method = 3
1361  input%apply_hpscore = 'YES'
1362  input%apply_hmscore = 'YES'
1363  input%apply_hsscore = 'YES'
1364 
1365  input%hpscore_cvdw = 0.004
1366  input%hpscore_chb = 0.054
1367  input%hpscore_chp = 0.009
1368  input%hpscore_crt = -0.061
1369  input%hpscore_c0 = 3.441
1370 
1371  input%hmscore_cvdw = 0.004
1372  input%hmscore_chb = 0.101
1373  input%hmscore_chm = 0.387
1374  input%hmscore_crt = -0.097
1375  input%hmscore_c0 = 3.567
1376 
1377  input%hsscore_cvdw = 0.004
1378  input%hsscore_chb = 0.073
1379  input%hsscore_chs = 0.004
1380  input%hsscore_crt = -0.090
1381  input%hsscore_c0 = 3.328
1382 
1383  input%residue_def = 'residue_def_xtool.dat'
1384  input%atom_def = 'atom_def_xtool.dat'
1385  input%logp_def = 'atom_def_xlogp.dat'
1386  input%surface_def = 'surface_def_xtool.dat'
1387  input%atom_translations = 'atom_type_translations.dat'
1388 
1389  end if
1390 
1391  return
1392 
1393 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(chinput)), '. Exiting.'
1394  stop
1395 end subroutine xreadinput
1396 
1397 subroutine xreadinputqatom
1398  integer :: i,fp,filestat,p
1399  character(len=256) :: buf, head, chval
1400  integer :: res
1401 
1402  if(input%show_abs(1:6).eq.'QATOM=') then
1403  chval = input%show_abs(7:20)
1404 
1405  p = index(chval,':')
1406  if(p.ne.0) then
1407 
1408  head = adjustl(trim(chval(1:p-1)))
1409  buf = adjustl(trim(chval(p+1:256)))
1410 
1411  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) res
1412 
1413  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
1414  if(adjustl(trim(ligand%mol%atom(i)%res_id)).eq.adjustl(trim(head))) then
1415  input%qatom = i + res
1416  exit
1417  end if
1418  end do
1419  else
1420  read(chval,*,iostat=filestat) input%qatom
1421  end if
1422 
1423  input%show_abs = 'QATOM'
1424  if(input%qatom<0.or.input%qatom>ligand%mol%num_atom -1) then
1425  write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>> WARNING: Q-atom ', trim(chval), ' does not exist. ABS will not be displayed.'
1426  warn = warn +1
1427  input%show_abs = 'NO'
1428  end if
1429 
1430  end if
1431 end subroutine xreadinputqatom
1432 
1433 subroutine xscore_precalc
1434  integer :: i,j, p
1435  character(len=256) :: chbuf
1436  character(len=256) :: filename
1437  real :: score
1438 
1439  ! ======================================
1440  ! 0. READ PARAMETERS AND DO PREPARATIONS
1441  ! ======================================
1442 
1443 
1444  call xreadinput()
1445 
1446  filename = input%residue_def !'RESIDUE_DEF_XTOOL'
1447  call forcefield_read_residue_def(filename)
1448 
1449  filename = input%atom_def !'ATOM_DEF_XTOOL'
1450  call forcefield_read_atom_def(filename)
1451 
1452  filename = input%logp_def !'ATOM_DEF_XLOGP'
1453  call forcefield_read_xatom_def(filename)
1454 
1455  filename = input%surface_def !'SURFACE_DEF_XTOOL'
1456  call forcefield_read_surface_def(filename)
1457 
1458  filename = input%atom_translations !'XSCORE_ATOM_TYPE_CONVERSIONS.dat' ! atom type conversions are only used on ligand atoms
1459  call xreadatomtypeconversions(filename,chtranslationkey) ! read atom type conversions
1460  call xreadresidueconversions(filename,chtranslationkey) ! read residue conversions
1461 
1462  ! Read atom names from residue tables of lib-files
1463  ! This is done prior to residue renameing and atom renameing
1464  chbuf = lib_files
1465  do
1466  p = index(chbuf,';')
1467  if(p>0) then
1468  filename = chbuf(1:p-1)
1469  call xreadlib(filename)
1470  chbuf(1:256) = chbuf(p+1:256)
1471  else
1472  call xreadlib(chbuf)
1473  exit
1474  end if
1475  end do
1476  write(*,'(a,i4,a)') 'Read ', num_patomrestype, ' residues from library.'
1477 
1478  ! Make corrections to what was read from lib-files
1479  filename = input%atom_translations !'XSCORE_ATOM_TYPE_CONVERSIONS.dat'
1480  call xpatomnameconversions(filename,chtranslationkey)
1481 
1482  ! ============================
1483  ! 1. READ AND TRANSLATE LIGAND
1484  ! ============================
1485 
1486  if(.not. qatom_load_atoms(fep_file)) then
1487  stop 'Failed to read Q-atom list from FEP file.'
1488  end if
1489 
1490  allocate(iqatom(nat_solute)) ! Allocate mem for every solute atom
1491  iqatom(:) = 0
1492  do i=1,nqat
1493  iqatom(iqseq(i)) = i ! Set references so that iqatom = 0 if protein and {number} of ligand
1494  end do
1495 
1496  ! Extract bonds between q-atoms
1497  call xsort_bonds
1498 
1499  ! Set topology numbers for q-atoms
1500  q_atoms(:)%top_nr = iqseq(:)
1501 
1502  ! Translate q-atom data to ligand structure
1503  call xligand_translate(ligand,nqat,nqbonds,q_atoms,q_bonds)
1504  ligand%mol%name = adjustl(trim(title))
1505  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
1506  ligand%mol%atom(i)%type2 = ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype
1507  ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype = xtranslateatomtype(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype)
1508  end do
1509  write(*,'(a,i4,a,i4,a)') 'Translated ', ligand%mol%num_atom, ' atoms and ', ligand%mol%num_bond, ' bonds to ligand'
1510 
1511  call ligand_value_atom(ligand)
1512 
1513  ! Find monitored q-atom if specified. This has to be done after ligand atom names are assigned.
1514  call xreadinputqatom()
1515 
1516  j = 0
1517  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
1518  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid.eq.0) then
1519 ! write(*,'(a,i6,a,a,a,a,a)') 'WARNING: Atom ', mol%atom(i)%id, ' (', trim(adjustl(mol%atom(i)%qtype)),') in residue ', trim(adjustl(mol%atom(i)%residue)), ' does not match any type rule and will be ignored.'
1520  j = j +1
1521  end if
1522  end do
1523  if(j>0) then
1524  write(*,'(a,i5,a,i5,a,a,a)') &
1525  'WARNING: ', j, ' atoms (out of ', &
1526  ligand%mol%num_atom, ') in ', &
1527  adjustl(trim(ligand%mol%name)), &
1528  ' (ligand) will be ignored. Note that nonpolar hydrogens are automatically ignored.'
1529  warn = warn +1
1530  end if
1531  if(adjustl(trim(input%show_ligand)).eq.'YES') call molecule_show_contents(ligand%mol)
1532 
1533  ! =============================
1534  ! 2. READ AND TRANSLATE PROTEIN
1535  ! =============================
1536 
1537  ! First count protein bonds
1538  j = 0
1539  do i = 1,nbonds_solute
1540 ! if((bnd(i)%i<=ligand_offset).and.(bnd(i)%j<=ligand_offset)) j = j +1
1541  if((iqatom(bnd(i)%i).eq.0).and.(iqatom(bnd(i)%j).eq.0)) j = j +1
1542  end do
1543 
1544  allocate(top2prot(1:nat_solute)) ! top -> protein index translation matrix
1545 
1546 ! call xprotein_translate(protein, offset, xtop)
1547  call xprotein_translate(protein, nat_solute, xtop,nbonds_solute,bnd)
1548  protein%name = adjustl(trim(title))
1549 
1550  ! Need to value cofactor-protein atoms using Molecule_Value_Atom instead
1551  ! of Protein_Value_Atom. Cofactor atoms are invalidated and added separately later.
1552  ! Need to flag cofactors before residue names are translated.
1553  call xflag_cofactors
1554 
1555  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1556  ! Rename atoms according to lib-files
1557  protein%atom(i)%name = xtranslatepatomname(protein%atom(i)%atom_res_id, protein%atom(i)%residue)
1558 
1559  ! Rename residues according to translation table
1560  protein%atom(i)%old_residue = protein%atom(i)%residue
1561  protein%atom(i)%residue = xtranslateresidue(protein%atom(i)%residue)
1562  end do
1563 
1564  write(*,'(a,i5,a,i5,a)') 'Translated ', protein%num_atom, ' atoms and ', protein%num_bond, ' bonds to protein'
1565 
1566  call protein_value_atom(protein,flag=1)
1567 
1568  allocate(cofactor(1:num_cofactor))
1569  do i = 1, num_cofactor
1570 ! call xextract_cofactor(cofactor(i),cofactor_def(i),i,offset, nbonds,xtop,bnd)
1571  call xextract_cofactor(cofactor(i),cofactor_def(i),i,nat_solute, nbonds_solute,xtop,bnd)
1572 
1573  if(cofactor(i)%mol%num_atom.eq.0) then
1574  write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>ERROR: Cofactor definition ', adjustl(trim(cofactor_def(i))), ' is empty.'
1575  stop
1576  end if
1577 
1578  do j = 0,cofactor(i)%mol%num_atom -1
1579  cofactor(i)%mol%atom(j)%type2 = cofactor(i)%mol%atom(j)%ttype
1580  cofactor(i)%mol%atom(j)%ttype = xtranslateatomtype(cofactor(i)%mol%atom(j)%ttype)
1581  end do
1582  write(*,'(a,i4,a,i4,a,a)') 'Translated ', &
1583  cofactor(i)%mol%num_atom, ' atoms and ', &
1584  cofactor(i)%mol%num_bond, ' bonds to cofactor ', cofactor_def(i)
1585 
1586  call ligand_value_atom(cofactor(i))
1587  if(adjustl(trim(input%show_cofactor)).eq.'YES') call molecule_show_contents(cofactor(i)%mol)
1588 
1589  call protein_merge_cofactor(protein,cofactor(i))
1590  end do
1591 
1592  ! Update neighbour count for protein atoms (some waters may mess this up)
1593  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1594  do j = 0,6
1595  if(protein%atom(i)%neib(j).eq.0) then
1596  protein%atom(i)%num_neib = j
1597  exit
1598  end if
1599  end do
1600  end do
1601 
1602  call protein_define_pocket(protein, ff,ligand, 10.0)
1603 
1604  j = 0
1605  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1606  if(protein%atom(i)%valid.eq.0) then
1607  if(protein%atom(i)%xtype.ne.'H' .and. &
1608  protein%atom(i)%xtype.ne.'Un') then
1609  write(*,'(a,i6,a,a,a,a,a)') &
1610  'WARNING: Atom ', &
1611  protein%atom(i)%id, ' (', &
1612  trim(adjustl(protein%atom(i)%xtype)), &
1613  ') in residue ', &
1614  trim(adjustl(protein%atom(i)%residue)), &
1615  ' will be ignored.'
1616  endif
1617  j = j +1
1618  end if
1619  end do
1620  if(j>0) then
1621  write(*,'(a,i4,a,i4,a,a,a)') &
1622  'WARNING: ', j, ' atoms (out of ', &
1623  protein%num_atom, ') in ', &
1624  adjustl(trim(protein%name)), &
1625  ' (protein) will be ignored. Note that nonpolar hydrogens are automatically ignored.'
1626  warn = warn +1
1627  end if
1628  if(adjustl(trim(input%show_protein)).eq.'YES') call protein_show_contents(protein)
1629 
1630 
1631  ! ==============================
1632  ! 3. SCORE INITIAL CONFIGURATION
1633  ! ==============================
1634 
1635  if(bdotopcalc.eq.1) then
1636  write(*,'(a)') 'Scoring initial configuration'
1637  score = ligand_calculate_binding_score(ligand, input,protein)
1638  call ligand_scoring_stats(ligand)
1639  write(*,'(a, t28,f6.1, t36,f5.2, t43,f5.1, t51,f5.2, t57,f5.1, t65,f4.1, t73,f6.3)') &
1640  'Total score of topology', ligand%vdw,ligand%hb, &
1641  ligand%hp,ligand%hm,ligand%hs,ligand%rt,ligand%bind_score
1642  end if
1643 
1644 end subroutine xscore_precalc
1645 
1646 subroutine xflag_cofactors
1647  integer :: i,j,count
1648  character(len=10) :: restype
1649 
1650  ! valid cofactor definitions: restype=HEM -> all atoms in residues named HEM
1651 
1652  protein%atom(:)%iscofactor = 0
1653  do i = 1, num_cofactor
1654  if(cofactor_def(i)(1:7).eq.'restype'.or.cofactor_def(i)(1:7).eq.'RESTYPE') then
1655  restype = adjustl(trim(cofactor_def(i)(9:80)))
1656  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1657  if(protein%atom(j)%residue.eq.restype) protein%atom(j)%iscofactor = i
1658  end do
1659  end if
1660  end do
1661 end subroutine xflag_cofactors
1662 
1663 subroutine xextract_cofactor(cf,cf_def,conumber,nAtoms,nBonds,coordinates,bonds)
1664  type(txligand) :: cf
1665  character(len=80) :: cf_def
1666  integer :: conumber
1667  integer :: natoms,nbonds
1668  real(8) :: coordinates(:)
1669  type(bond_type) :: bonds(:)
1670 
1671  integer :: i,j,count,mark,floating_offset
1672  character(len=10) :: restype
1673  integer :: ires ! current residue
1674  integer :: inextres ! starting point of next residue
1675 
1676  integer,pointer :: mask(:),mask_res(:)
1677  type(txbond) :: tmp
1678  integer,pointer :: prt2cof(:)
1679 
1680  ! valid cofactor definitions: restype=HEM -> all atoms in residues named HEM
1681 
1682  ! Create atom mask for this cofactor
1683  if(cf_def(1:7).eq.'restype'.or.cf_def(1:7).eq.'RESTYPE') then
1684  restype = trim(adjustl(cf_def(9:80)))
1685  count = 0
1686 
1687  ires = 0
1688  inextres = 1
1689  do i = 1,natoms
1690  if(i.eq.inextres) then
1691  ires = ires +1
1692  if(ires<size(res)) inextres = res(ires +1)%start
1693  end if
1694  if(res(ires)%name.eq.restype) then
1695  call int_pushback(mask,i) ! push back this atom
1696  call int_pushback(mask_res,ires) ! push back corresponding residue id
1697  glb_cofactor(i) = conumber ! set global cofactor flag
1698  end if
1699  end do
1700 
1701  count = 0
1702  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1703  if(protein%atom(i)%residue.eq.restype) count = count +1
1704  end do
1705 
1706  cf%mol%num_atom = count
1707  allocate(cf%mol%atom(0:cf%mol%num_atom-1))
1708 
1709  allocate(prt2cof(0:protein%num_atom-1))
1710 
1711  ! Copy protein atom data to cofactor
1712  cf%mol%name = cf_def
1713  cf%mol%num_ring = 0
1714  nullify(cf%mol%ring)
1715  j = -1
1716  floating_offset = 0
1717  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1718  if(protein%atom(i)%residue.eq.restype) then
1719  j = j +1
1720  cf%mol%atom(j)%iscofactor = conumber ! set cofactor number
1721  cf%mol%atom(j)%coor(0) = protein%atom(i)%coor(0)
1722  cf%mol%atom(j)%coor(1) = protein%atom(i)%coor(1)
1723  cf%mol%atom(j)%coor(2) = protein%atom(i)%coor(2)
1724  cf%mol%atom(j)%id = j +1 ! need to set this temporarily
1725  cf%mol%atom(j)%atom_res_id = j +1
1726  cf%mol%atom(j)%name = '' ! not used. names are assigned using lib file and index within residue
1727  cf%mol%atom(j)%residue = 'COF' ! res(iRes)%name
1728  cf%mol%atom(j)%res_id = protein%atom(i)%res_id
1729  cf%mol%atom(j)%ttype = protein%atom(i)%ttype ! ttype and xtype are set by Value_Atom
1730  cf%mol%atom(j)%xtype = 'Un' ! cf%mol%atom(i -1)%ttype
1731  cf%mol%atom(j)%type2 = 'Un'
1732  cf%mol%atom(j)%hb = 'N'
1733  cf%mol%atom(j)%valid = 1 ! default
1734  cf%mol%atom(j)%origin = 2 ! This is a cf%mol atom
1735  cf%mol%atom(j)%part = 1 ! regular atom
1736  cf%mol%atom(j)%occupancy = 0.0 ! default
1737  cf%mol%atom(j)%solv = 0
1738  cf%mol%atom(j)%bfactor = 0
1739  cf%mol%atom(j)%logp = 0
1740  cf%mol%atom(j)%num_neib = protein%atom(i)%num_neib
1741  where(protein%atom(i)%neib.ne.0)
1742  cf%mol%atom(j)%neib = protein%atom(i)%neib -floating_offset
1743  elsewhere
1744  cf%mol%atom(j)%neib = 0
1745  end where
1746  cf%mol%atom(j)%bond(:) = protein%atom(i)%bond(:)
1747  cf%mol%atom(j)%root(:) = 0
1748  cf%mol%atom(j)%temp = i ! save insertion index
1749  prt2cof(i) = j ! save protein index -> cof index
1750  else
1751  floating_offset = floating_offset +1
1752  end if
1753  end do
1754 
1755  ! Translate bonds
1756  count = 0
1757  do i = 0,protein%num_bond -1
1758 ! write(*,*) i, protein%bond(i)%atom_1-1, protein%bond(i)%atom_2-1, size(protein%atom)
1759  if(protein%atom(protein%bond(i)%atom_1-1)%iscofactor.eq.conumber.and. &
1760  protein%atom(protein%bond(i)%atom_2-1)%iscofactor.eq.conumber) then
1761  count = count +1
1762  end if
1763  end do
1764 
1765  cf%mol%num_bond = count
1766  allocate(cf%mol%bond(0:cf%mol%num_bond -1))
1767  count = 0
1768 
1769  ! No need to copy bonds later since they are never removed from protein
1770  count = 0
1771  do i = 0,protein%num_bond -1
1772  if(protein%atom(protein%bond(i)%atom_1-1)%iscofactor.eq.conumber.and. &
1773  protein%atom(protein%bond(i)%atom_2-1)%iscofactor.eq.conumber) then
1774  cf%mol%bond(count)%id = count
1775  cf%mol%bond(count)%valid = 1
1776  cf%mol%bond(count)%atom_1 = prt2cof(protein%bond(i)%atom_1-1) +1
1777  cf%mol%bond(count)%atom_2 = prt2cof(protein%bond(i)%atom_2-1) +1
1778  cf%mol%bond(count)%ttype = protein%bond(i)%ttype !SYBYL_bond_type(bonds(i)%cod)
1779  cf%mol%bond(count)%neib(:) = 0
1780  count = count +1
1781  end if
1782  end do
1783 
1784  do
1785  mark = 0
1786  do i = 0, cf%mol%num_bond -2
1787  if((cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1).and. &
1788  (cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_2.eq.cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) goto 2
1789  if(cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_1 < cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1) goto 2
1790  if((cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1) .and. &
1791  (cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_2<=cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) goto 2
1792 
1793  ! If no rule triggered, the bonds are in the wrong order
1794  mark = 1
1795  call bond_swap(cf%mol%bond(i),cf%mol%bond(i+1))
1796  2 end do
1797  if(mark.eq.0) exit
1798  end do
1799 
1800  ! Reset bond id
1801  do i = 0,cf%mol%num_bond -1
1802  cf%mol%bond(i)%id = i +1
1803  end do
1804  end if
1805 
1806  deallocate(prt2cof)
1807  return
1808 
1809  if(.not. associated(mask).or.size(mask).eq.0) then
1810  write(*,'(a,a)') 'Fatal: No atoms match cofactor description ', trim(adjustl(cf_def))
1811  stop
1812  end if
1813 
1814 ! ! Extract atom data for this cofactor
1815 ! cf%mol%num_atom = size(mask)
1816 ! allocate(cf%mol%atom(0:cf%mol%num_atom-1))
1817 ! cf%cofactor_offset = mask(0) -1
1818 ! cf%mol%name = cf_def
1819 ! cf%mol%num_ring = 0
1820 ! nullify(cf%mol%ring)
1821 !
1822 ! do i = 0,size(mask) -1
1823 ! j = mask(i)
1824 ! iRes = mask_res(i)
1825 !
1826 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%coor(0) = coordinates(3*(j-1) +1)
1827 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%coor(1) = coordinates(3*(j-1) +2)
1828 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%coor(2) = coordinates(3*(j-1) +3)
1829 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%id = i +1
1830 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%atom_res_id = i +1
1831 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%name = '' ! not used. names are assigned using lib file and index within residue
1832 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%residue = 'COF' ! res(iRes)%name
1833 ! write(cf%mol%atom(i)%res_id, '(I8)') iRes ! use internal read to convert integer -> character
1834 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%ttype = tac(iac(j)) ! ttype and xtype are set by Value_Atom
1835 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%xtype = 'Un' ! cf%mol%atom(i -1)%ttype
1836 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%type2 = 'Un'
1837 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%hb = 'N'
1838 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%valid = 1 ! default
1839 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%origin = 2 ! This is a cf%mol atom
1840 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%part = 1 ! regular atom
1841 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%occupancy = 0.0 ! default
1842 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%solv = 0
1843 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%bfactor = 0
1844 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%logp = 0
1845 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%neib(:) = 0
1846 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%bond(:) = 0
1847 ! cf%mol%atom(i)%root(:) = 0
1848 ! end do
1849 !
1850 ! j = -1
1851 ! do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1852 ! if(protein%atom(i)%residue.eq.restype) then
1853 ! j = j +1
1854 ! cf%mol%atom(j)%temp = i ! save insertion index, this works
1855 ! end if
1856 ! end do
1857 
1858 
1859  ! Extract bond data for this cofactor. Note: covalent bonds to non-cofactor protein atoms are broken (but are restored later)
1860  ! Find all bonds between atoms flagged as cofactor "conumber".
1861  count = 0
1862  do i = 1,nbonds
1863  if(glb_cofactor(bnd(i)%i).eq.conumber.and.glb_cofactor(bnd(i)%j).eq.conumber) then
1864  count = count +1
1865  end if
1866  end do
1867 
1868  cf%mol%num_bond = count
1869  allocate(cf%mol%bond(0:cf%mol%num_bond -1))
1870  count = 0
1871  do i = 1,nbonds
1872  if(glb_cofactor(bnd(i)%i).eq.conumber.and.glb_cofactor(bnd(i)%j).eq.conumber) then
1873  cf%mol%bond(count)%id = count
1874  cf%mol%bond(count)%valid = 1
1875  cf%mol%bond(count)%atom_1 = bnd(i)%i - cf%cofactor_offset
1876  cf%mol%bond(count)%atom_2 = bnd(i)%j - cf%cofactor_offset
1877  cf%mol%bond(count)%ttype = sybyl_bond_type(bonds(i)%cod)
1878  cf%mol%bond(count)%neib(:) = 0
1879  count = count +1
1880  end if
1881  end do
1882 
1883  ! Bubble sort bonds in increasing atom order
1884  do
1885  mark = 0
1886  do i = 0, cf%mol%num_bond -2
1887  if((cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1).and. &
1888  (cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_2.eq.cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) cycle
1889  if(cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_1 < cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1) cycle
1890  if((cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1) .and. &
1891  (cf%mol%bond(i)%atom_2<=cf%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) cycle
1892 
1893  ! If no rule triggered, the bonds are in the wrong order
1894  mark = 1
1895  call bond_swap(cf%mol%bond(i),cf%mol%bond(i+1))
1896  end do
1897  if(mark.eq.0) exit
1898  end do
1899 
1900  ! Reset bond id
1901  do i = 0,cf%mol%num_bond -1
1902  cf%mol%bond(i)%id = i +1
1903  end do
1904 
1905  deallocate(mask)
1906  deallocate(mask_res)
1907 end subroutine xextract_cofactor
1908 
1909 subroutine xscore_calc(iCalc, iFrame) ! calc topmost routine
1910  !arguments
1911  integer, intent(in) :: icalc ! calculation index, not used
1912  integer, intent(in) :: iframe ! frame index
1913  real :: score ! scoring results
1914  integer :: i
1915 
1916  ! Update coordinates
1917  do i = 0,nqat -1
1918  ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor(0) = xin(3*(iqseq(i+1)-1) +1)
1919  ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor(1) = xin(3*(iqseq(i+1)-1) +2)
1920  ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor(2) = xin(3*(iqseq(i+1)-1) +3)
1921  end do
1922 
1923  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
1924  protein%atom(i)%coor(0) = xin(3*(protein%atom(i)%topindex-1) +1)
1925  protein%atom(i)%coor(1) = xin(3*(protein%atom(i)%topindex-1) +2)
1926  protein%atom(i)%coor(2) = xin(3*(protein%atom(i)%topindex-1) +3)
1927  end do
1928 
1929  call ligand_value_atom(ligand,1)
1930  call protein_value_atom(protein, 1,1) ! do lite run
1931  call protein_define_pocket(protein, ff,ligand, 10.0)
1932 
1933  score = ligand_calculate_binding_score(ligand,input,protein)
1934 
1935  call xlog_frame(iframe,ligand)
1936 
1937  if(input%show_abs.eq.'YES') call ligand_scoring_stats(ligand)
1938  if(input%show_abs.eq.'QATOM') call ligand_scoring_stats(ligand,input%qatom-1)
1939 
1940  if(input%show_total.eq.'YES') then
1941  write(*,'(t28,f6.1, t36,f5.2, t43,f5.1, t51,f5.2, t57,f5.1, t65,f4.1, t73,f6.3)') &
1942  ligand%vdw,ligand%hb,ligand%hp,ligand%hm,ligand%hs,ligand%rt, &
1943  ligand%bind_score
1944  endif
1945  if(input%show_abs.eq.'YES') write(*,'(a)') '------------------------------------------------------------------------------'
1946 end subroutine xscore_calc
1947 
1948 subroutine xlog_frame(iFrame,ligand) ! logs scoring results for frame
1949  integer, intent(in) :: iframe ! current frame
1950  type(txligand) :: ligand
1951  type(txscore),pointer :: new_axscore(:) ! tmp pointer
1952 
1953  nxscores = nxscores +1
1954  if(nxscores>maxxscores) then
1955  maxxscores = maxxscores + 16 ! allocate 16 elements a time
1956  allocate(new_axscore(maxxscores)) ! allocate new mem
1957  new_axscore(1:nxscores-1) = xscores(1:nxscores-1) ! copy old
1958 
1959  deallocate(xscores) ! return old mem to OS
1960  xscores => new_axscore ! update pointer
1961  end if
1962 
1963  ! finally store values
1964  xscores(nxscores)%frame = iframe ! iFrame may be redundant
1965  xscores(nxscores)%vdw = ligand%vdw
1966  xscores(nxscores)%hb = ligand%hb
1967  xscores(nxscores)%rt = ligand%rt
1968  xscores(nxscores)%hp = ligand%hp
1969  xscores(nxscores)%hs = ligand%hs
1970  xscores(nxscores)%hm = ligand%hm
1971  xscores(nxscores)%score = ligand%bind_score
1972 end subroutine xlog_frame
1973 
1974 subroutine xscore_mean
1975  real(8) :: vdw,hb,rt,hp,hs,hm,score
1976  integer :: i
1977 
1978  do i = 1,nxscores
1979  vdw = vdw + xscores(i)%vdw
1980  hb = hb + xscores(i)%hb
1981  rt = rt + xscores(i)%rt
1982  hp = hp + xscores(i)%hp
1983  hs = hs + xscores(i)%hs
1984  hm = hm + xscores(i)%hm
1985  score = score + xscores(i)%score
1986  end do
1987 
1988  vdw = vdw / nxscores
1989  hb = hb / nxscores
1990  rt = rt / nxscores
1991  hp = hp / nxscores
1992  hs = hs / nxscores
1993  hm = hm / nxscores
1994  score = score / nxscores
1995 
1996 
1997  ! output mean values
1998  write(*,1) 'processed frames: ', nxscores, 'VDW', 'HB', 'HP', &
1999  'HM', 'HS', 'RT', 'SCORE'
2000 1 format( t1,a, t19,i4, t31,a3, t38,a2, t46,a2, t52,a2, t60,a2, t67,a2, t74,a5)
2001  write(*,'(a, t28,f6.1, t36,f4.1, t43,f5.1, t50,f4.1, t57,f5.1, t65,f4.1, t74,f5.2)') 'mean score', vdw,hb,hp,hm,hs,rt,score
2002 
2003 end subroutine xscore_mean
2004 
2005 subroutine xscore_heading(i)
2006  integer, intent(in) :: i
2007 
2008  write(*,1) 'VDW', 'HB', 'HP', 'HM', 'HS', 'RT', 'SCORE'
2009 1 format( t31,a3, t38,a2, t46,a2, t52,a2, t60,a2, t67,a2, t74,a5)
2010 end subroutine xscore_heading
2011 
2012 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
2013 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
2014 
2015 ! XMOLECULE MODULE
2016 
2017 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
2018 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
2019 
2020 integer function molecule_get_num_heavy_atom(molecule)
2021  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
2022  integer :: i,num
2023 
2024  num = 0
2025  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2026  if(molecule%atom(i)%valid.eq.0) goto 1
2027  if(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 1
2028  num = num +1
2029 1 end do
2030 
2031  molecule_get_num_heavy_atom = num
2032 end function molecule_get_num_heavy_atom
2033 
2034 subroutine molecule_surdot_clear(molecule)
2035  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
2036 
2037  molecule%num_sur_dot = 0
2038  if(associated(molecule%sur_dot)) deallocate(molecule%sur_dot)
2039 end subroutine molecule_surdot_clear
2040 
2041 subroutine molecule_generate_surface_dots(molecule,probe_r)
2042  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
2043  real :: probe_r
2044  integer :: i,j,k,cc
2045  integer :: mark
2046  real :: d,dd,dmin
2047  type(txdotset) :: tmp_set
2048  type(txdot) :: tmp_dot
2049  integer,allocatable :: ligand_check_list(:)
2050 
2051  ! molecule%sur_dot is a vector of type tXDot
2052  call molecule_surdot_clear(molecule)
2053 
2054  allocate(ligand_check_list(0:molecule%num_atom -1),stat=err)
2055  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
2056 
2057  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2058  if(molecule%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
2059  if(molecule%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'H') goto 1
2060 
2061  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2062  if((i.eq.j).or.molecule%atom(j)%valid<=0) then
2063  ligand_check_list(j)=0
2064  goto 2
2065  elseif(molecule%atom(j)%xtype.eq.'H') then
2066  ligand_check_list(j)=0
2067  goto 2
2068  end if
2069 
2070  d=distance(molecule%atom(i)%coor,molecule%atom(j)%coor)
2071 
2072  if(d>(molecule%atom(i)%R+molecule%atom(j)%R+2*probe_r)) then
2073  ligand_check_list(j)=0
2074  else
2075  ligand_check_list(j)=1
2076  end if
2077 2 end do
2078 
2079  if(associated(tmp_set%dot)) tmp_set%dot(:)%valid = 0
2080  tmp_set = forcefield_get_surface_dot(molecule%atom(i),probe_r)
2081 
2082  do j = 0,tmp_set%num_dot -1 ! check whether this dot is on the surface or not
2083  mark=1
2084  dmin=1000.0
2085 
2086  do k = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2087  if(ligand_check_list(k).eq.0) goto 3
2088 
2089  d=distance(tmp_set%dot(j)%coor(0:2),molecule%atom(k)%coor(0:2))
2090  dd=d/(molecule%atom(k)%R+probe_r)-1.00
2091  if(dd<0.000) then
2092  mark=0
2093  exit
2094  elseif(dd<dmin) then
2095  dmin=dd
2096  goto 3
2097  else
2098  goto 3
2099  end if
2100 3 end do
2101 
2102  if(mark.eq.0) then
2103  tmp_set%dot(j)%valid=0
2104  elseif(dmin>=0.10) then
2105  tmp_set%dot(j)%valid=1 ! regular
2106  else
2107  tmp_set%dot(j)%valid=2 ! dots at edge
2108  end if
2109  end do
2110 
2111  ! now record the surface dots of the current atom
2112  cc = 0
2113  do j = 0,tmp_set%num_dot -1
2114  if(tmp_set%dot(j)%valid.eq.0) goto 4
2115 
2116  tmp_dot=tmp_set%dot(j)
2117  tmp_dot%valid=i+1
2118 
2119  if(tmp_set%dot(j)%valid.eq.1) then
2120  tmp_dot%unit=tmp_set%unit
2121  else ! correct the overlapping of edging dots
2122  tmp_dot%unit=tmp_set%unit*0.500
2123  end if
2124 
2125  call dot_pushback(molecule%sur_dot, molecule%num_sur_dot, tmp_dot)
2126  cc = cc +1
2127 4 end do
2128 
2129  deallocate(tmp_set%dot)
2130 1 end do
2131 
2132  deallocate(ligand_check_list)
2133 end subroutine molecule_generate_surface_dots
2134 
2135 subroutine molecule_assign_apparent_charge(molecule)
2136  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
2137  integer :: i
2138 
2139  molecule%charge_type = 'FORMAL_CHARGES'
2140 
2141  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2142  if(molecule%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'O.co2') then
2143  molecule%atom(i)%q=-0.500
2144  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'N.4') then
2145  molecule%atom(i)%q=1.000
2146  else
2147  molecule%atom(i)%q=0.000
2148  end if
2149  end do
2150 
2151  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2152  if(molecule%atom(i)%xtype.ne.'N.pl3.h') goto 1
2153  if(molecule%atom(i)%num_nonh.ne.1) goto 1
2154  if(molecule%atom(molecule%atom(i)%neib(0)-1)%ttype.ne.'C.cat') goto 1
2155  molecule%atom(i)%q=0.500
2156 1 end do
2157 end subroutine molecule_assign_apparent_charge
2158 
2159 subroutine molecule_show_contents(mol)
2160  type(txmolecule) :: mol
2161 
2162  write(*,'(a,a,a)') 'Molecule: ', trim(mol%name)
2163  write(*,'(a,f9.3)') 'MW = ', mol%weight
2164 
2165  write(*,'(a,i5)') 'Number of HB atoms = ', mol%num_hb_atom
2166  write(*,'(a,i5)') 'Number of rotors = ', mol%num_rotor
2167 
2168  write(*,'(a,f6.2)') 'LogP = ', mol%logp
2169 
2170  call molecule_show_atoms(mol)
2171  call molecule_show_bonds(mol)
2172  call molecule_show_rings(mol)
2173 end subroutine molecule_show_contents
2174 
2175 subroutine molecule_show_atoms(mol)
2176  type(txmolecule) :: mol
2177  integer :: i
2178 
2179  write(*,'(a,i5)') 'Total number of atoms in this molecule = ',mol%num_atom
2180  write(*,'(t1,a)') ' ID topoID vld. type xtype type2 res r_id &
2181  &name weight r eps q XR logp solv hb ring origin part &
2182  &#neib #nonh neib[0..6]................. bond[0..6]................ hb root[0..2]'
2183 
2184  write(*,'()')
2185  do i = 0,mol%num_atom -1
2186  write(*,'(i4, 2x, i5, 3x, i1, t20, a, t27, a, t36, a, t42, a, t47, a, t55, a, t59, f5.2, 6(1x,f4.1), &
2187  & 2x, a, t96, 5(4x,i2), 1x, 14(1x,i3), 3(1x,f5.1))'), &
2188 
2189  mol%atom(i)%id, &
2190  mol%atom(i)%topindex, &
2191  mol%atom(i)%valid, &
2192  mol%atom(i)%ttype, &
2193  mol%atom(i)%xtype, &
2194  mol%atom(i)%type2, &
2195  mol%atom(i)%residue, &
2196  adjustl(trim(mol%atom(i)%res_id)), &
2197  mol%atom(i)%name, &
2198  mol%atom(i)%weight, &
2199  mol%atom(i)%r, &
2200  mol%atom(i)%eps, &
2201  mol%atom(i)%q, &
2202  mol%atom(i)%XR, &
2203  mol%atom(i)%logp, &
2204  mol%atom(i)%solv, &
2205  mol%atom(i)%hb, &
2206 ! mol%atom(i)%occupancy,&
2207 ! mol%atom(i)%bfactor,&
2208  mol%atom(i)%ring,&
2209  mol%atom(i)%origin,&
2210  mol%atom(i)%part,&
2211  mol%atom(i)%num_neib,&
2212  mol%atom(i)%num_nonh,&
2213  mol%atom(i)%neib(0),mol%atom(i)%neib(1),&
2214  mol%atom(i)%neib(2),mol%atom(i)%neib(3),&
2215  mol%atom(i)%neib(4),mol%atom(i)%neib(5),&
2216  mol%atom(i)%neib(6), &
2217  mol%atom(i)%bond(0),mol%atom(i)%bond(1),&
2218  mol%atom(i)%bond(2),mol%atom(i)%bond(3),&
2219  mol%atom(i)%bond(4),mol%atom(i)%bond(5),&
2220  mol%atom(i)%bond(6), &
2221  mol%atom(i)%root(0),mol%atom(i)%root(1),mol%atom(i)%root(2)
2222  end do
2223 end subroutine molecule_show_atoms
2224 
2225 subroutine molecule_show_bonds(mol)
2226  type(txmolecule) :: mol
2227  integer :: i
2228 
2229  write(*,'(a,i6)') 'Total number of bonds in this molecule = ',mol%num_bond
2230  write(*,'(a)') ' ID valid atom_1 atom_2 topo_1 topo_2 type ring part num_neib neib[0:5]'
2231 
2232  do i = 0,mol%num_bond -1
2233  write(*,'(i4, 1x, i3, 2x,i4, 3x, i4, 4x, i5, 2x i5, t42 ,a, t46, i2, 1x, i3, 4x, i4, 2x, 6(i5,1x))') &
2234  mol%bond(i)%id, mol%bond(i)%valid, mol%bond(i)%atom_1, mol%bond(i)%atom_2, &
2235  mol%atom(mol%bond(i)%atom_1-1)%topindex, mol%atom(mol%bond(i)%atom_2-1)%topindex, &
2236  mol%bond(i)%ttype, mol%bond(i)%ring, mol%bond(i)%part, mol%bond(i)%num_neib, mol%bond(i)%neib(0), mol%bond(i)%neib(1), &
2237  mol%bond(i)%neib(2), mol%bond(i)%neib(3), mol%bond(i)%neib(4), mol%bond(i)%neib(5)
2238  end do
2239 end subroutine molecule_show_bonds
2240 
2241 subroutine molecule_show_rings(mol)
2242  type(txmolecule) :: mol
2243  integer :: i
2244 
2245  write(*,'(a,i4)') 'Total number of aromatic rings in this molecule = ', size(mol%ring)
2246 
2247  if(size(mol%ring)>0 .and. associated(mol%ring)) then
2248  write(*,'(t1,a)') 'id vld. type size atoms (first-last) centroid'
2249  do i = 0,size(mol%ring) -1
2250 ! write(*,*) i, associated(mol%ring), size(mol%ring)
2251  if(mol%ring(i)%valid.ne.0) then
2252  write(*,'(t1,i3, t6,i1, t10,i1, t15,i2, t23,i5,t29,i5, t43,f5.1,t49,f5.1,t56,f5.1)') &
2253  i+1, mol%ring(i)%valid,mol%ring(i)%ttype,mol%ring(i)%num_member, &
2254  mol%ring(i)%atom_id(0),mol%ring(i)%atom_id(mol%ring(i)%num_member-1), &
2255  mol%ring(i)%centroid(0),mol%ring(i)%centroid(1),mol%ring(i)%centroid(2)
2256  else
2257  write(*,'(t1,i3, t6,a)') i+1, 'invalid'
2258  end if
2259  end do
2260  end if
2261 end subroutine molecule_show_rings
2262 
2263 subroutine molecule_detectconnections(molecule)
2264  type(txmolecule),intent(inout) :: molecule
2265  integer :: i,j,k,mark,tmp1,tmp2,old_part,new_part,id1,id2
2266  integer,allocatable :: part_list(:)
2267 
2268  ! task 1: detect all the fragments and determine num_subst
2269  ! first, detect how many fragments are in the molecule
2270  ! initialize the molecule as the assembly of isolated atoms
2271  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2272  molecule%atom(i)%part=molecule%atom(i)%id
2273  end do
2274 
2275  ! then merge the atoms into fragments
2276  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
2277  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
2278 
2279  tmp1=molecule%bond(i)%atom_1
2280  tmp2=molecule%bond(i)%atom_2
2281 ! write(*,*) tmp1, tmp2, size(molecule%atom)
2282  if(molecule%atom(tmp1-1)%part>=molecule%atom(tmp2-1)%part) then
2283  old_part=molecule%atom(tmp1-1)%part
2284  new_part=molecule%atom(tmp2-1)%part
2285  else
2286  old_part=molecule%atom(tmp2-1)%part
2287  new_part=molecule%atom(tmp1-1)%part
2288  end if
2289 
2290  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2291  if(molecule%atom(j)%part.ne.old_part) then
2292  goto 2
2293  else
2294  molecule%atom(j)%part=new_part
2295  end if
2296 2 end do
2297 1 end do
2298 
2299  ! then count the number of fragments
2300  ! also re-arrange the id of fragments to make them continuous
2301  allocate(part_list(0:molecule%num_atom -1),stat=err)
2302  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
2303 
2304  part_list(:)=0
2305 
2306  molecule%num_subst=0
2307  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2308  mark=0
2309 
2310  do j = 0,molecule%num_subst -1
2311  if(molecule%atom(i)%part.ne.part_list(j)) then
2312  goto 3
2313  else
2314  mark=1
2315  exit
2316  end if
2317 3 end do
2318 
2319  if(mark==1) then
2320  molecule%atom(i)%part=j+1 ! an existing fragment
2321  else ! a new fragment
2322  part_list(molecule%num_subst)=molecule%atom(i)%part
2323  molecule%num_subst = molecule%num_subst +1
2324  molecule%atom(i)%part=molecule%num_subst ! 1,2,3 ...
2325  end if
2326  end do
2327 
2328  deallocate(part_list)
2329 
2330  ! also define all the bonds
2331  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
2332  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid<=0) then
2333  molecule%bond(i)%part=0
2334  else
2335  molecule%bond(i)%part=molecule%atom(molecule%bond(i)%atom_1-1)%part
2336  end if
2337  end do
2338 
2339  ! task 2: set up the connection tables for atoms and bonds
2340  ! assign atomic weight to atoms, which is necessary to rank
2341  ! the neighboring atoms for a central atom
2342  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2343  if(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'F') then
2344  molecule%atom(i)%weight=19.00
2345  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'Cl') then
2346  molecule%atom(i)%weight=35.45
2347  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'Br') then
2348  molecule%atom(i)%weight=79.90
2349  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'I') then
2350  molecule%atom(i)%weight=126.90
2351  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'Si') then
2352  molecule%atom(i)%weight=28.09
2353  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'C') then
2354  molecule%atom(i)%weight=12.01
2355  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'H') then
2356  molecule%atom(i)%weight=1.00
2357  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
2358  molecule%atom(i)%weight=14.01
2359  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
2360  molecule%atom(i)%weight=16.00
2361  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') then
2362  molecule%atom(i)%weight=30.97
2363  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') then
2364  molecule%atom(i)%weight=32.06
2365  else
2366  molecule%atom(i)%weight=0.00
2367  end if
2368  end do
2369 
2370  ! now detect the neighboring atoms for each atom
2371  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2372  molecule%atom(i)%num_neib=0
2373  molecule%atom(i)%num_nonh=0
2374  end do
2375  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
2376  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid<=0) goto 4
2377  id1=molecule%bond(i)%atom_1
2378  id2=molecule%bond(i)%atom_2
2379  tmp1=molecule%atom(id1-1)%num_neib
2380  if(tmp1<max_atom_neib) then
2381  molecule%atom(id1-1)%neib(tmp1)=id2
2382  molecule%atom(id1-1)%bond(tmp1)=i+1
2383  molecule%atom(id1-1)%num_neib = molecule%atom(id1-1)%num_neib +1
2384  end if
2385 
2386  tmp2=molecule%atom(id2-1)%num_neib
2387 
2388  if(tmp2<max_atom_neib) then
2389  molecule%atom(id2-1)%neib(tmp2)=id1
2390  molecule%atom(id2-1)%bond(tmp2)=i+1
2391  molecule%atom(id2-1)%num_neib = molecule%atom(id2-1)%num_neib +1
2392  end if
2393 4 end do
2394 
2395  ! now arrange the neighboring atoms in a decreasing order
2396  ! according to atomic weights bonds are also re-arranged
2397  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2398  if(molecule%atom(i)%valid==0) then
2399  goto 5
2400  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%num_neib<=1) then
2401  goto 5
2402  end if
2403 
2404  do j = 0,molecule%atom(i)%num_neib-1 -1
2405  do k=j+1,molecule%atom(i)%num_neib -1
2406  tmp1=molecule%atom(i)%neib(j)
2407  tmp2=molecule%atom(i)%neib(k)
2408  if(molecule%atom(tmp1-1)%weight>=molecule%atom(tmp2-1)%weight) then
2409  goto 6
2410  else
2411  mark=molecule%atom(i)%neib(j)
2412  molecule%atom(i)%neib(j)=molecule%atom(i)%neib(k)
2413  molecule%atom(i)%neib(k)=mark
2414  mark=molecule%atom(i)%bond(j)
2415  molecule%atom(i)%bond(j)=molecule%atom(i)%bond(k)
2416  molecule%atom(i)%bond(k)=mark
2417  end if
2418 6 end do
2419  end do
2420 5 end do
2421  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2422  do j = 0,molecule%atom(i)%num_neib -1
2423  if(molecule%atom(molecule%atom(i)%neib(j)-1)%ttype(1:1)=='H') then
2424  goto 7
2425  else
2426  molecule%atom(i)%num_nonh = molecule%atom(i)%num_nonh +1
2427  end if
2428 7 end do
2429  end do
2430 
2431  ! now detect the neighboring bonds
2432  molecule%bond(:)%num_neib=0
2433  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond-1
2434  molecule%bond(i)%neib(:)=0
2435  end do
2436 
2437  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond-1 -1
2438  do j=i+1,molecule%num_bond -1
2439  if((molecule%bond(i)%valid<=0).or.(molecule%bond(j)%valid<=0)) goto 8
2440 
2441  if(molecule_two_bonds_connection_check(molecule%bond(i),molecule%bond(j)).ne.0) then
2442  tmp1=molecule%bond(i)%num_neib
2443  if(tmp1<max_bond_neib) then
2444  molecule%bond(i)%neib(tmp1)=molecule%bond(j)%id
2445  molecule%bond(i)%num_neib = molecule%bond(i)%num_neib +1
2446  end if
2447 
2448  tmp2=molecule%bond(j)%num_neib
2449  if(tmp2<max_bond_neib) then
2450  molecule%bond(j)%neib(tmp2)=molecule%bond(i)%id
2451  molecule%bond(j)%num_neib = molecule%bond(j)%num_neib +1
2452  end if
2453  else
2454  goto 8
2455  end if
2456 8 end do
2457  end do
2458 end subroutine molecule_detectconnections
2459 
2460 integer function molecule_two_bonds_connection_check(bond1, bond2)
2461  ! this function returns the ID of the joint atom
2462  type(txbond) :: bond1, bond2
2463  integer :: id
2464 
2465  id=bond1%atom_1
2466 
2467  if(id.eq.bond2%atom_1) then
2468  molecule_two_bonds_connection_check = id
2469  return
2470  elseif(id.eq.bond2%atom_2) then
2471  molecule_two_bonds_connection_check = id
2472  return
2473  end if
2474 
2475  id=bond1%atom_2
2476 
2477  if(id==bond2%atom_1) then
2478  molecule_two_bonds_connection_check = id
2479  return
2480  elseif(id==bond2%atom_2) then
2481  molecule_two_bonds_connection_check = id
2482  return
2483  end if
2484 
2485  molecule_two_bonds_connection_check = 0 ! two bonds are not connected
2486 end function molecule_two_bonds_connection_check
2487 
2488 integer function molecule_valueatom(molecule,lite_run)
2489  type(txmolecule),intent(inout) :: molecule
2490  integer, optional :: lite_run
2491  integer :: i
2492  integer :: mark,success
2493  character(len=20) :: xtype
2494 
2495  success = 1
2496  call molecule_detectconnections(molecule)
2497 
2498  ! check if this molecule is valid or not
2499  !success = Molecule_CheckAtomType(molecule)
2500  success = 1
2501 
2502  ! now detect the ring systems in this molecule
2503  call molecule_detect_rings(molecule)
2504  call molecule_detect_aromatic_rings(molecule)
2505 
2506  ! now assign XTOOL atom type and corresponding parameters
2507  do i=0,molecule%num_atom-1
2508  mark = molecule_get_xtool_type(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,xtype)
2509 
2510  if(mark.eq.1) then
2511  molecule%atom(i)%xtype = xtype
2512  molecule%atom(i)%valid=1
2513  else
2514  molecule%atom(i)%xtype = xtype
2515  molecule%atom(i)%valid=0
2516  success=0
2517  end if
2518  end do
2519  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom-1
2520  if(molecule%atom(i)%valid<=0) then
2521  goto 1
2522  end if
2523 
2524  mark = forcefield_assign_atom_parameters(molecule%atom(i))
2525 
2526  if(mark==0) then
2527  molecule%atom(i)%valid=0
2528  success=0
2529  else
2530  goto 1
2531  end if
2532 1 end do
2533 
2534  molecule%weight = 0
2535  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
2536  molecule%weight = molecule%weight + molecule%atom(i)%weight
2537  end do
2538 
2539  ! now return value
2540  if(success==1) then
2541  molecule_valueatom = 1
2542  else
2543  molecule_valueatom = 0
2544  end if
2545 end function molecule_valueatom
2546 
2547 integer function molecule_get_xtool_type(molecule,atom_id, xtype)
2548  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
2549  integer :: atom_id
2550  character(len=20) :: xtype
2551  type(txgroup) :: group
2552  type(txatom) :: atom
2553 
2554  atom = molecule%atom(atom_id-1) ! check this
2555  group = molecule_find_a_group(molecule,atom%id)
2556 
2557  xtype = 'Un'
2558 
2559  if((atom%ttype.eq.'H').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'H.spc')) then
2560  if(group%neib(0)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
2561  xtype = 'H.hb'
2562  elseif(group%neib(0)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
2563  xtype = 'H.hb'
2564  else
2565  xtype = 'H'
2566  end if
2567  end if
2568  if((atom%ttype.eq.'C.3')) then
2569  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
2570  xtype = 'C.3'
2571  elseif(group%num_hetero>0) then
2572  xtype = 'C.3.x'
2573  else
2574  xtype = 'C.3.un'
2575  end if
2576  end if
2577  if((atom%ttype.eq.'C.2').and.(atom%ring.ne.2)) then
2578  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
2579  xtype = 'C.2'
2580  elseif(group%num_hetero>0) then
2581  xtype = 'C.2.x'
2582  else
2583  xtype = 'C.2.un'
2584  end if
2585  end if
2586 
2587  if((atom%ttype.eq.'C.ar').or.((atom%ttype.eq.'C.2').and.atom%ring.eq.2)) then
2588  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
2589  xtype = 'C.ar'
2590  elseif(group%num_hetero>0) then
2591  xtype = 'C.ar.x'
2592  else
2593  xtype = 'C.ar.un'
2594  end if
2595  end if
2596 
2597  if((atom%ttype.eq.'C.1')) then
2598  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
2599  xtype = 'C.1'
2600  elseif(group%num_hetero>0) then
2601  xtype = 'C.1.x'
2602  else
2603  xtype = 'C.1.un'
2604  end if
2605  end if
2606 
2607  if((atom%ttype.eq.'C.cat')) xtype = 'C.cat'
2608 
2609  if((atom%ttype.eq.'N.4').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'N.3')) then
2610  if(group%num_nonh<=2) then
2611  xtype = 'N.4'
2612  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
2613  xtype = 'N.3'
2614  else
2615  xtype = 'N.3.un'
2616  end if
2617  end if
2618 
2619  if(((atom%ttype.eq.'N.am').and.atom%ring.ne.2).or.((atom%ttype.eq.'N.pl3').and.atom%ring.ne.2)) then
2620  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
2621  xtype = 'N.pl3.h'
2622  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
2623  xtype = 'N.pl3.h'
2624  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
2625  xtype = 'N.pl3'
2626  else
2627  xtype = 'N.pl3.un'
2628  end if
2629  end if
2630 
2631  if((atom%ttype.eq.'N.2').and.atom%ring.ne.2) then
2632  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
2633  xtype = 'N.2.h'
2634  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
2635  xtype = 'N.2'
2636  else
2637  xtype = 'N.2.un'
2638  end if
2639  end if
2640  if((atom%ttype.eq.'N.ar').or.((atom%ttype.eq.'N.2').and.atom%ring.eq.2).or. &
2641  ((atom%ttype.eq.'N.pl3').and.atom%ring.eq.2).or.((atom%ttype.eq.'N.am').and.atom%ring.eq.2)) then
2642  if(group%num_h.eq.1) then
2643  xtype = 'N.ar.h'
2644  elseif(group%num_h.eq.0) then
2645  xtype = 'N.ar'
2646  else
2647  xtype = 'N.ar.un'
2648  end if
2649  end if
2650 
2651  if((atom%ttype.eq.'N.1')) then
2652  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
2653  xtype = 'N.1'
2654  else
2655  xtype = 'N.1.un'
2656  end if
2657  end if
2658 
2659  if((atom%ttype.eq.'O.3')) then
2660  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
2661  xtype = 'O.3.h'
2662  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
2663  xtype = 'O.3'
2664  else
2665  xtype = 'O.3.un'
2666  end if
2667  end if
2668 
2669  if((atom%ttype.eq.'O.2')) xtype = 'O.2'
2670  if((atom%ttype.eq.'O.co2')) xtype = 'O.co2'
2671 
2672  if((atom%ttype.eq.'S.3')) then
2673  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
2674  xtype = 'S.3.h'
2675  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
2676  xtype = 'S.3'
2677  else
2678  xtype = 'S.3.un'
2679  end if
2680  end if
2681 
2682  if((atom%ttype.eq.'S.2')) xtype = 'S.2'
2683  if((atom%ttype.eq.'S.o')) xtype = 'S.o'
2684  if((atom%ttype.eq.'S.o2')) xtype = 'S.o'
2685  if((atom%ttype.eq.'P.3')) xtype = 'P.3'
2686  if((atom%ttype.eq.'F')) xtype = 'F'
