2687  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Cl')) xtype = 'Cl'
2688  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Br')) xtype = 'Br'
2689  if((atom%ttype.eq.'I')) xtype = 'I'
2690  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Si')) xtype = 'Si'
2691 
2692  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Na')) xtype = 'M+'
2693 
2694  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Na')) xtype = 'M+'
2695  if((atom%ttype.eq.'K')) xtype = 'M+'
2696  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Ca')) xtype = 'M+'
2697  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Li')) xtype = 'M+'
2698  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Al')) xtype = 'M+'
2699  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Fe')) xtype = 'M+'
2700 
2701  if((atom%ttype.eq.'Un')) then
2702  molecule_get_xtool_type = 0
2703  else
2704  molecule_get_xtool_type = 1
2705  end if
2706 end function molecule_get_xtool_type
2707 
2708 type(txgroup) function molecule_find_a_group(molecule,atom_id)
2709  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
2710  integer :: atom_id
2711  integer :: i,j,id,num
2712  integer :: mark
2713  type(txgroup) :: group
2714 
2715  ! define the center
2716  group%center = molecule%atom(atom_id-1)
2717 
2718  ! find the center's neighbours
2719  num=group%center%num_neib
2720 
2721  do i = 0,num -1
2722  group%neib(i)=molecule%atom(group%center%neib(i)-1)
2723  group%bond(i)=molecule%bond(group%center%bond(i)-1)
2724  end do
2725 
2726  ! count the necessary parameters
2727  group%num_neib=group%center%num_neib
2728  group%num_h=0
2729  group%num_nonh=0
2730 
2731  do i = 0,num -1
2732  if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'H') then
2733  group%num_h = group%num_h +1
2734  else
2735  group%num_nonh = group%num_nonh +1
2736  end if
2737  end do
2738 
2739  group%num_hetero=0
2740 
2741  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
2742  if(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'F') then
2743  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2744  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'Cl') then
2745  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2746  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'Br') then
2747  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2748  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'I') then
2749  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2750  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'Si') then
2751  goto 1
2752  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
2753  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2754  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
2755  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2756  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') then
2757  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2758  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') then
2759  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
2760  else
2761  goto 1
2762  end if
2763 1 end do
2764 
2765  group%db_type=0
2766  group%num_db=0
2767  group%num_tb=0
2768 
2769  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
2770  if(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'2') then
2771  group%num_db = group%num_db +1
2772  if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'C') then
2773  group%db_type=1
2774  else if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
2775  group%db_type=2
2776  else if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
2777  group%db_type=3
2778  else if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') then
2779  group%db_type=4
2780  else if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') then
2781  group%db_type=5
2782  else
2783  goto 2
2784  end if
2785  elseif((group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'1').and.(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'O.co2.')) then
2786  group%db_type=3
2787  group%num_db = group%num_db +1
2788  elseif((group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'ar').and.(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'O.co2')) then
2789  group%db_type=3
2790  group%num_db = group%num_db +1
2791  elseif(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'3') then
2792  group%num_tb = group%num_tb +1
2793  else
2794  goto 2
2795  end if
2796 2 end do
2797 
2798  group%num_pi=0
2799 
2800  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
2801  if(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'2') then
2802  goto 3
2803  elseif(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'3') then
2804  goto 3
2805  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.ar') then
2806  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
2807  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.2') then
2808  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
2809  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.1') then
2810  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
2811  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.cat') then
2812  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
2813  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'N.2') then
2814  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
2815  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'N.1') then
2816  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
2817  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'N.ar') then
2818  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
2819  else
2820  goto 3
2821  end if
2822 3 end do
2823 
2824  ! check if the central atom is adjacent to any -SO-, -PO-, or -CO-
2825  mark=0
2826  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
2827  if((group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'P.3').or.(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'S.o').or. &
2828  (group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'S.o2').or.(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.2')) then
2829 
2830  num=group%neib(i)%num_nonh
2831 
2832  do j = 0,num -1
2833  id=molecule%atom(group%neib(i)%id-1)%neib(j)
2834  if(id.eq.group%center%id) then
2835  goto 4
2836  elseif(molecule%atom(id-1)%ttype.eq.'O.2') then
2837  mark=1
2838  exit
2839  elseif(molecule%atom(id-1)%ttype.eq.'O.co2') then
2840  mark=1
2841  exit
2842  else
2843  goto 4
2844  end if
2845 4 end do
2846 
2847  if(mark.eq.1) then
2848  exit
2849  else
2850  goto 5
2851  end if
2852  else
2853  goto 5
2854  end if
2855 5 end do
2856 
2857  if(mark.eq.0) then
2858  group%amide=0
2859  else
2860  group%amide=j+1 ! assign the value of the amide bond
2861  end if
2862 
2863  group%valid=1
2864  molecule_find_a_group = group
2865 
2866 end function molecule_find_a_group
2867 
2868 subroutine molecule_detect_aromatic_rings(molecule)
2869  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
2870  integer :: i,j ,slask
2871  type(txring) :: tmp_ring
2872  integer,pointer :: atom_path(:)
2873  integer,pointer:: bond_path(:)
2874 
2875  allocate(atom_path(0:6),stat=err)
2876  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
2877  allocate(bond_path(0:6),stat=err)
2878  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
2879 
2880  allocate(tmp_ring%atom_id(0:6),stat=err)
2881  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
2882  allocate(tmp_ring%bond_id(0:6),stat=err)
2883  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
2884 
2885  ! Clear old ring data
2886  if(molecule%num_ring>0) then !if(associated(molecule%ring)) then
2887  do i = 0,size(molecule%ring) -1
2888  call ring_clear(molecule%ring(i))
2889  end do
2890  deallocate(molecule%ring)
2891  end if
2892  if(associated(molecule%ring)) deallocate(molecule%ring)
2893  molecule%ring_count = 0
2894  molecule%num_ring = 0
2895 
2896 ! check all the 6-membered rings first
2897  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
2898  if(molecule%bond(i)%ring.eq.1) then
2899  atom_path(:) = 0
2900  bond_path(:) = 0
2901 
2902  if(molecule_look_for_a_ring(molecule, molecule%bond(i)%id,atom_path,bond_path,6).eq.0) goto 1
2903  if(molecule_aromatic_ring_check_6(molecule,atom_path,bond_path).eq.0) goto 1
2904 
2905  call ring_clear(tmp_ring)
2906 
2907  do j = 0,6 -1
2908  molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%ring=2
2909  molecule%bond(bond_path(j)-1)%ring=2
2910 
2911  !tmp_ring.atom_id.push_back(atom_path(j))
2912  call int_pushback(tmp_ring%atom_id,atom_path(j))
2913 
2914  !tmp_ring.bond_id.push_back(bond_path(j))
2915  call int_pushback(tmp_ring%bond_id,bond_path(j))
2916 
2917  tmp_ring%centroid(0)=tmp_ring%centroid(0)+molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%coor(0)
2918  tmp_ring%centroid(1)=tmp_ring%centroid(1)+molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%coor(1)
2919  tmp_ring%centroid(2)=tmp_ring%centroid(2)+molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%coor(2)
2920  end do
2921 
2922  tmp_ring%num_member=size(tmp_ring%atom_id)
2923 
2924  if(tmp_ring%num_member>0) then
2925  tmp_ring%centroid(0)=tmp_ring%centroid(0)/tmp_ring%num_member
2926  tmp_ring%centroid(1)=tmp_ring%centroid(0)/tmp_ring%num_member
2927  tmp_ring%centroid(2)=tmp_ring%centroid(0)/tmp_ring%num_member
2928 
2929  tmp_ring%valid=1
2930  tmp_ring%ttype=2
2931 
2932  Call molecule_add_ring(molecule, tmp_ring)
2933  molecule%ring_count = molecule%ring_count +1
2934  end if
2935  end if
2936 1 end do
2937 
2938  ! then check all the 5-membered rings
2939  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
2940  if(molecule%bond(i)%ring.ne.1) goto 2
2941 
2942  atom_path(:)=0
2943  bond_path(:)=0
2944 
2945  if(molecule_look_for_a_ring(molecule,molecule%bond(i)%id,atom_path,bond_path,5).eq.0) goto 2
2946  if(molecule_aromatic_ring_check_5(molecule,atom_path,bond_path).eq.0) goto 2
2947 
2948  call ring_clear(tmp_ring)
2949 
2950  do j = 0,5 -1
2951  molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%ring=2
2952  molecule%bond(bond_path(j)-1)%ring=2
2953 
2954  !tmp_ring%atom_id%push_back(atom_path(j))
2955  call int_pushback(tmp_ring%atom_id,atom_path(j))
2956 
2957  !tmp_ring%bond_id%push_back(bond_path(j))
2958  call int_pushback(tmp_ring%bond_id,bond_path(j))
2959 
2960  tmp_ring%centroid(0)=tmp_ring%centroid(0)+molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%coor(0)
2961  tmp_ring%centroid(1)=tmp_ring%centroid(1)+molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%coor(1)
2962  tmp_ring%centroid(2)=tmp_ring%centroid(2)+molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%coor(2)
2963  end do
2964 
2965  tmp_ring%num_member=size(tmp_ring%atom_id)
2966 
2967  if(tmp_ring%num_member>0) then
2968  tmp_ring%centroid(0)=tmp_ring%centroid(0)/tmp_ring%num_member
2969  tmp_ring%centroid(1)=tmp_ring%centroid(1)/tmp_ring%num_member
2970  tmp_ring%centroid(2)=tmp_ring%centroid(2)/tmp_ring%num_member
2971 
2972  tmp_ring%valid=1
2973  tmp_ring%ttype=2
2974 
2975  Call molecule_add_ring(molecule, tmp_ring)
2976  molecule%ring_count = molecule%ring_count +1
2977  end if
2978 2 end do
2979 
2980  !this->num_ring=this->ring%size()
2981  molecule%num_ring=size(molecule%ring)
2982 
2983  deallocate(atom_path)
2984  deallocate(bond_path)
2985 
2986  call ring_clear(tmp_ring)
2987 end subroutine molecule_detect_aromatic_rings
2988 
2989 subroutine molecule_add_ring(m,r)
2990  type(txmolecule) :: m
2991  type(txring) :: r
2992  integer :: i
2993  type(txring),pointer :: tmp(:)
2994 
2995  if(.not. associated(m%ring)) then
2996  ! Adding first ring to molecule, need to init pointer
2997  allocate(m%ring(0:0),stat=err)
2998  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
2999 
3000  Call ring_copy(m%ring(0),r)
3001  else
3002  ! Adding a second (or more) ring to molecule
3003 
3004  i = size(m%ring)
3005 
3006  ! Increase size of ring-array
3007  allocate(tmp(0:i-1),stat=err)
3008  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
3009  do i = 0,i -1
3010  call ring_copy(tmp(i),m%ring(i))
3011  end do
3012 
3013  deallocate(m%ring)
3014  allocate(m%ring(0:i),stat=err)
3015  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
3016  do i = 0, i-1
3017  call ring_copy(m%ring(i),tmp(i))
3018  call ring_clear(tmp(i))
3019  end do
3020 
3021  deallocate(tmp)
3022 
3023  ! Add ring
3024  call ring_copy(m%ring(i), r)
3025  end if
3026 end subroutine molecule_add_ring
3027 
3028 integer function molecule_aromatic_ring_check_6(molecule,atom_path,bond_path)
3029  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3030  integer,pointer :: atom_path(:)
3031  integer,pointer :: bond_path(:)
3032  integer :: i,count
3033  integer :: mark,mark1,mark2
3034 
3035  ! check the number of pi electrons
3036 
3037  mark=1
3038  count=0
3039 
3040  do i = 0,6 -1
3041  if(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'C.ar') then
3042  count = count +1
3043  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'N.ar') then
3044  count = count +1
3045  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'C.2') then
3046  count = count +1
3047  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'N.2') then
3048  count = count +1
3049  else
3050  mark=0
3051  exit
3052  end if
3053  end do
3054 
3055  if((mark.eq.0).or.(count.ne.6)) then
3056  molecule_aromatic_ring_check_6 = 0
3057  return
3058  end if
3059 
3060  ! check if there are two continuous single bonds on the path
3061  ! this algorithm is superior to check -=-=-=
3062  mark=0
3063  do i = 0,5 -1
3064  if((molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'1').or.(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'am')) then
3065  mark1=1
3066  else
3067  mark1=0
3068  end if
3069  if((molecule%bond(bond_path(i+1)-1)%ttype.eq.'1').or.(molecule%bond(bond_path(i+1)-1)%ttype.eq.'am')) then
3070  mark2=1
3071  else
3072  mark2=0
3073  end if
3074  if(mark1.ne.0.and.mark2.ne.0) then
3075  mark=1
3076  exit
3077  else
3078  goto 1
3079  end if
3080 1 end do
3081  if(mark.ne.0) then
3082  molecule_aromatic_ring_check_6 = 0
3083  else
3084  molecule_aromatic_ring_check_6 = 1
3085  end if
3086 end function molecule_aromatic_ring_check_6
3087 
3088 integer function molecule_aromatic_ring_check_5(molecule,atom_path, bond_path)
3089  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3090  integer :: atom_path(0:6)
3091  integer :: bond_path(0:6)
3092  integer :: i,count
3093  integer :: mark,mark1,mark2
3094  integer :: pi_path(0:4)
3095 
3096  ! check the number of pi electrons
3097  mark=1
3098  count=0
3099 
3100  do i = 0,5 -1
3101  if(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'C.ar') then
3102  count = count +1
3103  pi_path(i)=1
3104  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'N.ar') then
3105  count = count +1
3106  pi_path(i)=1
3107  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'C.2') then
3108  count = count +1
3109  pi_path(i)=1
3110  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'N.2') then
3111  count = count +1
3112  pi_path(i)=1
3113  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'N.pl3') then
3114  count = count +2
3115  pi_path(i)=2
3116  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'N.am') then
3117  count = count +2
3118  pi_path(i)=2
3119  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'O.3') then
3120  count = count +2
3121  pi_path(i)=2
3122  elseif(molecule%atom(atom_path(i)-1)%ttype.eq.'S.3') then
3123  count = count +2
3124  pi_path(i)=2
3125  else
3126  mark=0
3127  exit
3128  end if
3129  end do
3130 
3131  if((mark.eq.0).or.(count.ne.6)) then
3132  molecule_aromatic_ring_check_5 = 0
3133  return
3134  end if
3135 
3136  ! check if there are two continuous single bonds on the path
3137  ! but it is okay if these two single bonds explain the special atom
3138  mark=0
3139  do i = 0,4 -1
3140 ! write(*,*) i, pi_path(i), ' ', adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype)),' ',adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype))
3141  if((adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype)).eq.'1') &
3142  .or.(adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype)).eq.'am')) then
3143  mark1=1
3144  else
3145  mark1=0
3146  end if
3147 
3148 ! write(*,*) i+1, pi_path(i+1),' ',adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i+1)-1)%ttype)),' ',adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i+1)-1)%ttype))
3149  if((adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i+1)-1)%ttype)).eq.'1') &
3150  .or.(adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i+1)-1)%ttype)).eq.'am')) then
3151  mark2=1
3152  else
3153  mark2=0
3154  end if
3155 
3156 ! write(*,*) 'mark1, mark2, pi_path = ', mark1, mark2, pi_path(i)
3157 
3158  if((mark1.ne.1).or.(mark2.ne.1)) then
3159  goto 1
3160  elseif(pi_path(i+1).eq.2) then
3161  goto 1
3162  else
3163 ! write(*,*) 'not good: ', i, ' ',adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype)),' ',adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype))
3164 ! write(*,*) 'not good: ', i, ' ',adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype)),' ',adjustl(trim(molecule%bond(bond_path(i)-1)%ttype))
3165  mark=1
3166  exit
3167  end if
3168 1 end do
3169 
3170  if(mark.eq.1) then
3171  molecule_aromatic_ring_check_5 = 0
3172  else
3173  molecule_aromatic_ring_check_5 = 1
3174 ! write(*,*) 'success'
3175  end if
3176 end function molecule_aromatic_ring_check_5
3177 
3178 subroutine molecule_detect_rings(molecule)
3179 ! find the ring systems in the given molecule
3180 ! define all the atoms in a ring as atom%ring=1, otherwise atom%ring=0
3181  type(txmolecule),intent(inout) :: molecule
3182  integer :: i,j,mark,count
3183  integer,pointer :: atom_path(:)
3184  integer,pointer :: bond_path(:)
3185 
3186  ! first of all, check whether there is any ring in the molecule
3187  if((molecule%num_bond-molecule%num_atom+molecule%num_subst).eq.0) then
3188  molecule%atom(:)%ring=0
3189  molecule%bond(:)%ring=0
3190  return
3191  end if
3192 
3193  ! detect terminal atoms
3194  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3195  if(molecule%atom(i)%num_neib<=1) then
3196  molecule%atom(i)%ring=0
3197  else
3198  molecule%atom(i)%ring=-1 ! still ambiguous here
3199  end if
3200  end do
3201 
3202  ! collapse the structure to eliminate branches
3203  do
3204  mark=0
3205  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3206  if(molecule%atom(i)%ring.ne.-1) goto 11
3207 
3208  count=0 ! count possible ring neighbors
3209  do j = 0,molecule%atom(i)%num_neib -1
3210  if(molecule%atom(molecule%atom(i)%neib(j)-1)%ring.eq.0) then
3211  goto 1
3212  else
3213  count = count +1
3214  end if
3215 1 end do
3216 
3217  if(count<=1) then
3218  molecule%atom(i)%ring=0
3219  mark = mark +1
3220  end if
3221 11 end do
3222  if(mark.eq.0) exit
3223  end do
3224 
3225  ! detect branching bonds
3226  mark=0
3227  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3228  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid<=0) then
3229  goto 2
3230  elseif(molecule%atom(molecule%bond(i)%atom_1-1)%ring.eq.0) then
3231  molecule%bond(i)%ring=0
3232  elseif(molecule%atom(molecule%bond(i)%atom_2-1)%ring.eq.0) then
3233  molecule%bond(i)%ring=0
3234  else
3235  molecule%bond(i)%ring=-1
3236  mark = mark +1 ! ambiguous
3237  end if
3238 2 end do
3239 
3240  if(mark.eq.0) return ! finished, no ring detected
3241 
3242  ! now comes the ring perception algorithm
3243  allocate(atom_path(0:molecule%num_bond),stat=err)
3244  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
3245  allocate(bond_path(0:molecule%num_bond),stat=err)
3246  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
3247 
3248  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3249  if(molecule%bond(i)%ring.ne.-1) goto 3
3250  atom_path(:) = 0
3251  bond_path(:) = 0
3252 
3253  ! =============================== CHECK LAST ARGUMENT
3254  count = molecule_look_for_a_ring(molecule, molecule%bond(i)%id,atom_path,bond_path,0)
3255 
3256  if(count.eq.0) then
3257  molecule%bond(i)%ring=0
3258  goto 3
3259  end if
3260 
3261  do j = 0,count -1
3262  molecule%bond(bond_path(j)-1)%ring=1
3263  molecule%atom(atom_path(j)-1)%ring=1
3264  end do
3265 3 end do
3266 
3267  ! define all the left atoms which are not in ring
3268  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3269  if(molecule%atom(i)%ring.ne.-1) then
3270  goto 4
3271  else
3272  molecule%atom(i)%ring=0
3273  end if
3274 
3275  if(associated(atom_path)) deallocate(atom_path)
3276  if(associated(bond_path)) deallocate(bond_path)
3277 4 end do
3278 end subroutine molecule_detect_rings
3279 
3280 integer function molecule_look_for_a_ring(molecule, bond_id, atom_path, bond_path, required_size)
3281 ! this is a bond-based algorithm to detect rings in a molecule%
3282 ! it returns the size of the ring (if zero, the given bond is not in a ring)
3283 ! also the corresponding atom path and bond path
3284  type(txmolecule),intent(inout) :: molecule
3285  integer :: bond_id
3286  integer,pointer :: atom_path(:)
3287  integer,pointer :: bond_path(:)
3288  integer :: required_size
3289 
3290  integer :: i,ring_size=0
3291  integer :: p,next
3292  integer,allocatable :: choice(:,:)
3293 
3294  ! initialize the variables first
3295  allocate(choice(0:molecule%num_bond-1,0:max_bond_neib-1),stat=err)
3296  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
3297  choice(:,:) = 0
3298 
3299  ! note that atom_path() and bond_path() is not cleaned here
3300  ! they are supposed to be cleaned at the upper level
3301  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3302  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
3303  call molecule_reset_choices(molecule,molecule%bond(i)%id,choice(i,:))
3304 1 end do
3305 
3306  ! put the given bond at the beginning of the searching chain
3307  p=0
3308  bond_path(0)=bond_id
3309  atom_path(0)=molecule%bond(bond_id-1)%atom_1 ! bond_id -1
3310 
3311  do
3312  ! search the next possible step
3313  do
3314  next = molecule_get_choices(molecule, choice(bond_path(p)-1,:),atom_path(p),p+1,bond_path)
3315  if(next.eq.0) then ! next step is not available
3316  if(p.eq.0) then ! the given bond is not in a ring%
3317  ring_size=0
3318  goto 10
3319  end if
3320 
3321  ! trace back to the previous step
3322  call molecule_reset_choices(molecule,bond_path(p),choice(bond_path(p)-1,:))
3323  bond_path(p)=0
3324  atom_path(p)=0
3325  p = p -1
3326  goto 2
3327  else
3328  exit
3329  end if
3330 2 end do
3331 
3332  ! define the next step
3333 
3334  p = p +1
3335  bond_path(p)=next
3336  atom_path(p)=molecule_two_bonds_connection_check(molecule%bond(bond_path(p-1)-1), molecule%bond(bond_path(p)-1))
3337 
3338  ! record the searching history, prevent repeating
3339  call molecule_clean_choices(molecule,bond_path(p),choice(bond_path(p-1)-1,:))
3340 
3341  ! now check if a ring has formed
3342  if(molecule_two_bonds_connection_check(molecule%bond(bond_path(0)-1),molecule%bond(bond_path(p)-1)).eq.atom_path(0)) then
3343  if(required_size<=0) then ! a ring is found
3344  ring_size=p+1
3345  goto 10
3346  elseif((p+1).eq.required_size) then ! a ring with required size
3347  ring_size=p+1
3348  goto 10
3349  else ! pre-mature ring, trace back
3350  call molecule_reset_choices(molecule,bond_path(p), choice(bond_path(p)-1,:))
3351  bond_path(p)=0
3352  atom_path(p)=0
3353  p = p -1
3354  goto 3
3355  end if
3356  else ! no ring is formed at this step
3357  if(required_size<=0) then
3358  goto 3
3359  elseif((p+1).eq.required_size) then ! no ring on this path, trace back
3360  call molecule_reset_choices(molecule,bond_path(p), choice(bond_path(p)-1,:))
3361  bond_path(p)=0
3362  atom_path(p)=0
3363  p = p -1
3364  goto 3
3365  else
3366  goto 3
3367  end if
3368  end if
3369 3 end do
3370 
3371 10 deallocate(choice)
3372  molecule_look_for_a_ring = ring_size
3373 end function molecule_look_for_a_ring
3374 
3375 subroutine molecule_reset_choices(molecule, bond_id,choice)
3376 ! find all the neighboring bonds for the given bond
3377 ! it is exclusively used by the ring perception algorithm
3378  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3379  integer :: bond_id
3380  integer :: choice(0:max_bond_neib -1)
3381 
3382  integer :: i,tmp
3383 
3384  choice(:) = 0
3385 
3386  do i = 0,molecule%bond(bond_id -1)%num_neib -1 ! bond_id -1
3387  tmp=molecule%bond(bond_id-1)%neib(i)
3388  if(molecule%bond(tmp-1)%ring.eq.0) then
3389  choice(i)=0
3390  elseif(tmp>molecule%num_bond) then
3391  choice(i)=0
3392  else
3393  choice(i)=tmp
3394  end if
3395  end do
3396 end subroutine molecule_reset_choices
3397 
3398 integer function molecule_get_choices(molecule, choice,wrong_end,current_path_length,current_path)
3399 ! notice that wrong_end helps to define the direction of the searching path
3400  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3401  integer :: choice(0:max_bond_neib -1)
3402  integer :: wrong_end,current_path_length
3403  integer,pointer :: current_path(:)
3404 
3405  integer :: i,j,tresult
3406  integer :: mark
3407 
3408  tresult=0
3409 
3410  do i = 0,max_bond_neib -1
3411  if(choice(i).eq.0) then
3412  goto 1
3413  elseif(choice(i)>molecule%num_bond) then
3414  goto 1
3415  elseif(molecule%bond(choice(i)-1)%ring.eq.0) then
3416  goto 1
3417  elseif(molecule%bond(choice(i)-1)%atom_1.eq.wrong_end) then
3418  goto 1
3419  elseif(molecule%bond(choice(i)-1)%atom_2.eq.wrong_end) then
3420  goto 1
3421  end if
3422 
3423  ! Is this bond already included in the current path?
3424  mark=0
3425  do j = 0,current_path_length -1
3426  if(current_path(j).ne.choice(i)) then
3427  goto 2
3428  else
3429  mark=1
3430  exit
3431  end if
3432 2 end do
3433 
3434  if(mark.eq.1) then
3435  goto 1
3436  else
3437  tresult = choice(i)
3438  exit
3439  end if
3440 1 end do
3441 
3442  molecule_get_choices = tresult
3443 end function molecule_get_choices
3444 
3445 subroutine molecule_clean_choices(molecule,tried_choice,choice)
3446  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3447  integer :: tried_choice
3448  integer :: choice(0:max_bond_neib-1)
3449  integer :: i
3450 
3451  do i = 0,max_bond_neib -1
3452  if(choice(i).eq.0) then
3453  goto 1
3454  elseif(choice(i).eq.tried_choice) then
3455  choice(i)=0
3456  else
3457  goto 1
3458  end if
3459 1 end do
3460 
3461 end subroutine molecule_clean_choices
3462 
3463 integer function molecule_get_num_hb_atom(molecule)
3464  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3465  integer :: i,num=0
3466 
3467  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3468  if(molecule%atom(i)%valid.ne.0) then
3469  if(molecule%atom(i)%hb.eq.'D') then
3470  num = num +1
3471  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%hb.eq.'DA') then
3472  num = num +1
3473  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%hb.eq.'A') then
3474  num = num +1
3475  end if
3476  end if
3477  end do
3478 
3479  molecule_get_num_hb_atom = num
3480 end function molecule_get_num_hb_atom
3481 
3482 real function molecule_count_rotor(molecule)
3483 ! if a single bond is normal, bond%valid=1
3484 ! if a single bond is a rotor, bond%valid=2
3485  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3486  integer :: i,mark,tmp
3487  integer :: id1,id2
3488  real :: sum
3489 
3490  ! clean the variables
3491  molecule%atom(:)%score=0.000
3492 
3493  ! eliminate all the bonds in_ring and all the non-single bonds
3494  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3495  if(molecule%bond(i)%ring<=0) then
3496  if(molecule%bond(i)%ttype.ne.'1') then
3497  molecule%bond(i)%valid=2
3498  end if
3499  end if
3500  end do
3501 
3502  ! eliminate all the R-H, R-X, R-OH, R-NH2, R-CH3 bonds
3503  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3504  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) goto 2
3505 
3506  id1=molecule%bond(i)%atom_1
3507  id2=molecule%bond(i)%atom_2
3508 
3509  if(molecule%atom(id1-1)%num_nonh.eq.1.or.molecule%atom(id2-1)%num_nonh.eq.1) then
3510  molecule%bond(i)%valid=1
3511  else
3512  goto 2
3513  end if
3514 2 end do
3515 
3516  ! sp2-sp2 rotors
3517  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3518  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) goto 3
3519 
3520  id1=molecule%bond(i)%atom_1
3521  id2=molecule%bond(i)%atom_2
3522 
3523  mark=0
3524  tmp = molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type(molecule,molecule%atom(id1-1)%ttype)
3525  if(tmp.eq.1.or.tmp.eq.2) mark = mark +1
3526 
3527  tmp=molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type(molecule,molecule%atom(id2-1)%ttype)
3528  if(tmp.eq.1.or.tmp.eq.2) mark = mark +1
3529  if(mark.eq.2) molecule%bond(i)%valid=1
3530 3 end do
3531 
3532  ! eliminate terminal rotors, e.g. -PO3, -CF3, -CMe3, -NMe3
3533  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3534  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) goto 4
3535 
3536  id1=molecule%bond(i)%atom_1
3537  id2=molecule%bond(i)%atom_2
3538 
3539  if(molecule_judge_terminal_atom(molecule,molecule%atom(id1-1),id2).ne.0) then
3540  molecule%bond(i)%valid=1
3541  elseif(molecule_judge_terminal_atom(molecule,molecule%atom(id2-1),id1).ne.0) then
3542  molecule%bond(i)%valid=1
3543  end if
3544 4 end do
3545 
3546  ! eliminate abnormal rotors
3547  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3548  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) goto 5
3549 
3550  id1=molecule%bond(i)%atom_1
3551  id2=molecule%bond(i)%atom_2
3552 
3553  if(molecule%atom(id1-1)%valid<=0) then
3554  molecule%bond(i)%valid=1
3555  elseif(molecule%atom(id2-1)%valid<=0) then
3556  molecule%bond(i)%valid=1
3557  end if
3558 5 end do
3559 
3560  ! now count the frozen rotors, all the rotors have been labeled as 2
3561  sum=0.000
3562  do i = 0,molecule%num_bond -1
3563  if(molecule%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) then
3564  goto 6
3565  else
3566  sum = sum + 1.00
3567  end if
3568 6 end do
3569 
3570  molecule_count_rotor = sum
3571 end function molecule_count_rotor
3572 
3573 integer function molecule_judge_terminal_atom(molecule,atm, partner)
3574  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3575  type(txatom) :: atm
3576  integer :: partner
3577  integer :: i,j
3578 
3579  if(molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type(molecule,atm%ttype).ne.3) then
3580  molecule_judge_terminal_atom = 0
3581  return
3582  end if
3583 
3584  if(atm%num_nonh.ne.4) then
3585  molecule_judge_terminal_atom = 0
3586  return
3587  end if
3588 
3589  do i = 0,atm%num_nonh -1
3590  if(atm%neib(i).eq.partner) then
3591  goto 1
3592  elseif(molecule%atom(atm%neib(i)-1)%num_nonh.ne.1) then
3593  molecule_judge_terminal_atom = 0
3594  return
3595  end if
3596 1 end do
3597 
3598  do i = 0,atm%num_nonh-1 -1
3599  if(atm%neib(i).eq.partner) goto 2
3600 
3601  do j = i,atm%num_nonh -1
3602  if(atm%neib(j).eq.partner) then
3603  goto 3
3604  elseif(molecule%atom(atm%neib(j)-1)%xtype.eq.molecule%atom(atm%neib(i)-1)%xtype) then
3605  goto 3
3606  else
3607  molecule_judge_terminal_atom = 0
3608  end if
3609 3 end do
3610 2 end do
3611 
3612  molecule_judge_terminal_atom = 1
3613 end function molecule_judge_terminal_atom
3614 
3615 integer function molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type(molecule,ttype)
3616  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3617  character(len=10) :: ttype
3618  integer :: mark ! sp=1, sp2=2 sp3=3, none=4
3619 
3620  if(ttype.eq.'C.3') then
3621  mark=3
3622  elseif(ttype.eq.'C.2') then
3623  mark=2
3624  elseif(ttype.eq.'C.1') then
3625  mark=1
3626  elseif(ttype.eq.'C.cat') then
3627  mark=2
3628  elseif(ttype.eq.'C.ar') then
3629  mark=2
3630  elseif(ttype.eq.'H') then
3631  mark=4
3632  elseif(ttype.eq.'H.spc') then
3633  mark=4
3634  elseif(ttype.eq.'N.4') then
3635  mark=3
3636  elseif(ttype.eq.'N.3') then
3637  mark=3
3638  elseif(ttype.eq.'N.2') then
3639  mark=2
3640  elseif(ttype.eq.'N.1') then
3641  mark=1
3642  elseif(ttype.eq.'N.ar') then
3643  mark=2
3644  elseif(ttype.eq.'N.pl3') then
3645  mark=2
3646  elseif(ttype.eq.'N.am') then
3647  mark=2
3648  elseif(ttype.eq.'O.3') then
3649  mark=3
3650  elseif(ttype.eq.'O.2') then
3651  mark=2
3652  elseif(ttype.eq.'O.co2') then
3653  mark=2
3654  elseif(ttype.eq.'P.3') then
3655  mark=3
3656  elseif(ttype.eq.'S.3') then
3657  mark=3
3658  elseif(ttype.eq.'S.2') then
3659  mark=2
3660  elseif(ttype.eq.'S.o') then
3661  mark=3
3662  elseif(ttype.eq.'S.o2') then
3663  mark=3
3664  elseif(ttype.eq.'F') then
3665  mark=4
3666  elseif(ttype.eq.'Cl') then
3667  mark=4
3668  elseif(ttype.eq.'Br') then
3669  mark=4
3670  elseif(ttype.eq.'I') then
3671  mark=4
3672  elseif(ttype.eq.'Si') then
3673  mark=3
3674  else
3675  mark=4
3676  end if
3677 
3678  molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type = mark
3679 end function molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type
3680 
3681 real function molecule_calculate_logp(molecule)
3682  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3683  integer :: i,flag
3684  real :: xlogp
3685  character(len=20) :: ttype
3686 
3687  ! coordinates are not used in this routine
3688 
3689  ! logp_factor(0:9) is declared in calc_xscore
3690  logp_factor(0)%symbol = 'Hydrophobic carbon'
3691  logp_factor(1)%symbol = 'Internal H-bond'
3692  logp_factor(2)%symbol = 'Halogen 1-3 pair'
3693  logp_factor(3)%symbol = 'Aromatic nitrogen 1-4 pair'
3694  logp_factor(4)%symbol = 'Ortho sp3 oxygen pair'
3695  logp_factor(5)%symbol = 'Acceptor 1-5 pair'
3696  logp_factor(6)%symbol = 'Paralleled donor pair'
3697  logp_factor(7)%symbol = 'Alpha amino acid'
3698  logp_factor(8)%symbol = 'Salicylic acid'
3699  logp_factor(9)%symbol = 'P-amino sulfonic acid'
3700 
3701  logp_factor(0)%coeff = 0.211
3702  logp_factor(1)%coeff = 0.429
3703  logp_factor(2)%coeff = 0.137
3704  logp_factor(3)%coeff = 0.485
3705  logp_factor(4)%coeff =-0.268
3706  logp_factor(5)%coeff = 0.580
3707  logp_factor(6)%coeff =-0.423
3708  logp_factor(7)%coeff =-2.166
3709  logp_factor(8)%coeff = 0.554
3710  logp_factor(9)%coeff =-0.501
3711 
3712  xlogp=0.000
3713 
3714  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3715  if(molecule%atom(i)%valid.ne.0) then
3716  call molecule_get_xlogp_type(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,ttype)
3717  molecule%atom(i)%logp = ff_get_atom_logp(ttype)
3718  xlogp= xlogp + molecule%atom(i)%logp
3719  end if
3720  end do
3721 
3722  logp_factor(0:10 -1)%num=0
3723 
3724  ! this flag determines if correction factors are also distributed
3725  ! onto each atoms or not
3726  flag=0
3727  logp_factor(0)%num=molecule_count_hydrophobic_carbon(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3728  logp_factor(1)%num=molecule_count_internal_hbond(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3729  logp_factor(2)%num=molecule_count_halogen_1_3_pair(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3730  logp_factor(3)%num=molecule_count_nar_1_4_pair(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3731  logp_factor(4)%num=molecule_count_o3_1_4_pair(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3732  logp_factor(5)%num=molecule_count_acceptor_1_5_pair(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3733  logp_factor(6)%num=0.000 ! no coords used
3734  logp_factor(7)%num=molecule_count_amino_acid(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3735  logp_factor(8)%num=molecule_count_salicylic_acid(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3736  logp_factor(9)%num=molecule_count_sulfonic_acid(molecule,flag) ! no coords used
3737 
3738  do i = 0,10 -1
3739  xlogp=xlogp + (logp_factor(i)%num*logp_factor(i)%coeff)
3740  end do
3741 
3742  molecule_calculate_logp = xlogp
3743 end function molecule_calculate_logp
3744 
3745 real function molecule_count_sulfonic_acid(molecule,flag)
3746  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3747  integer :: flag
3748  integer :: i,j,num,tmp1,tmp2
3749 
3750  num=0
3751  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3752  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'S.o2')) goto 1
3753  if(molecule%atom(i)%ring.ne.0) goto 1
3754 
3755  tmp1=molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id))
3756  if(tmp1.eq.0) goto 1
3757 
3758  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3759  if((molecule%atom(j)%xtype.ne.'N.3.h2.pi=1')) goto 2
3760 
3761  tmp2=molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(j)%id))
3762  if(tmp2.eq.0) goto 2
3763 
3764  if(molecule_connection_1_6_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,molecule%atom(j)%id).eq.0) goto 2
3765  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,tmp1,tmp2).eq.0) goto 2
3766 
3767  num = num +1
3768 
3769  if(flag.ne.0) then
3770  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+(logp_sulfonic_acid/2.0)
3771  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+(logp_sulfonic_acid/2.0)
3772  end if
3773 
3774  exit
3775 2 end do
3776 1 end do
3777 
3778  molecule_count_sulfonic_acid = num
3779 end function molecule_count_sulfonic_acid
3780 
3781 real function molecule_count_salicylic_acid(molecule,flag)
3782  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3783  integer :: flag
3784  integer :: i,j,num,tmp,mark
3785 
3786  num=0
3787 
3788  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3789  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'O.2')) goto 1
3790 
3791  tmp=molecule%atom(i)%neib(0)-1
3792  if(molecule%atom(tmp)%ttype(1:1).ne.'C') goto 1
3793  if(molecule%atom(tmp)%ring.ne.0) goto 1
3794  if(molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(tmp)%id)).eq.0) goto 1
3795 
3796  mark=0
3797 
3798  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3799  if(i.eq.j) goto 2
3800  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'O.3')) goto 2
3801  if(molecule%atom(j)%ring.ne.0) goto 2
3802  if(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id), (molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 2
3803  mark=0
3804  exit
3805 2 end do
3806 
3807 
3808  if(mark.eq.0) goto 1
3809 
3810  mark=0
3811  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3812  if(i.eq.j) goto 3
3813  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'O.3')) goto 3
3814  if((molecule%atom(j)%hb.ne.'DA')) goto 3
3815  if(molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 3
3816  if(molecule_connection_1_5_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id), (molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 3
3817 
3818  num = num +1
3819  if(flag.ne.0) then
3820  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_salicylic_acid)/2.0)
3821  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_salicylic_acid)/2.0)
3822  end if
3823  exit
3824 3 end do
3825 
3826  if(num.ne.0) exit
3827 1 end do
3828 
3829  molecule_count_salicylic_acid = num
3830 end function molecule_count_salicylic_acid
3831 
3832 real function molecule_count_amino_acid(molecule,flag)
3833  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3834  integer :: flag
3835  integer :: i,j,tmp,num,mark
3836 
3837  num=0
3838 
3839  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3840  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'O2')) goto 1
3841 
3842  tmp=molecule%atom(i)%neib(0)-1
3843  if(molecule%atom(tmp)%ttype(1:1).ne.'C') goto 1
3844  if(molecule%atom(tmp)%ring.ne.0) goto 1
3845 
3846  mark=0
3847 
3848  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3849  if(i.eq.j) goto 2
3850  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'O.3')) goto 2
3851  if((molecule%atom(j)%hb.ne.'DA')) goto 2
3852  if(molecule%atom(j)%ring.ne.0) goto 2
3853  if(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id), (molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 2
3854 
3855  mark=1
3856  exit
3857 2 end do
3858 
3859  if(mark.eq.0) goto 1
3860 
3861  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3862  if((molecule%atom(j)%xtype.ne.'N.3.h2.pi=0')) goto 3
3863  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id), (molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 3
3864 
3865  num = num +1
3866  if(flag.ne.0) then
3867  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_amino_acid)/2.0)
3868  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_amino_acid)/2.0)
3869  end if
3870 
3871  exit
3872 3 end do
3873 
3874  if(num.ne.0) exit
3875 
3876  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3877  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'N.ar')) goto 4
3878  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id), (molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 4
3879 
3880  num = num +1
3881 
3882  if(flag.ne.0) then
3883  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_amino_acid)/2.0)
3884  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_amino_acid)/2.0)
3885  end if
3886 
3887  exit
3888 4 end do
3889 
3890  if(num.ne.0) exit
3891 1 end do
3892 
3893  molecule_count_amino_acid = num
3894 end function molecule_count_amino_acid
3895 
3896 real function molecule_count_acceptor_1_5_pair(molecule,flag)
3897  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3898  integer :: flag
3899  integer :: i,j,num,tmp1,tmp2
3900 
3901  num=0
3902 
3903  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom-1 -1
3904  if((molecule%atom(i)%hb.ne.'A')) goto 1
3905  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'O.3')) goto 1
3906  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'N.2')) goto 1
3907  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'N.ar')) goto 1
3908 
3909  tmp1=molecule%atom(i)%neib(0)-1
3910  if(molecule%atom(tmp1)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') goto 1
3911  if(molecule%atom(tmp1)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') goto 1
3912  if(molecule%atom(tmp1)%ring.ne.0) goto 1
3913 
3914  do j = i,molecule%num_atom -1
3915  if((molecule%atom(j)%hb.ne.'A')) goto 2
3916  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'O.')) goto 2
3917  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'N.2')) goto 2
3918  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'N.ar')) goto 2
3919 
3920  tmp2=molecule%atom(j)%neib(0)-1
3921  if(molecule%atom(tmp2)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') goto 2
3922  if(molecule%atom(tmp2)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') goto 2
3923  if(molecule%atom(tmp2)%ring.ne.0) goto 2
3924 
3925  if(molecule_connection_1_5_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id), (molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 2
3926 
3927  num = num +1
3928 
3929  if(flag.ne.0) then
3930  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_acceptor_pair)/2.0)
3931  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_acceptor_pair)/2.0)
3932  else
3933  continue
3934  end if
3935 2 end do
3936 1 end do
3937 
3938  molecule_count_acceptor_1_5_pair = num
3939 end function molecule_count_acceptor_1_5_pair
3940 
3941 real function molecule_count_o3_1_4_pair(molecule,flag)
3942  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3943  integer :: flag
3944  integer :: i,j
3945  real :: num
3946  integer ,allocatable:: trecord(:)
3947 
3948  allocate(trecord(0:molecule%num_atom -1),stat=err)
3949  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
3950 
3951  trecord(:)=0
3952 
3953  num=0
3954 
3955  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom-1 -1
3956  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'O.3')) goto 1
3957  if((molecule%atom(i)%hb.eq.'DA')) goto 1
3958  if(molecule%atom(i)%ring.ne.0) goto 1
3959  if(molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id)).eq.0) goto 1
3960 
3961  do j = i,molecule%num_atom -1
3962  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'O.3')) goto 2
3963  if((molecule%atom(j)%hb.eq.'DA')) goto 2
3964  if(molecule%atom(j)%ring.ne.0) goto 2
3965  if(molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 2
3966  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id),(molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) goto 2
3967 
3968  trecord(i) = trecord(i) +1
3969  trecord(j) = trecord(j) +1
3970 2 end do
3971 1 end do
3972 
3973  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
3974  if(trecord(i).eq.0) goto 3
3975 
3976  num=num+0.500
3977 
3978  if(flag.ne.0) then
3979  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+(logp_o3_pair/2.0)
3980  else
3981  goto 3
3982  end if
3983 3 end do
3984 
3985  deallocate(trecord)
3986 
3987  molecule_count_o3_1_4_pair = num
3988 end function molecule_count_o3_1_4_pair
3989 
3990 integer function molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check(molecule,id_in)
3991  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
3992  integer ::id, id_in
3993  integer :: i,num,tmp,mark
3994 
3995  id = id_in
3996  id = id -1
3997 
3998  mark=0
3999  num=molecule%atom(id)%num_neib
4000 
4001  do i = 0,num -1
4002  tmp=molecule%atom(id)%neib(i)
4003  if((molecule%atom(tmp-1)%ttype.eq.'C.ar')) then
4004  mark=tmp
4005  exit
4006  end if
4007  end do
4008 
4009  molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check = mark
4010 end function molecule_adjacent_aromatic_check
4011 
4012 real function molecule_count_nar_1_4_pair(molecule,flag)
4013  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4014  integer :: flag
4015  integer :: i,j,num,tmp1,tmp2,tmp3,tmp4
4016 
4017  num=0
4018 
4019  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom-1 -1
4020  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'N.ar')) goto 1
4021 
4022  tmp1=molecule%atom(i)%neib(0)
4023  tmp2=molecule%atom(i)%neib(1)
4024 
4025  do j = i,molecule%num_atom -1
4026  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'N.ar')) then
4027  goto 2
4028  elseif(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(i)%id), (molecule%atom(j)%id)).eq.0) then
4029  goto 2
4030  else
4031  tmp3=molecule%atom(j)%neib(0)
4032  tmp4=molecule%atom(j)%neib(1)
4033 
4034  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,(tmp1),(tmp3)).eq.1) then
4035  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,(tmp2),(tmp4)).eq.1) then
4036  num = num +1
4037  if(flag.ne.0) then
4038  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_nar_pair)/2.0)
4039  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_nar_pair)/2.0)
4040  end if
4041  else
4042  goto 2
4043  end if
4044  elseif(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,tmp1,tmp4).eq.1) then
4045  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,tmp2,tmp3).eq.1) then
4046  num = num +1
4047  if(flag.ne.0) then
4048  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_nar_pair)/2.0)
4049  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_nar_pair)/2.0)
4050  end if
4051  end if
4052  else
4053  goto 2
4054  end if
4055  end if
4056 2 end do
4057 1 end do
4058 
4059  molecule_count_nar_1_4_pair = num
4060 end function molecule_count_nar_1_4_pair
4061 
4062 real function molecule_count_halogen_1_3_pair(molecule,flag)
4063  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4064  integer :: flag
4065  integer :: i,j
4066  integer :: num1,num2
4067 
4068  num1=0
4069  num2=0
4070 
4071  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom-1 -1
4072  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'F')) goto 1
4073 
4074  do j = i,molecule%num_atom -1
4075  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'F')) then
4076  goto 2
4077  elseif(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,molecule%atom(j)%id).eq.0) then
4078  goto 2
4079  end if
4080 
4081  num1 = num1 +1
4082 
4083  if(flag.ne.0) then
4084  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_halogen_pair)/2.0)
4085  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_halogen_pair)/2.0)
4086  else
4087  goto 2
4088  end if
4089 2 end do
4090 1 end do
4091 
4092  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom-1 -1
4093  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'Cl').and.(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'Br').and.(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'I')) goto 3
4094 
4095  do j = i,molecule%num_atom -1
4096  if((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'Cl').and.(molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'Br').and.(molecule%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'I')) then
4097  goto 4
4098  elseif(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,molecule%atom(j)%id).eq.0) then
4099  goto 4
4100  end if
4101 
4102  num2 = num2 +1
4103 
4104  if(flag.ne.0) then
4105  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+((logp_halogen_pair)/2.0)
4106  molecule%atom(j)%logp=molecule%atom(j)%logp+((logp_halogen_pair)/2.0)
4107  else
4108  goto 4
4109  end if
4110 4 end do
4111 3 end do
4112 
4113  molecule_count_halogen_1_3_pair = num1+num2
4114 end function molecule_count_halogen_1_3_pair
4115 
4116 integer function molecule_adjacent_ring_check(molecule,id_in)
4117  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4118  integer :: id, id_in
4119  integer :: i,num,tmp,mark
4120 
4121  id = id_in
4122  id = id -1
4123 
4124  mark=0
4125  num=molecule%atom(id)%num_neib
4126 
4127  do i = 0,num -1
4128  tmp=molecule%atom(id)%neib(i)
4129  if(molecule%atom(tmp-1)%ring.ne.0) then
4130  mark=tmp
4131  exit
4132  end if
4133  end do
4134 
4135  molecule_adjacent_ring_check = mark
4136 end function molecule_adjacent_ring_check
4137 
4138 real function molecule_count_internal_hbond(molecule,flag)
4139  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4140  integer :: flag
4141  integer :: i,j,mark1,mark2
4142  real :: num
4143  integer,allocatable :: trecord(:)
4144 
4145  allocate(trecord(0:molecule%num_atom -1),stat=err)
4146  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
4147 
4148  trecord(:)=0
4149 
4150  num=0
4151 
4152  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
4153  if((molecule%atom(i)%hb.ne.'D').and.(molecule%atom(i)%hb.ne.'DA')) then
4154  goto 1
4155  elseif(molecule%atom(i)%ring.ne.0) then
4156  goto 1 ! not allowed in ring
4157  end if
4158 
4159  if(molecule_adjacent_ring_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id).eq.0) then
4160  mark1=0
4161  else
4162  mark1=1
4163  end if
4164 
4165  do j = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
4166  if(i.eq.j) then
4167  goto 2
4168  elseif((molecule%atom(j)%hb.ne.'A').and.(molecule%atom(j)%hb.ne.'DA')) then
4169  goto 2
4170  elseif((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'O.3').and.(molecule%atom(j)%hb.eq.'A')) then
4171  goto 2
4172  elseif((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'N.2')) then
4173  goto 2
4174  elseif((molecule%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'N.ar')) then
4175  goto 2
4176  elseif(molecule%atom(j)%ring.ne.0) then
4177  goto 2 ! not in ring
4178  end if
4179 
4180  if(molecule_adjacent_ring_check(molecule, molecule%atom(j)%id).eq.0) then
4181  mark2=0
4182  else
4183  mark2=1
4184  end if
4185 
4186  if(mark1.eq.1.and.mark2==1) then
4187  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,molecule%atom(j)%id).eq.0) then
4188  goto 2
4189  else
4190  trecord(i) = trecord(i) +1
4191  trecord(j) = trecord(j) +1
4192  end if
4193  elseif(mark1.eq.1.and.mark2==0) then
4194  if(molecule_connection_1_5_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,molecule%atom(j)%id).eq.0) then
4195  goto 2
4196  else
4197  trecord(i) = +1
4198  end if
4199  trecord(j) = trecord(j) +1
4200  elseif(mark2.eq.0.and.mark2==1) then
4201  if(molecule_connection_1_5_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id,molecule%atom(j)%id).eq.0) then
4202  goto 2
4203  else
4204  trecord(i) = trecord(i) +1
4205  trecord(j) = trecord(j) +1
4206  end if
4207  end if
4208 2 end do
4209 1 end do
4210 
4211  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
4212  if(trecord(i).eq.0) then
4213  goto 3
4214  end if
4215 
4216  num=num+0.500
4217 
4218  if(flag.ne.0) then
4219  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+(logp_internal_hbond/2.0)
4220  else
4221  goto 3
4222  end if
4223 3 end do
4224 
4225  deallocate(trecord)
4226 
4227  molecule_count_internal_hbond = num
4228 end function molecule_count_internal_hbond
4229 
4230 real function molecule_count_hydrophobic_carbon(molecule,flag)
4231  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4232  integer :: flag
4233  integer :: i,num
4234 
4235  num=0
4236 
4237  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
4238  if((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'C.3').and.(molecule%atom(i)%ttype.ne.'C.2')) goto 1
4239  if(molecule_hydrophobic_neighbor_check(molecule,molecule%atom(i)%id).eq.0) goto 1
4240 
4241  num = num +1
4242  if(flag.ne.0) then
4243  molecule%atom(i)%logp=molecule%atom(i)%logp+(logp_hydrophobic_carbon)
4244  end if
4245 1 end do
4246 
4247  if(num>=10) num = num/2
4248 
4249  molecule_count_hydrophobic_carbon = num
4250 end function molecule_count_hydrophobic_carbon
4251 
4252 integer function molecule_hydrophobic_neighbor_check(molecule,id_in)
4253  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4254  integer :: id,id_in
4255  integer :: i,mark
4256 
4257  id = id_in
4258  id = id -1
4259  mark=1
4260 
4261  molecule%atom(2)%id = 3 ! most cryptic bug ever...
4262 
4263  do i = 0,molecule%num_atom -1
4264  if(i.eq.id) then
4265  goto 1
4266  elseif((molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'F').or. &
4267  (molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'Cl').or. &
4268  (molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'Br').or. &
4269  (molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'I').or. &
4270  (molecule%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'Si').or. &
4271  molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N'.or. &
4272  molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O'.or. &
4273  molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S'.or. &
4274  molecule%atom(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') then
4275  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(id)%id),(molecule%atom(i)%id)).eq.1) then
4276  mark=0
4277  exit
4278  elseif(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(id)%id),(molecule%atom(i)%id)).eq.1) then
4279  mark=0
4280  exit
4281  elseif(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,(molecule%atom(id)%id),(molecule%atom(i)%id)).eq.1) then
4282  mark=0
4283  exit
4284  end if
4285  end if
4286 1 end do
4287 
4288  molecule_hydrophobic_neighbor_check = mark
4289 end function molecule_hydrophobic_neighbor_check
4290 
4291 integer function molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,id1_in, id2_in)
4292  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4293  integer :: id1, id2,id1_in,id2_in
4294  integer :: i
4295 
4296  id1 = id1_in
4297  id2 = id2_in
4298  if(id1.eq.id2) then
4299  molecule_connection_1_2_check = 0
4300  return
4301  end if
4302 
4303  do i = 0,molecule%atom(id2-1)%num_neib -1
4304  if(id1.eq.molecule%atom(id2-1)%neib(i)) then
4305  molecule_connection_1_2_check= 1
4306  return
4307  end if
4308  end do
4309 
4310  molecule_connection_1_2_check = 0
4311 end function molecule_connection_1_2_check
4312 
4313 integer function molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,id1_in, id2_in)
4314  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4315  integer :: id1, id2,id1_in,id2_in
4316  integer :: i,j
4317 
4318  id1 = id1_in
4319  id2 = id2_in
4320  if(id1.eq.id2) then
4321  molecule_connection_1_3_check = 0
4322  return
4323  end if
4324 
4325  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) then
4326  molecule_connection_1_3_check = 0
4327  return
4328  end if
4329 
4330  id1 = id1 -1
4331  id2 = id2 -1
4332 
4333  do i = 0,molecule%atom(id1)%num_neib -1
4334  do j = 0,molecule%atom(id2)%num_neib -1
4335  if(molecule%atom(id1)%neib(i).eq.molecule%atom(id2)%neib(j)) then
4336  molecule_connection_1_3_check = 1
4337  return
4338  end if
4339  end do
4340  end do
4341 
4342  molecule_connection_1_3_check = 0
4343 end function molecule_connection_1_3_check
4344 
4345 integer function molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule, id1_in, id2_in)
4346  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4347  integer :: id1, id2,id1_in,id2_in
4348  integer :: i,j
4349 
4350  id1 = id1_in
4351  id2 = id2_in
4352 
4353  if(id1.eq.id2) then
4354  molecule_connection_1_4_check = 0
4355  return
4356  end if
4357  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) then
4358  molecule_connection_1_4_check = 0
4359  return
4360  end if
4361  if(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) then
4362  molecule_connection_1_4_check = 0
4363  return
4364  end if
4365 
4366  id1 = id1 -1
4367  id2 = id2 -1
4368 
4369  do i = 0,molecule%atom(id1)%num_neib -1
4370  do j = 0,molecule%atom(id2)%num_neib -1
4371  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,molecule%atom(id1)%neib(i),molecule%atom(id2)%neib(j)).eq.1) then
4372  molecule_connection_1_4_check = 1
4373  return
4374  end if
4375  end do
4376  end do
4377 
4378  molecule_connection_1_4_check = 0
4379 end function molecule_connection_1_4_check
4380 
4381 integer function molecule_connection_1_5_check(molecule,id1_in, id2_in)
4382  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4383  integer :: id1,id2,id1_in,id2_in
4384  integer :: i,j
4385 
4386  id1 = id1_in
4387  id2 = id2_in
4388 
4389  molecule_connection_1_5_check = 0
4390  if(id1.eq.id2) return
4391  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) return
4392  if(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) return
4393  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) return
4394 
4395  id1 = id1 -1
4396  id2 = id2 -1
4397 
4398  do i = 0,molecule%atom(id1)%num_neib -1
4399  do j = 0,molecule%atom(id2)%num_neib -1
4400  if(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,molecule%atom(id1)%neib(i),molecule%atom(id2)%neib(j)).eq.1) then
4401  molecule_connection_1_5_check = 1
4402  return
4403  end if
4404  end do
4405  end do
4406 
4407  molecule_connection_1_5_check = 0
4408 end function molecule_connection_1_5_check
4409 
4410 integer function molecule_connection_1_6_check(molecule, id1_in, id2_in)
4411  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4412  integer :: id1, id2,id1_in,id2_in
4413  integer :: i,j
4414 
4415  id1 = id1_in
4416  id2 = id2_in
4417 
4418  molecule_connection_1_6_check = 0
4419  if(id1.eq.id2) return
4420  if(molecule_connection_1_2_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) return
4421  if(molecule_connection_1_3_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) return
4422  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) return
4423  if(molecule_connection_1_5_check(molecule,id1,id2).eq.1) return
4424 
4425  id1 = id1 -1
4426  id2 = id2 -1
4427 
4428  do i = 0,molecule%atom(id1)%num_neib -1
4429  do j = 0,molecule%atom(id2)%num_neib -1
4430  if(molecule_connection_1_4_check(molecule,molecule%atom(id1)%neib(i),molecule%atom(id2)%neib(j)).eq.1) then
4431  molecule_connection_1_6_check = 1
4432  return
4433  end if
4434  end do
4435  end do
4436 
4437  molecule_connection_1_6_check = 0
4438 end function molecule_connection_1_6_check
4439 
4440 type(txgroup) function molecule_find_x_group(molecule,atom_id)
4441  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4442  integer :: atom_id
4443  integer :: i,num
4444  type(txgroup) :: group
4445 
4446  ! define the center
4447  group%center=molecule%atom(atom_id-1)
4448 
4449  ! find the center's neighbours
4450  num=group%center%num_neib
4451 
4452  do i = 0,num -1
4453  group%neib(i)=molecule%atom(group%center%neib(i)-1)
4454  group%bond(i)=molecule%bond(group%center%bond(i)-1)
4455  end do
4456 
4457  ! count the necessary parameters
4458  group%num_neib=num
4459 
4460  group%num_h=0
4461  group%num_nonh=0
4462 
4463  do i = 0,num -1
4464  if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'H') then
4465  group%num_h = group%num_h +1
4466  else
4467  group%num_nonh = group%num_nonh +1
4468  end if
4469  end do
4470 
4471  group%num_hetero=0
4472 
4473  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
4474  if(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'2') goto 1
4475  if(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'3') goto 1
4476  if(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'ar') goto 1
4477  if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
4478  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
4479  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
4480  group%num_hetero = group%num_hetero +1
4481  end if
4482 1 end do
4483 
4484  group%num_pi=0
4485 
4486  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
4487  if(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'2') then
4488  goto 2
4489  elseif(group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'3') then
4490  goto 2
4491  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.ar') then
4492  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
4493  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.2') then
4494  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
4495  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.1') then
4496  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
4497  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.cat') then
4498  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
4499  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'N.2') then
4500  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
4501  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'N.1') then
4502  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
4503  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'N.ar') then
4504  group%num_pi = group%num_pi +1
4505  end if
4506 2 end do
4507 
4508  group%num_nar=0
4509  group%num_car=0
4510 
4511  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
4512  if((group%bond(i)%ttype.ne.'ar')) then
4513  goto 3
4514  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'N.ar') then
4515  group%num_nar = group%num_nar +1
4516  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'C.ar') then
4517  group%num_car = group%num_car +1
4518  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'C') then
4519  group%num_car = group%num_car +1
4520  else
4521  group%num_nar = group%num_nar +1
4522  end if
4523 3 end do
4524 
4525  group%db_type=0
4526 
4527  do i = 0,group%num_nonh -1
4528  if((group%center%ttype.eq.'O.co2').or. &
4529  (group%center%ttype.eq.'O.2').or. &
4530  (group%center%ttype.eq.'S.2')) then
4531  if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'C') then
4532  group%db_type=1
4533  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
4534  group%db_type=2
4535  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
4536  group%db_type=3
4537  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') then
4538  group%db_type=4
4539  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') then
4540  group%db_type=5
4541  else
4542  goto 4
4543  end if
4544  elseif((group%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'2').or. &
4545  (group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'O.co2').or. &
4546  (group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'O.2').or. &
4547  (group%neib(i)%ttype.eq.'S.2')) then
4548  if(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'C') then
4549  group%db_type=1
4550  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
4551  group%db_type=2
4552  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
4553  group%db_type=3
4554  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') then
4555  group%db_type=4
4556  elseif(group%neib(i)%ttype(1:1).eq.'P') then
4557  group%db_type=5
4558  else
4559  goto 4
4560  end if
4561  end if
4562 4 end do
4563 
4564  group%valid=1
4565 
4566  molecule_find_x_group = group
4567 end function molecule_find_x_group
4568 
4569 
4570 subroutine molecule_get_xlogp_type(molecule,atom_id, ttype)
4571  type(txmolecule) :: molecule
4572  integer :: atom_id
4573  character(len=20) :: ttype
4574  type(txgroup) :: group
4575  type(txatom) :: atom
4576 
4577  atom=molecule%atom(atom_id-1)
4578  group=molecule_find_x_group(molecule,atom%id)
4579 
4580  ttype = 'Un'
4581 
4582  if(atom%ttype.eq.'H'.or.atom%ttype.eq.'H.spc') then
4583  if(group%neib(0)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
4584  ttype = 'H.hb'
4585  elseif(group%neib(0)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
4586  ttype = 'H.hb'
4587  else
4588  ttype = 'H'
4589  end if
4590  end if
4591 
4592  if(atom%ttype.eq.'C.3') then
4593  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
4594  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4595  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4596  ttype = 'C.3.h3.pi=0'
4597  else
4598  ttype = 'C.3.h3.pi=1'
4599  end if
4600  else
4601  ttype = 'C.3.h3.x'
4602  end if
4603  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4604  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4605  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4606  ttype = 'C.3.h2.pi=0'
4607  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4608  ttype = 'C.3.h2.pi=1'
4609  else
4610  ttype = 'C.3.h2.pi=2'
4611  end if
4612  else
4613  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4614  ttype = 'C.3.h2.x.pi=0'
4615  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4616  ttype = 'C.3.h2.x.pi=1'
4617  else
4618  ttype = 'C.3.h2.x.pi=2'
4619  end if
4620  end if
4621  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
4622  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4623  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4624  ttype = 'C.3.h.pi=0'
4625  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4626  ttype = 'C.3.h.pi=1'
4627  else
4628  ttype = 'C.3.h.pi>1'
4629  end if
4630  else
4631  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4632  ttype = 'C.3.h.x.pi=0'
4633  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4634  ttype = 'C.3.h.x.pi=1'
4635  else
4636  ttype = 'C.3.h.x.pi>1'
4637  end if
4638  end if
4639  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.4) then
4640  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4641  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4642  ttype = 'C.3.pi=0'
4643  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4644  ttype = 'C.3.pi=1'
4645  else
4646  ttype = 'C.3.pi>1'
4647  end if
4648  else
4649  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4650  ttype = 'C.3.x.pi=0'
4651  else
4652  ttype = 'C.3.x.pi>0'
4653  end if
4654  end if
4655  else
4656  ttype = 'C.3.unknown'
4657  end if
4658  end if
4659 
4660  if(atom%ttype.eq.'C.2') then
4661  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
4662  ttype = 'C.2.h2'
4663  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4664  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4665  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4666  ttype = 'C.2.h.pi=0'
4667  else
4668  ttype = 'C.2.h.pi=1'
4669  end if
4670  else
4671  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4672  ttype = 'C.2.h.x.pi=0'
4673  else
4674  ttype = 'C.2.h.x.pi=1'
4675  end if
4676  end if
4677  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
4678  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4679  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4680  ttype = 'C.2.pi=0'
4681  else
4682  ttype = 'C.2.pi>0'
4683  end if
4684  elseif(group%num_hetero.eq.1) then
4685  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4686  ttype = 'C.2.x.pi=0'
4687  else
4688  ttype = 'C.2.x.pi>0'
4689  end if
4690  else
4691  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4692  ttype = 'C.2.x2.pi=0'
4693  else
4694  ttype = 'C.2.x2.pi>0'
4695  end if
4696  end if
4697  else
4698  ttype = 'C.2.unknown'
4699  end if
4700  end if
4701 
4702  if(atom%ttype.eq.'C.cat') then
4703  ttype = 'C.2.x2.pi>0'
4704  end if
4705  if(atom%ttype.eq.'C.ar') then
4706  if(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4707  if(group%num_nar.eq.0) then
4708  ttype = 'C.ar.h'
4709  else
4710  ttype = 'C.ar.h.(X)'
4711  end if
4712  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
4713  if(group%num_nar.eq.0) then
4714  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4715  ttype = 'C.ar'
4716  else
4717  ttype = 'C.ar.x'
4718  endif
4719  else
4720  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4721  ttype = 'C.ar.(X)'
4722  else
4723  ttype = 'C.ar.(X).x'
4724  end if
4725  end if
4726  else
4727  ttype = 'C.ar.unknown'
4728  end if
4729  end if
4730 
4731  if(atom%ttype.eq.'C.1') then
4732  if(group%db_type.ne.0) then
4733  ttype = .eq.'C.1.'
4734  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
4735  ttype = 'C.1.h'
4736  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4737  ttype = 'C.1'
4738  else
4739  ttype = 'C.1.unknown'
4740  end if
4741  end if
4742 
4743  if(atom%ttype.eq.'N.4'.or.atom%ttype.eq.'N.3'.or.atom%ttype.eq.'N.pl3') then
4744  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
4745  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4746  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4747  ttype = 'N.3.h2.pi=0'
4748  else
4749  ttype = 'N.3.h2.pi=1'
4750  end if
4751  else
4752  ttype = 'N.3.h2.x'
4753  end if
4754  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4755  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4756  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4757  ttype = 'N.3.h.pi=0'
4758  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4759  ttype = 'N.3.h.pi>0'
4760  elseif(atom%ring.eq.0) then
4761  ttype = 'N.3.h.pi>0'
4762  else
4763  ttype = 'N.3.h.ring'
4764  end if
4765  else
4766  if(group%num_pi<=1) then
4767  ttype = 'N.3.h.x'
4768  elseif(atom%ring.eq.0) then
4769  ttype = 'N.3.h.x'
4770  else
4771  ttype = 'N.3.h.x.ring'
4772  end if
4773  end if
4774  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
4775  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4776  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4777  ttype = 'N.3.pi=0'
4778  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4779  ttype = 'N.3.pi>0'
4780  elseif(atom%ring.eq.0) then
4781  ttype = 'N.3.pi>0'
4782  else
4783  ttype = 'N.3.ring'
4784  end if
4785  else
4786  if(group%num_pi<=1) then
4787  ttype = 'N.3.x'
4788  elseif(atom%ring.eq.0) then
4789  ttype = 'N.3.x'
4790  else
4791  ttype = 'N.3.x.ring'
4792  end if
4793  end if
4794  else
4795  ttype = 'N.3.unknown'
4796  end if
4797  end if
4798 
4799  if(atom%ttype.eq.'N.am') then
4800  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
4801  ttype = 'N.am.h2'
4802  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4803  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4804  ttype = 'N.am.h'
4805  else
4806  ttype = 'N.am.h.x'
4807  end if
4808  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
4809  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4810  ttype = 'N.am'
4811  else
4812  ttype = 'N.am.x'
4813  end if
4814  else
4815  ttype = 'N.am.unknown'
4816  end if
4817  end if
4818 
4819  if(atom%ttype.eq.'N.2') then
4820  ! N=C, N=S, N=P
4821  if(group%db_type.eq.1.or.group%db_type.eq.4.or.group%db_type.eq.5) then
4822  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4823  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4824  ttype = 'N.2.(=C).pi=0'
4825  else
4826  ttype = 'N.2.(=C).pi=1'
4827  end if
4828  else
4829  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4830  ttype = 'N.2.(=C).x.pi=0'
4831  else
4832  ttype = 'N.2.(=C).x.pi=1'
4833  end if
4834  end if
4835  elseif(group%db_type.eq.2) then
4836  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4837  ttype = 'N.2.(=N)'
4838  else
4839  ttype = 'N.2.(=N).x'
4840  endif
4841  elseif(group%db_type.eq.3) then
4842  if(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4843  ttype = 'N.2.o'
4844  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.3) then
4845  ttype = 'N.2.o2'
4846  else
4847  ttype = 'N.2.o'
4848  end if
4849  else
4850  ttype = 'N.2.unknown'
4851  end if
4852  end if
4853 
4854  if(atom%ttype.eq.'N.ar') ttype = 'N.ar'
4855  if(atom%ttype.eq.'N.1') ttype = 'N.1'
4856 
4857  if(atom%ttype.eq.'O.3') then
4858  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
4859  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4860  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4861  ttype = 'O.3.h.pi=0'
4862  else
4863  ttype = 'O.3.h.pi=1'
4864  end if
4865  else
4866  ttype = 'O.3.h.x'
4867  end if
4868  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4869  if(group%num_hetero.eq.0) then
4870  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4871  ttype = 'O.3.pi=0'
4872  else
4873  ttype = 'O.3.pi>0'
4874  end if
4875  else
4876  ttype = 'O.3.x'
4877  end if
4878  else
4879  ttype = 'O.3.unknown'
4880  end if
4881  end if
4882 
4883  if(atom%ttype.eq.'O.2') ttype = 'O.2'
4884  if(atom%ttype.eq.'O.co2') ttype = 'O.co2'
4885 
4886  if(atom%ttype.eq.'S.3') then
4887  if(group%num_nonh.eq.1) then
4888  ttype = 'S.3.h'
4889  elseif(group%num_nonh.eq.2) then
4890  ttype = 'S.3'
4891  else
4892  ttype = 'S.3.unknown'
4893  end if
4894  end if
4895 
4896  if(atom%ttype.eq.'S.2') ttype = 'S.2'
4897  if(atom%ttype.eq.'S.o') ttype = 'S.o'
4898  if(atom%ttype.eq.'S.o2') ttype = 'S.o2'
4899 
4900  if(atom%ttype.eq.'P.3') then
4901  if(group%db_type.eq.3) then
4902  ttype = 'P.3.(=O)'
4903  elseif(group%db_type.eq.4) then
4904  ttype = 'P.3.(=S)'
4905  else
4906  ttype = 'P.3.unknown'
4907  end if
4908  end if
4909 
4910  if(atom%ttype.eq.'F') then
4911  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4912  ttype = 'F.pi=0'
4913  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4914  ttype = 'F.pi=1'
4915  else
4916  ttype = 'F.unknown'
4917  end if
4918  end if
4919 
4920  if(atom%ttype.eq.'Cl') then
4921  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4922  ttype = 'Cl.pi=0'
4923  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4924  ttype = 'Cl.pi=1'
4925  else
4926  ttype = 'Cl.unknown'
4927  end if
4928  end if
4929 
4930  if(atom%ttype.eq.'Br') then
4931  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4932  ttype = 'Br.pi=0'
4933  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4934  ttype = 'Br.pi=1'
4935  else
4936  ttype = 'Br.unknown'
4937  end if
4938  end if
4939 
4940  if(atom%ttype.eq.'I') then
4941  if(group%num_pi.eq.0) then
4942  ttype = 'I.pi=0'
4943  elseif(group%num_pi.eq.1) then
4944  ttype = 'I.pi=1'
4945  else
4946  ttype = 'I.unknown'
4947  end if
4948  end if
4949 
4950  if(atom%ttype.eq.'Si') ttype = 'Si'
4951 end subroutine molecule_get_xlogp_type
4952 
4953 
4954 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
4955 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
4956 
4957 ! XLIGAND MODULE
4958 
4959 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
4960 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
4961 
4962 subroutine ligand_scoring_stats(ligand,iAtom)
4963  type(txligand) :: ligand
4964  integer,optional:: iatom
4965  integer :: i
4966  real :: vdw, hb, hp, hm, hs, rt, score
4967 
4968  vdw = 0
4969  hb = 0
4970  hp = 0
4971  hm = 0
4972  hs = 0
4973  rt = 0
4974  score = 0
4975 
4976 
4977  if(present(iatom)) then
4978  i = iatom
4979  write(*,'(t81,i3, t85,a, t28,f6.1, t36,f5.2, t43,f5.2, t51,f5.2, t57,f5.2, t65,f4.1, t73,f6.3)') &
4980  ligand%mol%atom(i)%id, ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype, ligand%abs_inf(i)%vdw, ligand%abs_inf(i)%hb, ligand%abs_inf(i)%hp, &
4981  ligand%abs_inf(i)%hm, ligand%abs_inf(i)%hs, ligand%abs_inf(i)%rt, ligand%abs_inf(i)%score
4982  else
4983  write(*,'(t31,a3, t38,a2, t46,a2, t52,a2, t60,a2,&
4984  t67,a2, t74,a5)') 'VDW', 'HB', 'HP', 'HM', &
4985  'HS', 'RT', 'SCORE'
4986  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
4987  ! write(*,'(t28,f6.1, t36,f4.1, t43,f5.1, t51,f3.1, t57,f5.1, t65,f4.1, t74,f5.2)')
4988  write(*,'(t1,i3, t6,a, t28,f6.1, t36,f5.2, t43,f5.2, t51,f5.2, t57,f5.2, t65,f4.1, t73,f6.3)') &
4989  ligand%mol%atom(i)%id, ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype, &
4990  ligand%abs_inf(i)%vdw, ligand%abs_inf(i)%hb, &
4991  ligand%abs_inf(i)%hp, &
4992  ligand%abs_inf(i)%hm, ligand%abs_inf(i)%hs, &
4993  ligand%abs_inf(i)%rt, ligand%abs_inf(i)%score
4994 
4995  vdw = vdw + ligand%abs_inf(i)%vdw
4996  hb = hb + ligand%abs_inf(i)%hb
4997  hp = hp + ligand%abs_inf(i)%hp
4998  hm = hm + ligand%abs_inf(i)%hm
4999  hs = hs + ligand%abs_inf(i)%hs
5000  rt = rt + ligand%abs_inf(i)%rt
5001  score = score + ligand%mol%atom(i)%score
5002 
5003  end do
5004 
5005  write(*,'(a)') ' --------------------------------------------------'
5006  end if
5007 
5008 end subroutine ligand_scoring_stats
5009 
5010 real function ligand_calculate_binding_score(ligand,input,protein)
5011  type(txligand) :: ligand
5012  type(txinput) :: input
5013  type(txprotein) :: protein
5014  integer :: i
5015  type(txligand) :: bak
5016  integer :: num_nonh=0
5017  real :: sum=0.000
5018 
5019  bak = ligand ! backup the atomic charge information
5020 
5021  ! these scoring functions may need formal charges
5022  call molecule_assign_apparent_charge(ligand%mol)
5023 
5024 
5025  ! prepare for atomic binding score
5026  if(.not. associated(ligand%abs_inf)) then
5027  allocate(ligand%abs_inf(0:ligand%mol%num_atom -1),stat=err) ! create array of atomic binding score, one element for each atom in ligand
5028  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
5029  end if
5030 
5031  ! initialize binding scores to 0%0
5032  ligand%abs_inf(:)%pkd1 = 0.000
5033  ligand%abs_inf(:)%pkd2 = 0.000
5034  ligand%abs_inf(:)%pkd3 = 0.000
5035  ligand%abs_inf(:)%vdw = 0.000
5036  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hb = 0.000
5037  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hm = 0.000
5038  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hp = 0.000
5039  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hs = 0.000
5040  ligand%abs_inf(:)%rt = 0.000
5041  ligand%abs_inf(:)%score = 0.000
5042 
5043  ! clean other variables
5044  ligand%pkd1 = 0
5045  ligand%pkd2 = 0
5046  ligand%pkd3 = 0
5047  ligand%vdw = 0
5048  ligand%hb = 0
5049  ligand%hm = 0
5050  ligand%hp = 0
5051  ligand%hs = 0
5052  ligand%rt = 0
5053 
5054  ! first, generate dot surface
5055  call molecule_generate_surface_dots(ligand%mol, water_r)
5056 
5057  ! now calculate the van der Waals term
5058  ligand%vdw = ligand_calculate_vdw(ligand,protein)
5059  ligand%abs_inf(:)%vdw = ligand%mol%atom(:)%score
5060 
5061  ! now calculate the H-bond term
5062  ligand%hb=ligand_calculate_hb(ligand,protein)
5063  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hb=ligand%mol%atom(:)%score
5064 
5065  ! now calculate the rotor term
5066  ligand%rt=ligand_calculate_rt(ligand,protein)
5067  ligand%abs_inf(:)%rt=ligand%mol%atom(:)%score
5068 
5069  ! now calculate the hydrophobic term
5070  if(input%apply_hpscore.eq.'YES') then
5071  ligand%hp=ligand_calculate_hp(ligand,protein)
5072  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hp=ligand%Mol%atom(:)%score
5073  ligand%pkd1=input%hpscore_c0 + &
5074  input%hpscore_cvdw*ligand%vdw + &
5075  input%hpscore_chb*ligand%hb + &
5076  input%hpscore_chp*ligand%hp + &
5077  input%hpscore_crt*ligand%rt
5078  end if
5079 
5080  if(input%apply_hmscore.eq.'YES') then
5081  ligand%hm=ligand_calculate_hm(ligand,protein)
5082  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hm=ligand%mol%atom(:)%score
5083  ligand%pkd2=input%hmscore_c0+ &
5084  input%hmscore_cvdw*ligand%vdw+ &
5085  input%hmscore_chb*ligand%hb+ &
5086  input%hmscore_chm*ligand%hm+ &
5087  input%hmscore_crt*ligand%rt
5088 
5089  end if
5090 
5091  if(input%apply_hsscore.eq.'YES') then
5092  ligand%hs=ligand_calculate_hs(ligand,protein)
5093  ligand%abs_inf(:)%hs=ligand%mol%atom(:)%score
5094  ligand%pkd3=input%hsscore_c0+ &
5095  input%hsscore_cvdw* ligand%vdw+ &
5096  input%hsscore_chb * ligand%hb+ &
5097  input%hsscore_chs * ligand%hs+ &
5098  input%hsscore_crt * ligand%rt
5099  end if
5100 
5101  ligand%bind_score=(ligand%pkd1+ligand%pkd2+ligand%pkd3)/(input%num_method)
5102 
5103  ! now compute atomic binding scores
5104  num_nonh = molecule_get_num_heavy_atom(ligand%mol)
5105 
5106  if(input%apply_hpscore.eq.'YES') then
5107  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5108  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
5109  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 1
5110 
5111  ligand%abs_inf(i)%pkd1 = input%hpscore_c0/num_nonh + &
5112  input%hpscore_cvdw * ligand%abs_inf(i)%vdw + &
5113  input%hpscore_chb * ligand%abs_inf(i)%hb + &
5114  input%hpscore_chp * ligand%abs_inf(i)%hp + &
5115  input%hpscore_crt * ligand%abs_inf(i)%rt
5116 1 end do
5117  end if
5118 
5119  if(input%apply_hmscore.eq.'YES') then
5120  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5121  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 2
5122  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 2
5123 
5124  ligand%abs_inf(i)%pkd2 = input%hmscore_c0/num_nonh + &
5125  input%hmscore_cvdw * ligand%abs_inf(i)%vdw + &
5126  input%hmscore_chb * ligand%abs_inf(i)%hb + &
5127  input%hmscore_chm * ligand%abs_inf(i)%hm + &
5128  input%hmscore_crt * ligand%abs_inf(i)%rt
5129 2 end do
5130  end if
5131 
5132  if(input%apply_hsscore.eq.'YES') then
5133  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5134  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 3
5135  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 3
5136 
5137  ligand%abs_inf(i)%pkd3 = input%hsscore_c0/num_nonh + &
5138  input%hsscore_cvdw * ligand%abs_inf(i)%vdw + &
5139  input%hsscore_chb * ligand%abs_inf(i)%hb + &
5140  input%hsscore_chs * ligand%abs_inf(i)%hs + &
5141  input%hsscore_crt * ligand%abs_inf(i)%rt
5142 3 end do
5143  end if
5144 
5145  sum = 0
5146  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5147  ligand%abs_inf(i)%score=0
5148  ligand%abs_inf(i)%score=ligand%abs_inf(i)%score+ligand%abs_inf(i)%pkd1
5149  ligand%abs_inf(i)%score=ligand%abs_inf(i)%score+ligand%abs_inf(i)%pkd2
5150  ligand%abs_inf(i)%score=ligand%abs_inf(i)%score+ligand%abs_inf(i)%pkd3
5151  ligand%abs_inf(i)%score=ligand%abs_inf(i)%score/input%num_method
5152  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=ligand%abs_inf(i)%score
5153  sum= sum + ligand%mol%atom(i)%score
5154  end do
5155 
5156  if(input%show_abs.eq.'YES') then ! use abs as charges
5157  ligand%mol%charge_type = 'USER_CHARGES'
5158  ligand%mol%atom(:)%q = ligand%abs_inf(:)%score
5159  else ! restore original charges
5160  ligand%mol%charge_type = bak%mol%charge_type
5161  ligand%mol%atom(:)%q=bak%mol%atom(:)%q
5162  end if
5163 
5164 
5165  ligand_calculate_binding_score = ligand%bind_score
5166 end function ligand_calculate_binding_score
5167 
5168 subroutine ligand_sum_hbonds(ligand, protein, num_candidate, candidate)
5169  type(txligand) :: ligand
5170  type(txprotein) :: protein
5171  integer :: num_candidate
5172  type(txhbond) :: candidate(0:999)
5173  type(txhbond) :: tmp_hbond ! used in swap
5174  integer :: i,j,k,count,limit,latom,patom
5175  real :: angle,v1(0:2),v2(0:2)
5176  type(txgroup) :: tmp_group
5177 
5178  ! Step 1: rank candidates according their strength in decreasing order
5179  ! note 'fabs' is applied because SB strength could be negative
5180  do i = 0,num_candidate-1 -1
5181  do j = i+1,num_candidate -1
5182  if(abs(candidate(i)%score)>=abs(candidate(j)%score)) goto 1
5183 ! write(*,*) 'swapping ', i, j
5184  !call SWAP(candidate(i),candidate(j))
5185  call hbond_operator_copy(tmp_hbond,candidate(i))
5186  call hbond_operator_copy(candidate(i),candidate(j))
5187  call hbond_operator_copy(candidate(j),tmp_hbond)
5188 1 end do
5189  end do
5190 
5191  ! Step 2: check the angular limit: the angle between any two H-bonds
5192  ! on the same atom must be larger than 45 degrees
5193  ! note that this filter could be applied to both ligand and protein
5194  do i = 0,num_candidate-1 -1
5195  do j = i+1,num_candidate -1
5196  if(candidate(i)%latom.ne.candidate(j)%latom) goto 2
5197  do k = 0,3 -1
5198  latom = candidate(i)%latom
5199  patom = candidate(i)%patom
5200  v1(k) = protein%atom(patom-1)%coor(k)-ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%coor(k)
5201  latom = candidate(j)%latom
5202  patom = candidate(j)%patom
5203  v2(k) = protein%atom(patom-1)%coor(k)-ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%coor(k)
5204  end do
5205 
5206  angle=abs(angle_of_two_vectors(v1,v2))
5207 
5208  if(angle<45.0) then
5209  candidate(j)%score=0.000
5210  else
5211  goto 2
5212  end if
5213 2 end do
5214  end do
5215 
5216 ! THIS SECTION NOT USED IN ORIGINAL SOURCE
5217 ! do i = 0,num_candidate-1 -1
5218 ! do j = i,num_candidate -1
5219 ! if(candidate(i)%patom.ne.candidate(j)%patom) goto 3
5220 ! do k = 0,3 -1
5221 ! latom = candidate(i)%latom
5222 ! patom = candidate(i)%patom
5223 ! v1(k) = ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%coor(k)-protein%atom(patom-1)%coor(k)
5224 ! latom = candidate(j)%latom
5225 ! patom = candidate(j)%patom
5226 ! v2(k) = ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%coor(k)-protein%atom(patom-1)%coor(k)
5227 ! end do
5228 !
5229 ! angle=abs(Angle_of_Two_Vectors(v1,v2))
5230 ! if(angle<45.0) then
5231 ! candidate(j)%score=0.000
5232 ! else
5233 ! goto 3
5234 ! end if
5235 !3 end do
5236 ! end do
5237 
5238  ! Step 3: a donor atom shall not form more H-bonds than the H atoms it has
5239  ! note that this filter is applied only to the ligand side
5240  do i = 0,num_candidate-1 -1
5241  if(candidate(i)%ttype.ne.1) goto 4
5242 
5243  count=1
5244  latom=candidate(i)%latom
5245 
5246  if(ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%hb.eq.'DA') then
5247  limit=1
5248  else
5249  tmp_group=molecule_find_a_group(ligand%mol,latom)
5250  limit=tmp_group%num_h
5251  end if
5252 
5253  do j = i+1,num_candidate -1
5254  if(candidate(j)%ttype.ne.1) goto 5
5255  if(candidate(i)%latom.ne.candidate(j)%latom) goto 5
5256 
5257  count = count +1
5258 
5259  if(count<=limit) then
5260  goto 5
5261  else
5262  candidate(j)%score=0.000
5263  end if
5264 5 end do
5265 4 end do
5266 
5267  ! Step 4: an acceptor atom shall not form more H-bonds than its LPs
5268  ! note that this filter is applied only to the ligand side
5269  do i = 0,num_candidate-1 -1
5270  if(candidate(i)%ttype.ne.2.and.candidate(i)%ttype.ne.3) goto 6
5271 
5272  count=1
5273  latom=candidate(i)%latom
5274 
5275  if(ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%ttype(1:1).eq.'O') then
5276  limit=2
5277  elseif(ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%ttype(1:1).eq.'N') then
5278  limit=1
5279  elseif(ligand%mol%atom(latom-1)%ttype(1:1).eq.'S') then
5280  limit=2
5281  end if
5282 
5283  do j = i+1,num_candidate -1
5284  if(candidate(j)%ttype.ne.2.and.candidate(j)%ttype.ne.3) goto 7
5285  if(candidate(i)%latom.ne.candidate(j)%latom) goto 7
5286 
5287  count = count +1
5288 
5289  if(count<=limit) then
5290  goto 7
5291  else
5292  candidate(j)%score=0.000
5293  end if
5294 7 end do
5295 6 end do
5296 end subroutine ligand_sum_hbonds
5297 
5298 real function ligand_calculate_rt(ligand,protein)
5299  type(txligand) :: ligand
5300  type(txprotein) :: protein
5301  integer :: i,j,mark,tmp
5302  integer :: id1,id2
5303  real :: sum
5304 
5305  ! if a single bond is normal, bond%valid=1
5306  ! if a single bond is a rotor, bond%valid=2
5307 
5308  ! clean the variables
5309  ligand%mol%atom(:)%score=0.000
5310 
5311  !call Molecule_Show_Contents(ligand%mol)
5312  !chSlask = getcharqq()
5313 
5314  ! eliminate all the bonds in_ring and all the non-single bonds
5315  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_bond -1
5316  if(ligand%mol%bond(i)%ring>0) then
5317 ! write(*,*) 'in ring: ', i, ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1, ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2
5318  goto 1
5319  elseif(ligand%mol%bond(i)%ttype.ne.'1') then
5320 ! write(*,*) 'non-single: ', i, ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1, ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2
5321  goto 1
5322  end if
5323  ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid=2
5324 1 end do
5325 
5326  ! eliminate all the R-H, R-X, R-OH, R-NH2, R-CH3 bonds
5327  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_bond -1
5328  if(ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) then
5329 ! write(*,*) 'R- bond: ', i, ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1, ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2
5330  goto 2
5331  end if
5332  id1=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1
