5333  id2=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2
5334  if(ligand%mol%atom(id1-1)%num_nonh.eq.1.or.ligand%mol%atom(id2-1)%num_nonh.eq.1) ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid=1
5335 2 end do
5336 
5337  ! sp2-sp2 rotors
5338  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_bond -1
5339  if(ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) goto 3
5340  id1=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1
5341  id2=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2
5342  mark=0
5343 
5344 
5345  tmp=molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type(ligand%mol,ligand%mol%atom(id1-1)%ttype)
5346  if((tmp.eq.1).or.(tmp.eq.2)) mark = mark +1
5347 
5348  tmp=molecule_get_atom_hybridizing_type(ligand%mol,ligand%mol%atom(id2-1)%ttype)
5349  if((tmp.eq.1).or.(tmp.eq.2)) mark = mark +1
5350 
5351  if(mark.eq.2) then
5352  ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid=1
5353  goto 3
5354  end if
5355 3 end do
5356 
5357  ! eliminate terminal rotors, e%g% -PO3, -CF3, -CMe3, -NMe3
5358  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_bond -1
5359  if(ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) goto 4
5360 
5361  id1=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1
5362  id2=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2
5363 
5364  if(molecule_judge_terminal_atom(ligand%mol,ligand%mol%atom(id1-1),id2).eq.1) then
5365  ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid=1
5366  elseif(molecule_judge_terminal_atom(ligand%mol,ligand%mol%atom(id2-1),id1).eq.1) then
5367  ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid=1
5368  else
5369  goto 4
5370  end if
5371 4 end do
5372 
5373  ! eliminate abnormal rotors
5374  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_bond -1
5375  if(ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid.ne.2) goto 5
5376  id1=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1
5377  id2=ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2
5378 
5379  if(ligand%mol%atom(id1-1)%valid<=0) then
5380  ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid=1
5381  elseif(ligand%mol%atom(id2-1)%valid<=0) then
5382  ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid=1
5383  else
5384  goto 5
5385  end if
5386 5 end do
5387 
5388 
5389 
5390  ! now count the frozen rotors, all the rotors have been labeled as 2
5391  ! notice: the following part is different from subroutine Molecule_Count_Rotor()
5392  sum=0.000
5393  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5394  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 6
5395 
5396  mark=0
5397 
5398  do j = 0,ligand%mol%atom(i)%num_neib -1
5399  tmp=ligand%mol%atom(i)%bond(j)
5400  if(tmp.eq.0) then
5401  goto 7
5402  elseif(ligand%mol%bond(tmp-1)%valid.ne.2) then
5403  goto 7
5404  else
5405  mark = mark +1
5406  end if
5407 7 end do
5408 
5409  if(mark.eq.1) then
5410  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=ligand%mol%atom(i)%score+0.50
5411  elseif(mark.eq.2) then
5412  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=ligand%mol%atom(i)%score+1.00
5413  elseif(mark>=3) then
5414  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=ligand%mol%atom(i)%score+0.50
5415  end if
5416 
5417  sum=sum+ligand%mol%atom(i)%score
5418 6 end do
5419 
5420  ligand_calculate_rt = sum
5421 end function ligand_calculate_rt
5422 
5423 real function ligand_calculate_hp(ligand,protein)
5424  type(txligand) :: ligand
5425  type(txprotein) :: protein
5426  integer :: i,j
5427  real :: d,d1,d2,cutoff
5428  real :: tmp,asum,sum
5429 
5430  sum=0.000
5431  ligand%mol%atom(:)%score=0.000
5432 
5433  cutoff=dist_cutoff
5434 
5435  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5436  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
5437  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.ne.'H') goto 1
5438 
5439  asum=0.000
5440 
5441  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
5442  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.ne.2) then
5443  goto 2
5444  elseif(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'H') then
5445  goto 2
5446  elseif(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'O.w') then
5447  goto 2
5448  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.ne.'H') then
5449  goto 2
5450  end if
5451 
5452  d=distance(ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor, protein%atom(j)%coor)
5453  if(d>=cutoff) goto 2
5454 
5455  d1=ligand%mol%atom(i)%R+protein%atom(j)%R+0.500
5456  d2=ligand%mol%atom(i)%R+protein%atom(j)%R+2.200
5457 
5458  if(d<d1) then
5459  tmp=1.000
5460  elseif(d<d2) then
5461  tmp=(1/(d1-d2))*(d-d2)
5462  else
5463  tmp=0.000
5464  end if
5465 
5466  asum=asum+tmp
5467 2 end do
5468 
5469  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=asum
5470  sum=sum+asum
5471 1 end do
5472 
5473  ligand_calculate_hp = sum
5474 end function ligand_calculate_hp
5475 
5476 real function ligand_calculate_hm(ligand,protein)
5477  type(txligand) :: ligand
5478  type(txprotein) :: protein
5479  integer :: i,j
5480  real :: asum,sum,tmp,d,d1,d2,total,cutoff
5481 
5482  ligand%mol%atom(:)%score=0.000
5483 
5484  sum=0.000
5485  cutoff=dist_cutoff
5486 
5487  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5488  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
5489  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 1
5490  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.ne.'H') goto 1
5491  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%logp<=0.00) goto 1
5492 
5493  total=0.000
5494  asum=0.000
5495 
5496  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
5497  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.ne.2) goto 2
5498  if(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 2
5499  if(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'O.w') goto 2
5500 
5501  d=distance(ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor, protein%atom(j)%coor)
5502  if(d>cutoff) goto 2
5503 
5504  d1=ligand%mol%atom(i)%R+protein%atom(j)%R+0.50
5505  d2=ligand%mol%atom(i)%R+protein%atom(j)%R+2.20
5506 
5507  if(d<d1) then
5508  tmp=1.000
5509  elseif(d<d2) then
5510  tmp=(1/(d1-d2))*(d-d2)
5511  else
5512  tmp=0.000
5513  end if
5514 
5515  total=total + (protein%atom(j)%logp*tmp)
5516 2 end do
5517 
5518  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%logp>=0.50) then
5519  asum=ligand%mol%atom(i)%logp
5520  elseif(total>-0.50) then
5521  asum=ligand%mol%atom(i)%logp
5522  else
5523  asum=0.000
5524  end if
5525 
5526  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=asum
5527  sum=sum+asum
5528 1 end do
5529 
5530  ligand_calculate_hm = sum
5531 end function ligand_calculate_hm
5532 
5533 real function ligand_calculate_hs(ligand,protein)
5534  type(txligand) :: ligand
5535  type(txprotein) :: protein
5536  integer :: i
5537  real :: sum,total,buried
5538  real :: slask
5539 
5540  ! clear the variables first
5541  sum=0.000
5542  ligand%mol%atom(:)%score=0.000
5543 
5544  ! then get the buried surface atom by atom
5545  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5546  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
5547  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 1
5548  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'DH') goto 1
5549  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'D') goto 1
5550  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'A') goto 1
5551  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'DA') goto 1
5552  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'P') goto 1
5553  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'N') goto 1
5554 
5555  slask = ligand_atom_buried_surface(ligand,protein,i+1,total,buried)
5556 
5557  sum=sum+buried
5558  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=buried
5559 
5560  ! sum+=(buried*this->atom(i)%logp)
5561  ! this option works *slightly* better
5562 1 end do
5563 
5564  ligand_calculate_hs = sum
5565 end function ligand_calculate_hs
5566 
5567 real function ligand_calculate_vdw(ligand,protein)
5568  type(txligand) :: ligand
5569  type(txprotein) :: protein
5570  integer :: i,j
5571  real :: cutoff,d0,d,tmp,tmp1,tmp2,sum,asum
5572 
5573  ! clear the variables
5574  cutoff=dist_cutoff
5575  sum=0.000
5576 
5577  ligand%mol%atom(:)%score=0.000
5578 
5579  ! now calculate the P-L vdw interaction
5580  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5581  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
5582  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 1
5583 
5584  asum=0.000
5585 
5586  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
5587  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.ne.2) goto 2
5588  if(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 2
5589  if(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'O.w') goto 2
5590 
5591  d0=ligand%mol%atom(i)%R+protein%atom(j)%R
5592  d=distance(ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor,protein%atom(j)%coor)
5593 
5594  if(d>cutoff) goto 2
5595 
5596  tmp1=d0/d
5597  tmp1=tmp1*tmp1*tmp1*tmp1
5598  tmp2=tmp1*tmp1
5599  tmp=tmp2-2.0*tmp1
5600 
5601  asum = asum + tmp
5602 2 end do
5603 
5604  ! revert the sign
5605  asum=asum*(-1.00)
5606 
5607  ! if ligand atom has unfavorable contribution then neglect it =============== FRGA NERVALL OM DETTA ===============
5608  if(asum<0.00) then
5609  goto 1
5610  else
5611  sum=sum+asum
5612  ligand%mol%atom(i)%score=asum
5613  end if
5614 1 end do
5615 
5616  ligand_calculate_vdw = sum
5617 end function ligand_calculate_vdw
5618 
5619 real function ligand_calculate_hb(ligand,protein)
5620  type(txligand) :: ligand
5621  type(txprotein) :: protein
5622  integer :: i
5623  real :: sum
5624  integer :: num_candidate
5625  type(txhbond),allocatable :: candidate(:)
5626 
5627  ! clear the variables
5628  sum=0.000
5629  num_candidate=0
5630  ligand%mol%atom(:)%score=0.000
5631 
5632  allocate(candidate(0:1000-1),stat=err) ! worst case
5633  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
5634 
5635  ! first, get the HB pairs between protein and ligand
5636  num_candidate=ligand_get_hbond_pair_pl(ligand,protein,candidate)
5637 ! write(*,*) 'num_candidate = ', num_candidate
5638 ! do i = 0,num_candidate -1
5639 ! write(*,*) candidate(i)%valid,candidate(i)%ttype,candidate(i)%d_type,candidate(i)%a_type,candidate(i)%sb,candidate(i)%latom,candidate(i)%patom
5640 ! end do
5641 ! chSlask = getcharqq()
5642 
5643  call ligand_sum_hbonds(ligand,protein,num_candidate,candidate)
5644 
5645  ! then sum their contributions
5646  do i = 0,num_candidate -1
5647  if(abs(candidate(i)%score)<0.01) then
5648  goto 1
5649  else
5650  sum=sum+candidate(i)%score
5651  ligand%mol%atom(candidate(i)%latom-1)%score= ligand%mol%atom(candidate(i)%latom-1)%score + candidate(i)%score
5652  end if
5653 1 end do
5654 
5655  deallocate(candidate)
5656  ligand_calculate_hb = sum
5657 end function ligand_calculate_hb
5658 
5659 integer function ligand_get_hbond_pair_pl(ligand,protein,candidate)
5660  type(txligand) :: ligand
5661  type(txprotein) :: protein
5662  type(txhbond) :: candidate(0:999)
5663  integer :: i,j,num,ttype ,slask
5664  integer :: sb
5665  real :: d,cutoff
5666  type(txhbond) :: tmp_candidate
5667 
5668  num=0
5669  cutoff=5.00
5670 
5671  ! note that the following H-bond algorithm is not based on any
5672  ! explicit hydrogen atom at all, and this is the right thing to do%
5673  do i = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
5674  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 1
5675  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 1
5676  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'N') goto 1
5677  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'H') goto 1
5678  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'P') goto 1
5679  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'DH') goto 1
5680 
5681  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
5682  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.ne.2) goto 2
5683  if(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'H') goto 2
5684  if(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'O.w') goto 2
5685  if(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'H') goto 2
5686  if(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'P') goto 2
5687  if(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'N') goto 2
5688 
5689  ! determine the ttype of ligand H-bond first
5690  ! ttype=0, no H-bond
5691  ! ttype=1, latom is the donor.eq. patom is the acceptor
5692  ! ttype=2, latom is the acceptor.eq. patom is the donor
5693  ! ttype=3, latom bound with metal ion
5694  if(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'D') then
5695  if(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'D') then
5696  ttype=0
5697  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'A') then
5698  ttype=1
5699  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'DA') then
5700  ttype=1
5701  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'M') then
5702  ttype=0
5703  else
5704  ttype=0
5705  end if
5706  elseif(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'A') then
5707  if(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'D') then
5708  ttype=2
5709  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'A') then
5710  ttype=0
5711  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'DA') then
5712  ttype=2
5713  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'M') then
5714  ttype=3
5715  else
5716  ttype=0
5717  end if
5718  elseif(ligand%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'DA') then
5719  if(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'A') then
5720  ttype=1
5721  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'D') then
5722  ttype=2
5723  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'DA') then
5724  ttype=1
5725  elseif(protein%atom(j)%hb.eq.'M') then
5726  ttype=3
5727  else
5728  ttype=0
5729  end if
5730  else
5731  ttype=0
5732  end if
5733 
5734  if(ttype.eq.0) goto 2 ! no H-bond
5735 
5736  ! a crude distance check
5737  d=distance(ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor,protein%atom(j)%coor)
5738  if(d>cutoff) goto 2
5739 
5740  ! this section is used to differentiate HB and SB
5741  if((ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'O.co2').and.(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'O.co2')) then
5742  sb=0
5743  elseif(abs(ligand%mol%atom(i)%q)>0.01.and.abs(protein%atom(j)%q)>0.01) then
5744  sb=1
5745  else
5746  sb=0
5747  end if
5748 
5749  ! now handle ligand h-bond
5750  call hbond_clear(tmp_candidate)
5751  tmp_candidate%ttype=ttype
5752  tmp_candidate%sb=sb
5753  tmp_candidate%latom=i+1
5754  tmp_candidate%patom=j+1
5755 
5756  if(ttype.eq.1) then
5757  tmp_candidate%D=ligand%mol%atom(i)
5758  tmp_candidate%A=protein%atom(j)
5759  elseif(ttype.eq.2) then
5760  tmp_candidate%A=ligand%mol%atom(i)
5761  tmp_candidate%D=protein%atom(j)
5762  elseif(ttype.eq.3) then
5763  tmp_candidate%A=ligand%mol%atom(i)
5764  tmp_candidate%D=protein%atom(j)
5765  end if
5766 
5767  slask = hbond_value_hbond_2(tmp_candidate)
5768 
5769  if(abs(tmp_candidate%score)>0.000) then
5770  candidate(num)=tmp_candidate
5771  num = num +1
5772  else
5773  goto 2
5774  end if
5775 2 end do
5776 1 end do
5777 
5778  ligand_get_hbond_pair_pl =num
5779 end function ligand_get_hbond_pair_pl
5780 
5781 subroutine ligand_value_atom(ligand,lite_run)
5782  type(txligand),intent(inout) :: ligand
5783  integer,optional :: lite_run
5784  integer :: mark
5785 
5786  if(.not. present(lite_run)) mark = molecule_valueatom(ligand%mol)
5787 
5788  ! now compute the H-bond root for each HB atom
5789  call ligand_calculate_hb_root(ligand)
5790 
5791  ! assign atomic logp values, which is needed by binding score
5792  ! atomic logp is not read from ATOM_DEF_XTOOL!
5793  if(.not. present(lite_run)) ligand%mol%logp = molecule_calculate_logp(ligand%mol)
5794 
5795  ! some other molecular properties
5796  if(.not. present(lite_run)) ligand%mol%num_hb_atom = molecule_get_num_hb_atom(ligand%mol)
5797  if(.not. present(lite_run)) ligand%mol%num_rotor = molecule_count_rotor(ligand%mol)
5798 end subroutine ligand_value_atom
5799 
5800 subroutine ligand_calculate_hb_root(lig)
5801  type(txligand) :: lig
5802  integer :: i,j,tmp,num_nonh
5803  real :: tmpx,tmpy,tmpz
5804 
5805  do i = 0,lig%mol%num_atom -1
5806  if(lig%mol%atom(i)%valid==0) then
5807  goto 1
5808  else if(lig%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'N') then
5809  goto 1
5810  else if(lig%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'H') then
5811  goto 1
5812  else if(lig%mol%atom(i)%hb.eq.'P') then
5813  goto 1
5814  end if
5815 
5816  tmpx=0
5817  tmpy=0
5818  tmpz=0.000
5819  num_nonh=0
5820 
5821  do j = 0,lig%mol%atom(i)%num_neib -1
5822  tmp=lig%mol%atom(i)%neib(j)-1
5823  if(lig%mol%atom(tmp)%ttype(1:1)=='H') then
5824  goto 2
5825  else
5826  tmpx=tmpx+lig%mol%atom(tmp)%coor(0)
5827  tmpy=tmpy+lig%mol%atom(tmp)%coor(1)
5828  tmpz=tmpz+lig%mol%atom(tmp)%coor(2)
5829  num_nonh = num_nonh + 1
5830  end if
5831 2 end do
5832 
5833  if(num_nonh==0) then
5834  lig%mol%atom(i)%hb = 'P'
5835  else
5836  tmpx=tmpx/num_nonh
5837  tmpy=tmpy/num_nonh
5838  tmpz=tmpz/num_nonh
5839  lig%mol%atom(i)%root(0)=tmpx
5840  lig%mol%atom(i)%root(1)=tmpy
5841  lig%mol%atom(i)%root(2)=tmpz
5842  end if
5843 1 end do
5844 end subroutine ligand_calculate_hb_root
5845 
5846 
5847 !################################################################
5848 !# Translate list of q-atoms and bonds to xscore-type ligand.
5849 !# If offset input eq 0 then
5850 !################################################################
5851 subroutine xligand_translate(ligand,nAtoms,nBonds,aQ,aB)
5852  type(txligand),intent(out) :: ligand
5853  integer,intent(in) :: natoms, nbonds
5854  type(q_atom),dimension(:),intent(in) :: aq
5855  type(q_bond),dimension(:),intent(in) :: ab
5856 ! integer :: offset
5857  integer :: i, mark,ires,atom_res_id
5858  type(txbond) :: tmp
5859 
5860  ! set number of qatoms
5861  ligand%mol%num_atom = natoms
5862  allocate(ligand%mol%atom(0:natoms -1),stat=err) ! old c++ code req. 0:...
5863  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
5864  ligand%mol%num_bond = nbonds
5865  allocate(ligand%mol%bond(0:nbonds -1),stat=err) ! old c++ code req. 0:...
5866  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
5867 
5868  !Set residue offset, provided that ligand is after protein
5869  if (offset .eq. 0) then
5870  do i=1,nres_solute
5871  if (iqseq(1) <= res(i)%start) then
5872  ires = i
5873  exit
5874  end if
5875  end do
5876 ! offset=res(iRes)%start-1
5877  end if
5878 
5879 atom_res_id=0
5880  do i = 0,natoms-1
5881  ligand%mol%atom(i)%id = i +1
5882  ligand%mol%atom(i)%topindex = iqseq(i+1)
5883  ligand%mol%atom(i)%name = ''
5884  ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor(0) = xtop(3*(iqseq(i+1)-1) +1)
5885  ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor(1) = xtop(3*(iqseq(i+1)-1) +2)
5886  ligand%mol%atom(i)%coor(2) = xtop(3*(iqseq(i+1)-1) +3)
5887  ligand%mol%atom(i)%origin = 1 ! This is a ligand atom
5888  ligand%mol%atom(i)%ttype = tac(iac(iqseq(i+1)))
5889  ligand%mol%atom(i)%weight = iaclib(iac(iqseq(i+1)))%mass
5890  ligand%mol%atom(i)%solv = 0
5891  ligand%mol%atom(i)%bfactor = 0
5892  ligand%mol%atom(i)%logp = 0
5893  ligand%mol%atom(i)%valid = 1
5894 ! if(masks(1)%mask(i+1)) ligand%mol%atom(i)%mask = 1 !masks(1)%mask(i+1)
5895  ligand%mol%atom(i)%occupancy = 1.0 ! default
5896  ligand%mol%atom(i)%neib(:) = 0
5897  ligand%mol%atom(i)%bond(:) = 0
5898  ligand%mol%atom(i)%root(:) = 0
5899 
5900  if(ires<nres) then
5901  if(atom_res_id + res(ires)%start >= res(ires+1)%start) then
5902  ires = ires +1
5903  atom_res_id = 0
5904  end if
5905  end if
5906 
5907  atom_res_id = atom_res_id +1
5908  ligand%mol%atom(i)%atom_res_id = atom_res_id
5909  ligand%mol%atom(i)%residue = res(ires)%name !What is function of this?
5910  write(ligand%mol%atom(i)%res_id, '(I8)') ires ! use internal read to convert integer -> character
5911  end do
5912 
5913  do i = 0,nbonds-1
5914  ligand%mol%bond(i)%id = i +1 ! meanwhile
5915  ligand%mol%bond(i)%valid = 1
5916  ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1 = ab(i +1)%a%top_nr - aq(1)%top_nr +1 ! Remove offset so that first q-atom has index 1
5917  ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2 = ab(i +1)%b%top_nr - aq(1)%top_nr +1
5918  ligand%mol%bond(i)%ttype = sybyl_bond_type(ab(i +1)%cod)
5919 
5920  if(adjustl(trim(ligand%mol%bond(i)%ttype)).eq.'') then
5921  write(*,'(a,i4,a)') '>>> WARNING: Ligand bond ', i+1, ' is of unknown type. Rings may not be correctly identified.'
5922  warn = warn +1
5923  end if
5924  end do
5925 
5926  ! Bubble sort bonds in increasing atom order
5927  do
5928  mark = 0
5929  do i = 0, nbonds -2
5930  if((ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.ligand%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1).and. &
5931  (ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2.eq.ligand%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) goto 2
5932  if(ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1 < ligand%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1) goto 2
5933  if((ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.ligand%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_1) .and. &
5934  (ligand%mol%bond(i)%atom_2<=ligand%mol%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) goto 2
5935 
5936  ! If no rule triggered, the bonds are in the wrong order
5937  mark = 1
5938  tmp = ligand%mol%bond(i)
5939  ligand%mol%bond(i) = ligand%mol%bond(i+1)
5940  ligand%mol%bond(i+1) = tmp
5941 2 end do
5942  if(mark.eq.0) exit
5943  end do
5944 
5945  ! Reset bond id
5946  do i = 0,nbonds -1
5947  ligand%mol%bond(i)%id = i +1
5948  end do
5949 
5950 end subroutine xligand_translate
5951 
5952 real function ligand_atom_buried_surface(ligand,protein,id_in, total, buried)
5953  type(txligand) :: ligand
5954  type(txprotein) :: protein
5955  integer :: id,id_in
5956  real :: total
5957  real :: buried
5958 
5959  integer :: j,k,num
5960  integer :: mark
5961  real :: d,ratio
5962  integer,allocatable :: atom_check_list(:)
5963 
5964  id = id_in
5965 
5966  allocate(atom_check_list(0:protein%num_atom-1),stat=err)
5967  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
5968 
5969  total=0
5970  buried=0.000
5971 
5972  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
5973  if((protein%atom(j)%valid.ne.2) .or. &
5974  (protein%atom(j)%xtype.eq.'H').or. &
5975  (protein%atom(j)%xtype.eq.'O.w')) then
5976 
5977  atom_check_list(j)=0
5978  goto 1
5979  end if
5980 
5981  d=distance(ligand%mol%atom(id-1)%coor,protein%atom(j)%coor)
5982 
5983  if(d>(ligand%mol%atom(id-1)%R+protein%atom(j)%R+2*water_r)) then
5984  atom_check_list(j)=0
5985  else
5986  atom_check_list(j)=1
5987  end if
5988 1 end do
5989 
5990  num=ligand%mol%num_sur_dot
5991  do j = 1,num ! === NOTE: CHANGED BOUNDARIES FROM 0,num-1 TO 1,num
5992  if(ligand%mol%sur_dot(j)%valid.ne.id) goto 2
5993 
5994  ! check if this dot is buried
5995  mark=0
5996  do k = 0,protein%num_atom -1
5997  if(atom_check_list(k).eq.0) goto 3
5998 
5999  d=distance(ligand%mol%sur_dot(j)%coor(0:2), protein%atom(k)%coor)
6000 
6001  if(d>(protein%atom(k)%R+water_r)) then
6002  goto 3
6003  else
6004  mark=1
6005  exit
6006  end if
6007 3 end do
6008 
6009  total=total + ligand%mol%sur_dot(j)%unit
6010 
6011  if(mark.eq.0) then
6012  goto 2
6013  else
6014  buried=buried + ligand%mol%sur_dot(j)%unit
6015  end if
6016 2 end do
6017 
6018  deallocate(atom_check_list)
6019 
6020  if(total<=0.00) then
6021  ratio=0.00
6022  else
6023  ratio=buried/total
6024  end if
6025 
6026  ligand_atom_buried_surface = ratio
6027 end function ligand_atom_buried_surface
6028 
6029 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6030 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6031 
6032 ! XFORECFIELD MODULE
6033 
6034 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6035 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6036 
6037 subroutine forcefield_read_surface_def(filename)
6038  character(len=80) :: filename
6039  integer :: fp
6040  integer :: i,count, filestat
6041  character(len=256):: buf,head
6042 
6043  fp = freefile()
6044  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
6045  ! first, determine num_sdot_type
6046  count=0
6047  do
6048  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6049  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6050  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 1 ! skip REM
6051  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 1 ! skip blank line
6052 
6053  if(buf(1:6).eq.'DOTSET') count = count +1
6054  else
6055  exit
6056  end if
6057 1 end do
6058 
6059  rewind(fp)
6060 
6061  ff%num_sdot_type=count
6062 
6063  allocate(ff%sdot(0:ff%num_sdot_type),stat=err)
6064  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
6065  ff%sdot(:)%max_dot = 0
6066  ff%sdot(:)%num_dot = 0
6067 
6068  ! now read pre-calculated volume dots
6069  count=0
6070  do
6071  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6072  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6073  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 2 ! skip REM
6074  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 2 ! skip blank line
6075 
6076  if(buf(1:3).eq.'END') exit
6077 
6078  head = buf(1:6)
6079  if(head.eq.'DOTSET') then
6080  read(buf(7:256),*,iostat=filestat) ff%sdot(count)%r,ff%sdot(count)%num_dot,ff%sdot(count)%unit,ff%sdot(count)%total
6081  ff%sdot(count)%ttype = 'Un'
6082 
6083 ! write(*,'(t1,a,t35,f3.1,t40,i4,t46,f5.2,t54,f6.2)') 'count, r, num_dot, unit, total = ', ff%sdot(count)%r,ff%sdot(count)%num_dot,ff%sdot(count)%unit,ff%sdot(count)%total
6084  allocate(ff%sdot(count)%dot(0:ff%sdot(count)%num_dot -1),stat=err)
6085  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
6086 
6087  do i = 0,ff%sdot(count)%num_dot -1
6088  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6089  read(buf(1:256),*,iostat=filestat) &
6090  ff%sdot(count)%dot(i)%coor(0), &
6091  ff%sdot(count)%dot(i)%coor(1), &
6092  ff%sdot(count)%dot(i)%coor(2)
6093 
6094  ff%sdot(count)%dot%valid=1
6095  ff%sdot(count)%dot%unit=ff%sdot(count)%unit
6096  ff%sdot(count)%dot%ttype = 'Un'
6097  end do
6098 
6099  count = count +1
6100  end if
6101  end if
6102 2 end do
6103 
6104  close(fp)
6105  return
6106 
6107 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
6108  stop
6109 end subroutine forcefield_read_surface_def
6110 
6111 type(txdotset) function forcefield_get_surface_dot(atom, r)
6112  type(txatom) :: atom
6113  real :: r
6114  real :: bigr
6115  type(txdotset) :: tmp_set
6116 
6117  bigr=atom%R+r
6118 
6119  tmp_set=forcefield_get_surface_dot_rxyz(bigr,atom%coor(0),atom%coor(1),atom%coor(2))
6120 
6121  tmp_set%ttype = atom%ttype
6122 
6123  tmp_set%dot(0:tmp_set%num_dot -1)%valid = atom%id
6124  tmp_set%dot(0:tmp_set%num_dot -1)%ttype = atom%ttype
6125 
6126  forcefield_get_surface_dot = tmp_set
6127 end function forcefield_get_surface_dot
6128 
6129 type(txdotset) function forcefield_get_surface_dot_rxyz(bigr, x, y, z)
6130  real :: bigr,x,y,z
6131  integer :: i,j,num
6132  integer :: mark
6133  real :: tmp,theta,phi,theta_step,phi_step
6134  real :: r,d,total
6135  type(txdotset) :: tmp_set
6136  type(txdot) :: tmp_dot
6137 
6138  ! check the pre-calculated surface dot sets
6139  mark=0
6140 
6141  do i = 0,ff%num_sdot_type -1
6142  if(abs(bigr-ff%sdot(i)%r)>0.025) then
6143  goto 1
6144  else
6145  !tmp_set=ff%sdot(i)
6146  call dotset_operator_copy(tmp_set,ff%sdot(i))
6147 
6148 ! write(*,*) 'selected sdot ', i, tmp_set%num_dot;
6149  mark=1
6150  exit
6151  end if
6152 1 end do
6153 
6154  if(mark.eq.1) then
6155  do i = 0,tmp_set%num_dot -1
6156  tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(0)=tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(0)+x
6157  tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(1)=tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(1)+y
6158  tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(2)=tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(2)+z
6159  end do
6160 
6161  forcefield_get_surface_dot_rxyz = tmp_set
6162  return
6163  end if
6164 
6165  ! if it is not pre-calculated, calculate it now
6166  ! === NOTE: THERE IS A BUG IN THIS SECTION, PROGRAM WILL NOT EXECUTE.
6167  ! === SAME BUG FOUND IN ORIGINAL c++ SOURCE
6168  total=(4.000*pi*bigr*bigr)
6169 
6170  ! d=0.500 // spacing between two dots
6171  d=sqrt(total/300)
6172  if(d<0.500) d=0.500
6173 
6174  tmp=int(pi*bigr/d+0.500)
6175  theta_step=pi/tmp
6176 
6177  num=0
6178  tmp_set%num_dot = 0
6179 
6180  !do theta = 0,PI -1, theta_step
6181  do i = 0,int(pi/theta_step)
6182  theta = theta_step*i
6183 
6184  r=bigr*sin(theta)
6185  tmp=int(2*pi*r/d+0.500)
6186  phi_step=2*pi/tmp
6187 
6188 ! do phi = 0,(2*PI) -1, phi_step
6189  do j = 0,int((2*pi)/phi_step)
6190  phi = phi_step*j
6191  tmp_dot%coor(0)=r*cos(phi)
6192  tmp_dot%coor(1)=r*sin(phi)
6193  tmp_dot%coor(2)=bigr*cos(theta)
6194  tmp_dot%valid=1
6195  tmp_dot%ttype = 'Un'
6196  call dotset_pushback(tmp_set,tmp_dot)
6197  num = num +1
6198  end do
6199  end do
6200 
6201  tmp_set%ttype = 'Un'
6202  tmp_set%r=bigr
6203  tmp_set%num_dot=num
6204  tmp_set%unit=total/num
6205  tmp_set%total=total
6206 
6207  do i = 0,tmp_set%num_dot -1
6208  tmp_set%dot(i)%unit=tmp_set%unit
6209  tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(0)=tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(0)+x
6210  tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(1)=tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(1)+y
6211  tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(2)=tmp_set%dot(i)%coor(2)+z
6212  end do
6213 
6214  forcefield_get_surface_dot_rxyz = tmp_set
6215 end function forcefield_get_surface_dot_rxyz
6216 
6217 subroutine forcefield_read_residue_def(filename)
6218  character(len=256) :: filename
6219 
6220  integer :: fp ! file number
6221  integer :: i,num,count
6222  character(len=256) :: buf,head
6223  integer :: filestat
6224 
6225  fp = freefile()
6226  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
6227 
6228  ! first, determine num_restype
6229  count=0
6230  do
6231  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6232  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6233  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 1 ! skip REM
6234  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 1 ! skip blank line
6235 
6236  if(buf(1:4).eq.'RESI') count = count +1
6237  else
6238  exit
6239  end if
6240 1 end do
6241 
6242  rewind(fp)
6243 
6244  ff%num_restype=count
6245 
6246  allocate(ff%residue(0:ff%num_restype -1),stat=err)
6247  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
6248 
6249  ! second, read the residue templates
6250  count=0
6251 
6252  do
6253  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6254  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6255  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 2 ! skip REM
6256  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 2 ! skip blank line
6257 
6258  if(buf(1:3).eq.'END') exit
6259 
6260  head = buf(1:4)
6261  if(head.eq.'RESI') then
6262  num=0
6263  read(buf(5:256),*,iostat=filestat) ff%residue(count)%name,ff%residue(count)%num_atom,ff%residue(count)%num_bond
6264 
6265  ! read the ATOM information first
6266  num = ff%residue(count)%num_atom
6267 
6268  do i = 0,num -1
6269  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6270  read(buf(5:256),*,iostat=filestat) &
6271  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%name, &
6272  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%ttype, &
6273  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%xtype, &
6274  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%r, &
6275  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%eps, &
6276  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%q, &
6277  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%hb, &
6278  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%logp, &
6279  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%solv, &
6280  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%ring, &
6281  ff%residue(count)%atom(i)%pmftype
6282  end do
6283 
6284  ! then read the BOND information
6285  num=ff%residue(count)%num_bond
6286 
6287  if(num>0) then
6288  do i = 0,num -1
6289  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6290  read(buf(5:256),*,iostat=filestat) &
6291  ff%residue(count)%bond(i)%atom1, &
6292  ff%residue(count)%bond(i)%atom2, &
6293  ff%residue(count)%bond(i)%ttype
6294  end do
6295  end if
6296 
6297  count = count +1
6298  end if
6299  end if
6300 2 end do
6301 
6302  close(fp)
6303 
6304  write(*,'(a,i4,a,a)') 'Read ', ff%num_restype, ' residue types from ', trim(filename)
6305  if(count.ne.ff%num_restype) write(*,*) 'Error occured when reading ', filename
6306  return
6307 
6308 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
6309  stop
6310 end subroutine forcefield_read_residue_def
6311 
6312 subroutine forcefield_read_atom_def(filename)
6313  character(len=256) :: filename
6314  integer :: fp, filestat
6315  integer :: count
6316  character(len=256) :: buf
6317  integer :: slask
6318 
6319  fp = freefile()
6320  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
6321 
6322  ! first, determine num_atomtype
6323  count=0
6324  do
6325  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6326  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6327  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 1 ! skip REM
6328  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 1 ! skip blank line
6329  count = count +1
6330  else
6331  exit
6332  end if
6333 1 end do
6334 
6335  rewind(fp)
6336 
6337  ff%num_atomtype=count
6338 
6339  allocate(ff%atom(0:ff%num_atomtype -1),stat=err)
6340  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
6341 
6342  ! second, read parameters for each atom type
6343  count=0
6344  do
6345  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6346  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6347  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 2 ! skip REM
6348  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 2 ! skip blank line
6349 
6350  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) &
6351  slask, &
6352  ff%atom(count)%ttype, &
6353  ff%atom(count)%weight, &
6354  ff%atom(count)%r, &
6355  ff%atom(count)%eps, &
6356  ff%atom(count)%q, &
6357  ff%atom(count)%hb
6358  count = count +1
6359  else
6360  exit
6361  end if
6362 2 end do
6363  close(fp)
6364 
6365  write(*,'(a,i4,a,a)') 'Read ', ff%num_atomtype, ' atom types from ', trim(filename)
6366  if(ff%num_atomtype.ne.count) write(*,*) 'Error reading ', filename
6367  return
6368 
6369 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
6370  stop
6371 end subroutine forcefield_read_atom_def
6372 
6373 subroutine forcefield_read_xatom_def(filename)
6374  character(len=256) :: filename
6375  integer :: fp, filestat
6376  integer :: count
6377  character(len=256) :: buf
6378  integer :: slask
6379  character(len=4) :: slask2
6380 
6381  fp = freefile()
6382  open(unit=fp,file=filename,err=999,action='READ')
6383 
6384  ! first, determine num_xatomtype
6385  count=0
6386  do
6387  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6388  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6389  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 1 ! skip REM
6390  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 1 ! skip blank line
6391  count = count +1
6392  else
6393  exit
6394  end if
6395 1 end do
6396 
6397  rewind(fp)
6398 
6399  ff%num_xatomtype=count
6400 
6401  allocate(ff%xatom(0:ff%num_xatomtype),stat=err)
6402  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
6403 
6404  ! second, read parameters for each atom type
6405  count=0
6406  do
6407  read(fp,'(a256)',iostat=filestat) buf
6408  if(filestat.eq.0) then
6409  if(buf(1:1).eq.'#') goto 2 ! skip REM
6410  if(trim(buf).eq.'') goto 2 ! skip blank line
6411 
6412  read(buf,*,iostat=filestat) &
6413  slask, &
6414  ff%xatom(count)%ttype, &
6415  slask2, &
6416  ff%xatom(count)%logp
6417  count = count +1
6418  else
6419  exit
6420  end if
6421 2 end do
6422  close(fp)
6423 
6424  write(*,'(a,i4,a,a)') 'Read ', ff%num_xatomtype, ' x-atom types from ', trim(filename)
6425  if(ff%num_xatomtype.ne.count) write(*,*) 'Error reading ', filename
6426  return
6427 
6428 999 write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>>>> ERROR: Unable to read ', adjustl(trim(filename)), '. Exiting.'
6429  stop
6430 end subroutine forcefield_read_xatom_def
6431 
6432 real function ff_get_atom_logp(ttype)
6433  character(len=20):: ttype
6434  integer :: i
6435  integer ::mark
6436  real ::logp
6437 
6438  mark=0
6439  do i = 0,ff%num_xatomtype -1
6440  if(ttype.eq.ff%xatom(i)%ttype) then
6441  logp=ff%xatom(i)%logp
6442  mark=1
6443  exit
6444  end if
6445  end do
6446 
6447  if(mark.eq.1) then
6448  ff_get_atom_logp = logp
6449  else
6450  write(*,'(a,a,a)') '>>> WARNING: No LogP parameter for atom type ', ttype, ' zero value assigned'
6451  warn = warn +1
6452  ff_get_atom_logp = 0
6453  end if
6454 end function ff_get_atom_logp
6455 
6456 integer function forcefield_assign_atom_parameters(atm)
6457  type(txatom) :: atm
6458  integer :: i
6459 
6460  if(ff%num_atomtype.eq.0) write(*,*) 'Empty force field'
6461  do i = 0,ff%num_atomtype -1
6462  if(atm%xtype.ne.ff%atom(i)%ttype) then
6463  goto 1
6464  else
6465  atm%weight = ff%atom(i)%weight
6466  atm%r = ff%atom(i)%r
6467  atm%xr = ff%atom(i)%r
6468  atm%eps = ff%atom(i)%eps
6469  atm%q = ff%atom(i)%q
6470  atm%hb = ff%atom(i)%hb
6471  atm%valid = 1
6472  forcefield_assign_atom_parameters = 1
6473  return
6474  end if
6475 1 end do
6476 
6477  write(*,*) '>>> WARNING: No parameter for atom ', atm%id, atm%ttype, atm%xtype
6478  warn = warn +1
6479 
6480  atm%valid=0
6481  forcefield_assign_atom_parameters = 0
6482 end function forcefield_assign_atom_parameters
6483 
6484 subroutine forcefield_translate
6485 
6486 end subroutine forcefield_translate
6487 
6488 integer function forcefield_assign_patom_parameters(atm,suppress_warnings)
6489  type(txatom) :: atm
6490  integer,optional :: suppress_warnings
6491  integer :: i,j
6492 
6493  ! First, check the standard residue templates to map the atom
6494  do i = 0,ff%num_restype -1
6495  if(atm%residue.ne.ff%residue(i)%name) goto 1
6496  do j = 0,ff%residue(i)%num_atom -1 ! residue template found
6497  if(ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%name.ne.atm%name) goto 2
6498 
6499  atm%ttype = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%ttype
6500  atm%xtype = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%xtype
6501  atm%type2 = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%pmftype
6502  atm%r = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%r
6503  atm%xr = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%r
6504  atm%eps = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%eps
6505  atm%q = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%q
6506  atm%R = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%r
6507  atm%hb = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%hb
6508  atm%logp = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%logp
6509  atm%solv = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%solv
6510  atm%ring = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%ring
6511  atm%valid = 1
6512  forcefield_assign_patom_parameters = 1
6513  return
6514 2 end do
6515 1 end do
6516 
6517  ! check if they are terminal atoms
6518  do i = 0,ff%num_restype -1
6519  if(ff%residue(i)%name.ne.'TER') goto 3
6520  do j = 0,ff%residue(i)%num_atom -1 ! residue template found
6521  if(ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%name.ne.atm%name) goto 4
6522 
6523  atm%ttype = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%ttype
6524  atm%xtype = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%xtype
6525  atm%type2 = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%pmftype
6526  atm%r = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%r
6527  atm%eps = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%eps
6528  atm%q = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%q
6529  atm%R = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%r
6530  atm%hb = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%hb
6531  atm%logp = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%logp
6532  atm%solv = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%solv
6533  atm%ring = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%ring
6534  atm%valid = 1
6535  forcefield_assign_patom_parameters = 1
6536  return
6537 4 end do
6538 3 end do
6539 
6540  ! check if they are valid hetero atoms
6541  do i = 0,ff%num_restype -1
6542  if(ff%residue(i)%name.ne.'HET') goto 5
6543  do j = 0,ff%residue(i)%num_atom -1 ! residue template found
6544  if(ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%name.ne.atm%name) goto 6
6545 
6546  atm%ttype = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%ttype
6547  atm%xtype = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%xtype
6548  atm%type2 = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%pmftype
6549  atm%r = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%r
6550  atm%eps = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%eps
6551  atm%q = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%q
6552  atm%R = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%r
6553  atm%hb = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%hb
6554  atm%logp = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%logp
6555  atm%solv = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%solv
6556  atm%ring = ff%residue(i)%atom(j)%ring
6557  atm%valid = 1
6558  forcefield_assign_patom_parameters = 1
6559  return
6560 6 end do
6561 5 end do
6562 
6563  if(.not. present(suppress_warnings) .and. atm%iscofactor .ne. 0)then
6564  write(*,'(a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a,a)') &
6565  'WARNING: No parameters for protein atom ', &
6566  trim(atm%name), ' in residue nr. ', &
6567  trim(adjustl(atm%res_id)), ' (', trim(atm%residue),'/', &
6568  trim(atm%old_residue),'). This atom is ignored.'
6569  warn = warn +1
6570  end if
6571  atm%valid=0
6572  forcefield_assign_patom_parameters = 0
6573 end function forcefield_assign_patom_parameters
6574 
6575 integer function forcefield_patom_connection_test(atm1, atm2)
6576  type(txatom) :: atm1,atm2
6577  integer :: i,j
6578 
6579  if(atm1%chain.ne.atm2%chain) then
6580  forcefield_patom_connection_test = 0
6581  return
6582  end if
6583  if((atm1%residue.ne.atm2%residue)) then
6584  forcefield_patom_connection_test = 0
6585  return
6586  end if
6587  if((atm1%res_id.ne.atm2%res_id)) then
6588  forcefield_patom_connection_test = 0
6589  return
6590  end if
6591  if(atm1%id.eq.atm2%id) then
6592  forcefield_patom_connection_test = 0
6593  return
6594  end if
6595 
6596 
6597  do i = 0,ff%num_restype -1
6598  if((ff%residue(i)%name.ne.atm1%residue)) then
6599  goto 1
6600  elseif((ff%residue(i)%name.ne.atm2%residue)) then
6601  goto 1
6602  end if
6603 
6604  if(ff%residue(i)%num_bond.eq.0) exit
6605 
6606  do j = 0,ff%residue(i)%num_bond -1
6607  if((ff%residue(i)%bond(j)%atom1.eq.atm1%name).and.(ff%residue(i)%bond(j)%atom2.eq.atm2%name)) then
6608  forcefield_patom_connection_test = 1
6609  return
6610  elseif((ff%residue(i)%bond(j)%atom1.eq.atm2%name).and.(ff%residue(i)%bond(j)%atom2.eq.atm1%name)) then
6611  forcefield_patom_connection_test = 1
6612  return
6613  else
6614  goto 2
6615  end if
6616 2 end do
6617  exit
6618 1 end do
6619 
6620  forcefield_patom_connection_test = 0
6621 end function forcefield_patom_connection_test
6622 
6623 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6624 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6625 
6626 ! XMISC MODULE
6627 
6628 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6629 ! ==========================================================================================================================================
6630 
6631 subroutine ring_copy(ring,r)
6632  type(txring) :: ring
6633  type(txring) :: r
6634 
6635  integer :: na,nb
6636 
6637  call ring_clear(ring)
6638 
6639  na = size(r%atom_id)
6640  nb = size(r%bond_id)
6641 
6642  ring%valid = r%valid
6643  ring%ttype = r%ttype
6644  ring%num_member = r%num_member
6645 
6646  if(na>0) then
6647  allocate(ring%atom_id(0:na-1),stat=err)
6648  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
6649  ring%atom_id(:) = r%atom_id(:)
6650  end if
6651  ring%atom_count = r%atom_count
6652  ring%atom_max = r%atom_max
6653 
6654  if(nb>0) then
6655  allocate(ring%bond_id(0:nb-1),stat=err)
6656  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
6657  ring%bond_id(:) = r%bond_id(:)
6658  end if
6659  ring%bond_count = r%bond_count
6660  ring%bond_max = r%bond_max
6661 
6662  ring%centroid(0:3) = r%centroid(0:3)
6663 end subroutine ring_copy
6664 
6665 subroutine bond_swap(b1,b2)
6666  type(txbond) :: b1,b2,tmp
6667 
6668 
6669  call bond_copy(tmp,b1)
6670  call bond_copy(b1,b2)
6671  call bond_copy(b2,tmp)
6672 end subroutine
6673 
6674 subroutine bond_copy(b1,b2)
6675  type(txbond) :: b1,b2
6676 
6677  b1%id = b2%id
6678  b1%valid = b2%valid
6679  b1%atom_1 = b2%atom_1
6680  b1%atom_2 = b2%atom_2
6681  b1%ttype = b2%ttype
6682  b1%part = b2%part
6683  b1%ring = b2%ring
6684  b1%length = b2%length
6685  b1%num_neib = b2%num_neib
6686  b1%neib(0:5) = b2%neib(0:5)
6687 end subroutine
6688 
6689 real function angle(a,b,c)
6690  ! the a-b-c angle in degree 0-180
6691  real,dimension(0:2) :: a,b,c
6692  integer :: i
6693  real,dimension(0:2) :: v1,v2
6694 
6695  do i=0,2
6696  v1(i)=b(i)-a(i)
6697  v2(i)=b(i)-c(i)
6698  end do
6699 
6700  angle=angle_of_two_vectors(v1,v2)
6701 end function angle
6702 
6703 !integer function HBond_Value_HBond(hbond)
6704 ! type(tXHBond) :: hbond
6705 ! real :: d,d0,d1,d2,d3,d4
6706 ! real :: a0,a1,a2,angle1,angle2,angle3,angle4
6707 ! real :: tmp1,tmp2,tmp3,tmp4
6708 ! integer :: mark0,mark1,mark2
6709 ! real :: a,b,c,bigA,bigC
6710 !
6711 ! ! first, calculate the necessary parameters
6712 ! d=Distance(hbond%D%coor,hbond%A%coor)
6713 !
6714 ! ! angle D-H-bigA
6715 ! if((hbond%D%hb.eq.'M')) then
6716 ! a0=0.1
6717 ! mark0=0
6718 ! elseif((hbond%D%ttype.eq.'O.3')) then
6719 ! ! align H to the optimal position and then recalculate <D-H-bigA
6720 ! b=0.98 ! D-H length
6721 ! c=d ! D-bigA length
6722 ! bigA=abs(Angle(hbond%D%root,hbond%D%coor,hbond%A%coor)-109.0)
6723 ! a=sqrt(b*b+c*c-2*b*c*cos(bigA/180.0)) ! H-bigA length
6724 ! bigC=acos((a*a+b*b-c*c)/(2*a*b))/PI*180.0
6725 ! a0=180.0-bigC
6726 ! mark0=1
6727 ! else
6728 ! a0=180.0-Angle(hbond%D%coor,hbond%H%coor,hbond%A%coor)
6729 ! mark0=1
6730 ! end if
6731 !
6732 ! ! angle DR-D-bigA
6733 ! if((hbond%D%hb.eq.'M').or.(hbond%D%ttype.eq.'O.w')) then
6734 ! a1=0.1
6735 ! mark1=0
6736 ! else
6737 ! a1=180.0-Angle(hbond%D%root,hbond%D%coor,hbond%A%coor)
6738 ! mark1=1
6739 ! end if
6740 !
6741 ! ! D-bigA-bigAR
6742 ! if((hbond%A%hb.eq.'M').or.(hbond%A%ttype.eq.'O.w')) then
6743 ! a2=0.1
6744 ! mark2=0
6745 ! else
6746 ! a2=180.0-Angle(hbond%D%coor,hbond%A%coor,hbond%A%root)
6747 ! mark2=1
6748 ! end if
6749 !
6750 ! ! now determine the geometry type of this h-bond
6751 ! call HBond_Determine_DbigA_Type(hbond)
6752 !
6753 ! ! now compute the strength of this h-bond
6754 ! d0=hbond%D%R+hbond%A%R
6755 ! d1=0.00
6756 ! d2=1.00
6757 ! d3=d0-0.40
6758 ! d4=d0+0.10
6759 !
6760 ! if(d<d1) then
6761 ! tmp1=0.000
6762 ! elseif(d<d2) then
6763 ! tmp1=(d-d1)/(d2-d1)
6764 ! elseif(d<d3) then
6765 ! tmp1=1.000
6766 ! elseif(d<d4) then
6767 ! tmp1=(d4-d)/(d4-d3)
6768 ! else
6769 ! tmp1=0.000
6770 ! end if
6771 !
6772 ! if(mark0.eq.1) then
6773 ! angle1=0.0
6774 ! angle2=0.001
6775 ! angle3=60.0
6776 ! angle4=90.0
6777 ! if(a0<angle1) then
6778 ! tmp2=0.000
6779 ! elseif(a0<angle2) then
6780 ! tmp2=(a0-angle1)/(angle2-angle1)
6781 ! elseif(a0<angle3) then
6782 ! tmp2=1.000
6783 ! elseif(a0<angle4) then
6784 ! tmp2=(angle4-a0)/(angle4-angle3)
6785 ! else
6786 ! tmp2=0.000
6787 ! end if
6788 ! else
6789 ! tmp2=1.000
6790 ! end if
6791 !
6792 ! if(mark1.eq.1) then
6793 ! if(d_type.eq.1) then
6794 ! angle1=0.0
6795 ! angle2=0.001
6796 ! angle3=30.0
6797 ! angle4=60.0
6798 ! else
6799 ! angle1=20.0
6800 ! angle2=40.0
6801 ! angle3=70.0
6802 ! angle4=90.0
6803 ! end if
6804 !
6805 ! if(a1<angle1) then
6806 ! tmp3=0.000
6807 ! elseif(a1<angle2) then
6808 ! tmp3=(a1-angle1)/(angle2-angle1)
6809 ! elseif(a1<angle3) then
6810 ! tmp3=1.000
6811 ! elseif(a1<angle4) then
6812 ! tmp3=(angle4-a1)/(angle4-angle3)
6813 ! else
6814 ! tmp3=0.000
6815 ! end if
6816 ! else
6817 ! tmp3=1.000
6818 !
6819 ! if(mark2.eq.1) then
6820 ! if(a_type.eq.1) then
6821 ! angle1=0.0
6822 ! angle2=0.001
6823 ! angle3=30.0
6824 ! angle4=60.0
6825 ! else
6826 ! angle1=0.0
6827 ! angle2=5.0
6828 ! angle3=60.0
6829 ! angle4=90.0
6830 ! end if
6831 !
6832 ! if(a2<angle1) then
6833 ! tmp4=0.000
6834 ! elseif(a2<angle2) then
6835 ! tmp4=(a2-angle1)/(angle2-angle1)
6836 ! elseif(a2<angle3) then
6837 ! tmp4=1.000
6838 ! elseif(a2<angle4) then
6839 ! tmp4=(angle4-a2)/(angle4-angle3)
6840 ! else
6841 ! tmp4=0.000
6842 ! end if
6843 ! else
6844 ! tmp4=1.000
6845 ! end if
6846 !
6847 ! hbond%d=d
6848 ! hbond%a0=a0
6849 ! hbond%a1=a1
6850 ! hbond%a2=a2
6851 !
6852 ! hbond%score=tmp1*tmp2*tmp3*tmp4
6853 !
6854 ! if(hbond%score<0.001) then
6855 ! HBond_Value_HBond = 0
6856 ! else
6857 ! HBond_Value_HBond = e
6858 ! end if
6859 !end function HBond_Value_HBond
6860 
6861 integer function hbond_value_hbond_2(hbond)
6862  type(txhbond) :: hbond
6863  real :: d,d0,d1,d2,d3,d4
6864  real :: a1,a2,angle1,angle2,angle3,angle4
6865  real :: tmp1,tmp3,tmp4
6866  integer :: mark1,mark2
6867 
6868  ! first, calculate the necessary parameters
6869  d=distance(hbond%D%coor,hbond%A%coor)
6870 
6871  ! angle DR-D-A
6872  if((hbond%D%hb.eq.'M').or.(hbond%D%ttype.eq.'O.w')) then
6873  mark1=0
6874  a1=0.0
6875  else
6876  a1=180.0-angle(hbond%D%root,hbond%D%coor,hbond%A%coor)
6877  mark1=1
6878  end if
6879 
6880  ! D-A-AR
6881  if((hbond%A%hb.eq.'M').or.(hbond%A%ttype.eq.'O.w')) then
6882  mark2=0
6883  a2=0.0
6884  else
6885  a2=180.0-angle(hbond%D%coor,hbond%A%coor,hbond%A%root)
6886  mark2=1
6887  end if
6888 
6889  ! now determine the geometry type of this h-bond
6890  call hbond_determine_da_type(hbond)
6891 
6892  ! now compute the strength of this h-bond
6893 
6894  d0=hbond%D%R+hbond%A%R
6895  d1=0.00
6896  d2=1.00
6897  d3=d0-0.40
6898  d4=d0+0.20
6899 
6900  if(d<d1) then
6901  tmp1=0.000
6902  elseif(d<d2) then
6903  tmp1=(d-d1)/(d2-d1)
6904  elseif(d<d3) then
6905  tmp1=1.000
6906  elseif(d<d4) then
6907  tmp1=(d4-d)/(d4-d3)
6908  else
6909  tmp1=0.000
6910  end if
6911 
6912  if(mark1.eq.1) then
6913  if(hbond%d_type.eq.1) then
6914  angle1=0.0
6915  angle2=0.001
6916  angle3=25.0
6917  angle4=50.0
6918  else
6919  angle1=25.0
6920  angle2=50.0
6921  angle3=75.0
6922  angle4=100.0
6923  end if
6924  if(a1<angle1) then
6925  tmp3=0.000
6926  elseif(a1<angle2) then
6927  tmp3=(a1-angle1)/(angle2-angle1)
6928  elseif(a1<angle3) then
6929  tmp3=1.000
6930  elseif(a1<angle4) then
6931  tmp3=(angle4-a1)/(angle4-angle3)
6932  else
6933  tmp3=0.000
6934  end if
6935  else
6936  tmp3=1.000
6937  end if
6938 
6939  if(mark2.eq.1) then
6940  if(hbond%a_type.eq.1) then
6941  angle1=0.0
6942  angle2=0.001
6943  angle3=30.0
6944  angle4=55.0
6945  else
6946  angle1=0.0
6947  angle2=5.0
6948  angle3=70.0
6949  angle4=95.0
6950  end if
6951 
6952  if(a2<angle1) then
6953  tmp4=0.000
6954  elseif(a2<angle2) then
6955  tmp4=(a2-angle1)/(angle2-angle1)
6956  elseif(a2<angle3) then
6957  tmp4=1.000
6958  elseif(a2<angle4) then
6959  tmp4=(angle4-a2)/(angle4-angle3)
6960  else
6961  tmp4=0.000
6962  end if
6963  else
6964  tmp4=1.000
6965  endif
6966 
6967  hbond%dd=d
6968  hbond%a1=a1
6969  hbond%a2=a2
6970 
6971  if(tmp3>=tmp4) then
6972  hbond%score=tmp1*tmp4
6973  else
6974  hbond%score=tmp1*tmp3
6975  end if
6976 
6977  if(hbond%score<0.001) then
6978  hbond_value_hbond_2 = 0
6979  else
6980  hbond_value_hbond_2 = 1
6981  end if
6982 end function hbond_value_hbond_2
6983 
6984 subroutine hbond_determine_da_type(hbond)
6985  type(txhbond) :: hbond
6986 
6987  hbond%d_type=atom_get_donor_type(hbond%D)
6988  hbond%a_type=atom_get_acceptor_type(hbond%A)
6989 end subroutine hbond_determine_da_type
6990 
6991 integer function atom_get_donor_type(atom)
6992  type(txatom) :: atom
6993  integer :: ttype
6994 
6995  if((atom%hb.ne.'D').and.(atom%hb.ne.'DA').and.(atom%hb.ne.'M')) then
6996  atom_get_donor_type= 0
6997  return
6998  end if
6999 
7000  if(atom%origin.eq.2) then ! protein atoms
7001  if((atom%hb.eq.'M')) then
7002  ttype=1
7003  elseif((atom%ttype.eq.'O.3').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.co2').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.w')) then
7004  ttype=2
7005  elseif((index(atom%xtype,'N.4').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.3').ne.0)) then
7006  ttype=2
7007  elseif((index(atom%xtype,'N.pl3').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.2').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.ar').ne.0)) then
7008  if((index(atom%name,'NH').ne.0).and.(index(atom%residue,'ARG').ne.0)) then
7009  ttype=2
7010  elseif((index(atom%name,'ND').ne.0).and.(index(atom%residue,'ASN').ne.0)) then
7011  ttype=2
7012  elseif((index(atom%name,'NE').ne.0).and.(index(atom%residue,'GLN').ne.0)) then
7013  ttype=2
7014  else
7015  ttype=1
7016  end if
7017  elseif((atom%ttype.eq.'S.3')) then
7018  ttype=2
7019  else
7020  ttype=2
7021  end if
7022  else ! ligand atoms
7023  if((atom%ttype.eq.'O.3').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.co2')) then
7024  ttype=2
7025  elseif((index(atom%xtype,'N.4').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.3').ne.0)) then
7026  if(atom%num_nonh<=2) then
7027  ttype=2
7028  else
7029  ttype=1
7030  end if
7031  elseif((index(atom%xtype,'N.pl3').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.2').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.ar').ne.0)) then
7032  if(atom%num_nonh<=1) then
7033  ttype=2
7034  else
7035  ttype=1
7036  end if
7037  elseif((atom%ttype.eq.'S.3')) then
7038  ttype=2
7039  else
7040  ttype=2
7041  end if
7042  end if
7043 
7044  atom_get_donor_type =ttype
7045 end function atom_get_donor_type
7046 
7047 integer function atom_get_acceptor_type(atom)
7048  type(txatom) :: atom
7049  integer :: ttype
7050 
7051  if((atom%hb.ne.'A').and.(atom%hb.ne.'DA')) then
7052  atom_get_acceptor_type = 0
7053  return
7054  end if
7055 
7056 
7057  if(atom%origin.eq.2) then ! protein atoms
7058  if((atom%ttype.eq.'O.3').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.2').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.co2').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.w')) then
7059  ttype=2
7060  elseif((index(atom%xtype,'N.pl3').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.2').ne.0).or. (index(atom%xtype,'N.ar').ne.0)) then
7061  ttype=1
7062  else
7063  ttype=2
7064  endif
7065  else
7066  if((atom%ttype.eq.'O.3').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.2').or.(atom%ttype.eq.'O.co2')) then
7067  ttype=2
7068  elseif((index(atom%xtype,'N.pl3').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.2').ne.0).or.(index(atom%xtype,'N.ar').ne.0)) then
7069  if(atom%num_nonh<=1) then
7070  ttype=2
7071  else
7072  ttype=1
7073  end if
7074  else
7075  ttype=2
7076  end if
7077  end if
7078 
7079  atom_get_acceptor_type = ttype
7080 end function atom_get_acceptor_type
7081 
7082 
7083 real function angle_of_two_vectors(v1, v2)
7084  real, dimension(0:2) :: v1,v2
7085  real angle
7086  real l1,l2,tmp1,tmp2
7087 
7088  if((v1(0).eq.v2(0)).and.(v1(1).eq.v2(1)).and.(v1(2).eq.v2(2))) then ! need to treat this case
7089  angle_of_two_vectors = 0
7090  return
7091  end if
7092 
7093  l1=sqrt(v1(0)*v1(0)+v1(1)*v1(1)+v1(2)*v1(2))
7094  l2=sqrt(v2(0)*v2(0)+v2(1)*v2(1)+v2(2)*v2(2))
7095 
7096  tmp1=v1(0)*v2(0)+v1(1)*v2(1)+v1(2)*v2(2)
7097  tmp2=l1*l2
7098 
7099  angle=acos(tmp1/tmp2)
7100  angle=angle/(pi)*180.0
7101 
7102  angle_of_two_vectors = angle ! return angle in degree, 0-180
7103 end function angle_of_two_vectors
7104 
7105 subroutine hbond_clear(hbond)
7106  type(txhbond) :: hbond
7107 
7108  hbond%valid= 0
7109  hbond%latom= 0
7110  hbond%patom= 0
7111  hbond%ttype= 0
7112  hbond%d_type= 0
7113  hbond%a_type=0
7114  hbond%score=0.000
7115  hbond%sb=0
7116  hbond%dd=0
7117  hbond%a0=0
7118  hbond%a1=0
7119  hbond%a2=0.000
7120  call taclear(hbond%D)
7121  call taclear(hbond%H)
7122  call taclear(hbond%A)
7123 end subroutine hbond_clear
7124 
7125 subroutine dot_pushback(dots,numdot,newdot)
7126  type(txdot),pointer :: dots(:)
7127  integer :: numdot
7128  type(txdot) :: newdot
7129  type(txdot),allocatable :: tmpdot(:)
7130 
7131  if(.not. associated(dots)) then ! need to init dot array
7132  allocate(dots(16),stat=err)
7133  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7134  end if
7135 
7136  numdot = numdot +1
7137  if(numdot>size(dots,1)) then ! need to increase the size of dots
7138  allocate(tmpdot(numdot-1),stat=err) ! allocate tmp array of old size
7139  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7140  tmpdot(:) = dots(:) ! copy dots to tmp
7141 
7142  deallocate(dots) ! deallocate dots
7143  allocate(dots(numdot +16),stat=err) ! allocate new and bigger mem
7144  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7145 
7146  dots(1:numdot -1) = tmpdot(1:numdot -1) ! copy old part from tmp
7147  end if
7148 
7149  dots(numdot) = newdot
7150 end subroutine dot_pushback
7151 
7152 subroutine int_pushback(array, int)
7153  integer, pointer :: array(:)
7154  integer :: int
7155  integer, pointer :: tmp(:)
7156  integer :: s
7157 
7158  if(associated(array)) then
7159  s = size(array)
7160  allocate(tmp(0:s),stat=err)
7161  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7162  tmp(0:s -1) = array(0:s-1)
7163 
7164  deallocate(array)
7165  tmp(s) = int
7166 
7167  array => tmp
7168  else
7169  allocate(array(0:0),stat=err)
7170  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7171  array(0) = int
7172  end if
7173 end subroutine int_pushback
7174 
7175 subroutine ring_pushback(ring,atom_id)
7176  type(txring) :: ring
7177  integer :: atom_id
7178  integer,allocatable :: tmp(:)
7179 
7180  if(ring%atom_max.eq.0) then ! need to init dot array
7181  allocate(ring%atom_id(0:15),stat=err)
7182  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7183  ring%atom_max = 16
7184  end if
7185 
7186  ring%atom_count = ring%atom_count +1
7187  if(ring%atom_count>ring%atom_max) then
7188  allocate(tmp(1:ring%atom_count-1),stat=err)
7189  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7190  tmp(:) = ring%atom_id(:)
7191  deallocate(ring%atom_id)
7192  ring%atom_max = ring%atom_max +16 ! increase by 16 elements
7193  allocate(ring%atom_id(1:ring%atom_max),stat=err)
7194  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7195  ring%atom_id(1:ring%atom_count -1) = tmp(1:ring%atom_count -1)
7196  deallocate(tmp)
7197  end if
7198 
7199  ring%atom_id(ring%atom_count -1) = atom_id
7200 end subroutine ring_pushback
7201 
7202 subroutine dotset_pushback(dotset,dot)
7203  type(txdotset) :: dotset
7204  type(txdot) :: dot
7205  type(txdot),allocatable :: tmpdot(:)
7206 
7207  if(dotset%max_dot.eq.0) then ! need to init dot array
7208  allocate(dotset%dot(0:15),stat=err)
7209  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7210  dotset%max_dot = 16
7211  end if
7212 
7213  dotset%num_dot = dotset%num_dot +1
7214  if(dotset%num_dot>dotset%max_dot) then
7215  allocate(tmpdot(1:dotset%num_dot),stat=err)
7216  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7217  tmpdot(1:dotset%num_dot -1) = dotset%dot(1:dotset%num_dot -1)
7218  deallocate(dotset%dot)
7219  dotset%max_dot = dotset%max_dot +16 ! increase by 16 elements
7220  allocate(dotset%dot(1:dotset%max_dot),stat=err)
7221  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7222  dotset%dot(1:dotset%num_dot -1) = tmpdot(1:dotset%num_dot -1)
7223  end if
7224 
7225  dotset%dot(dotset%num_dot -1) = dot
7226 end subroutine dotset_pushback
7227 
7228 subroutine dotset_operator_copy(s1,s2)
7229  type(txdotset) :: s1,s2
7230  integer :: i
7231 
7232  s1%num_dot = s2%num_dot
7233  s1%max_dot = s2%max_dot
7234  s1%r = s2%r
7235  s1%ttype(:)= s2%ttype(:)
7236  s1%unit = s2%unit
7237  s1%total = s2%total
7238 
7239  if(associated(s2%dot)) then
7240  allocate(s1%dot(0:size(s2%dot)-1),stat=err)
7241  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7242  do i = 0,size(s2%dot) -1
7243  s1%dot(i)%valid = s2%dot(i)%valid
7244  s1%dot(i)%ttype = s2%dot(i)%ttype
7245  s1%dot(i)%coor(:) = s2%dot(i)%coor(:)
7246  s1%dot(i)%unit = s2%dot(i)%unit
7247  s1%dot(i)%score = s2%dot(i)%score
7248  end do
7249  end if
7250 end subroutine dotset_operator_copy
7251 
7252 subroutine hbond_operator_copy(b1,b2)
7253  type(txhbond) :: b1,b2
7254 
7255  b1%valid = b2%valid
7256  b1%ttype = b2%ttype
7257  b1%d_type = b2%d_type
7258  b1%a_type = b2%a_type
7259  b1%sb = b2%sb
7260  b1%latom = b2%latom
7261  b1%patom = b2%patom
7262 
7263  call atom_operator_copy(b1%H,b2%H)
7264  call atom_operator_copy(b1%D,b2%D)
7265  call atom_operator_copy(b1%A,b2%A)
7266 
7267  b1%dd = b2%dd
7268  b1%a0 = b2%a0
7269  b1%a1 = b2%a1
7270  b1%a2 = b2%a2
7271 
7272  b1%score = b2%score
7273 end subroutine hbond_operator_copy
7274 
7275 subroutine atom_operator_copy(a1,a2)
7276  type(txatom) :: a1,a2
7277 
7278  a1%id = a2%id
7279  a1%valid = a2%valid
7280  a1%name(:) = a2%name(:)
7281  a1%ttype(:) = a2%ttype(:)
7282  a1%xtype(:) = a2%xtype(:)
7283  a1%type2(:) = a2%type2(:)
7284  a1%residue(:) = a2%residue(:)
7285  a1%res_id(:) = a2%res_id(:)
7286  a1%atom_res_id = a2%atom_res_id
7287  a1%iscofactor = a2%iscofactor
7288  a1%chain(:) = a2%chain(:)
7289  a1%coor(0:2) = a2%coor(0:2)
7290  a1%root(0:2) = a2%root(0:2)
7291  a1%weight = a2%weight
7292  a1%r = a2%r
7293  a1%eps = a2%eps
7294  a1%q = a2%q
7295  a1%XR = a2%XR
7296  a1%logp = a2%logp
7297  a1%solv = a2%solv
7298  a1%hb(:) = a2%hb(:)
7299  a1%occupancy = a2%occupancy
7300  a1%bfactor = a2%bfactor
7301  a1%score = a2%score
7302  a1%ring = a2%ring
7303  a1%origin = a2%origin
7304  a1%part = a2%part
7305  a1%num_neib = a2%num_neib
7306  a1%num_nonh = a2%num_nonh
7307  a1%neib(0:6) = a2%neib(0:6)
7308  a1%bond(0:6) = a2%bond(0:6)
7309  a1%temp = a2%temp
7310 end subroutine atom_operator_copy
7311 
7312 subroutine group_operator_copy(g1,g2)
7313  type(txgroup) :: g1,g2
7314 
7315  g1%valid = g2%valid
7316  g1%num_neib = g2%num_neib
7317  g1%num_nonh = g2%num_nonh
7318  g1%num_h = g2%num_h
7319  g1%num_hetero = g2%num_hetero
7320  g1%num_pi = g2%num_pi
7321  g1%num_car = g2%num_car
7322  g1%num_nar = g2%num_nar
7323  g1%num_db = g2%num_db
7324  g1%num_tb = g2%num_tb
7325  g1%db_type = g2%db_type
7326  g1%amide = g2%amide
7327  g1%center = g2%center
7328  g1%neib(:) = g2%neib(:)
7329  g1%bond(:) = g2%bond(:)
7330 end subroutine group_operator_copy
7331 
7332 subroutine dotset_show_contents(dotset)
7333  type(txdotset) :: dotset
7334  integer :: i
7335 
7336  write(*,*) 'DOTSET: ', dotset%r, dotset%num_dot, dotset%unit, dotset%total, dotset%ttype
7337  do i = 0, dotset%num_dot -1
7338  write(*,*) dotset%dot(i)%coor(0),dotset%dot(i)%coor(1),dotset%dot(i)%coor(2),dotset%dot(i)%valid
7339  end do
7340 end subroutine dotset_show_contents
7341 
7342 subroutine taclear(this)
7343  type(txatom),intent(out) :: this
7344 
7345  this%id=0
7346  this%valid=0
7347  this%part=1
7348  this%origin=1
7349 
7350  this%name = 'Un'
7351  this%ttype = 'Un'
7352  this%xtype = 'Un'
7353  this%type2 = 'Un'
7354  this%residue = 'Un'
7355  this%res_id = '0'
7356  this%chain=' '
7357 
7358  this%coor(0)=0
7359  this%coor(1)=0
7360  this%coor(2)=0.000
7361  this%root(0)=0
7362  this%root(1)=0
7363  this%root(2)=0.000
7364 
7365  this%r=0.000
7366  this%eps=0.000
7367  this%q=0.000
7368  this%weight=0.000
7369  this%R=0.000
7370  this%hb = 'N'
7371  this%logp=0.000
7372  this%solv=0.000
7373  this%score=0.000
7374  this%ring=0
7375 
7376  this%occupancy=1.000
7377  this%bfactor=0.000
7378 
7379  this%num_neib=0
7380  this%num_nonh=0
7381 
7382  this%neib(:) = 0
7383  this%bond(:) = 0
7384 
7385  this%temp=0
7386 end subroutine taclear
7387 
7388 subroutine ring_clear(ring,size)
7389  type(txring) :: ring
7390  integer,optional :: size ! determines size of atom_id and bond_id
7391 
7392  if(associated(ring%atom_id)) deallocate(ring%atom_id)
7393  if(associated(ring%bond_id)) deallocate(ring%bond_id)
7394 
7395  if(present(size)) then
7396  allocate(ring%atom_id(0:size),stat=err)
7397  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7398  allocate(ring%bond_id(0:size),stat=err)
7399  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7400  end if
7401 
7402  ring%valid=0
7403  ring%ttype=0
7404  ring%num_member=0
7405 
7406  ring%centroid(0)=0
7407  ring%centroid(1)=0
7408  ring%centroid(2)=0.000
7409 end subroutine ring_clear
7410 
7411 real function distance(a, b)
7412  real,dimension(0:2) :: a,b
7413  real :: d,tmpx,tmpy,tmpz
7414 
7415  tmpx = (a(0)-b(0))*(a(0)-b(0))
7416  tmpy = (a(1)-b(1))*(a(1)-b(1))
7417  tmpz = (a(2)-b(2))*(a(2)-b(2))
7418 
7419  d = sqrt(tmpx+tmpy+tmpz)
7420 
7421  distance = d
7422 end function distance
7423 
7424 ! ================================================================================================================================================
7425 ! ================================================================================================================================================
7426 
7427 ! XPROTEIN MODULE
7428 
7429 ! ================================================================================================================================================
7430 ! ================================================================================================================================================
7431 
7432 subroutine protein_merge_cofactor(protein,cf)
7433  type(txprotein) :: protein
7434  type(txligand) :: cf
7435  integer :: i,j
7436  integer,dimension(0:6) :: tmp
7437 
7438  do i = 0,cf%mol%num_atom -1
7439  tmp(:) = protein%atom(cf%mol%atom(i)%temp)%neib(:)
7440  call atom_operator_copy(protein%atom(cf%mol%atom(i)%temp), cf%mol%atom(i))
7441  protein%atom(cf%mol%atom(i)%temp)%id = cf%mol%atom(i)%temp
7442  protein%atom(cf%mol%atom(i)%temp)%neib(:) = tmp(:)
7443  protein%atom(cf%mol%atom(i)%temp)%valid = 1
7444  protein%atom(cf%mol%atom(i)%temp)%bond(:) = 0
7445  end do
7446 end subroutine protein_merge_cofactor
7447 
7448 subroutine xprotein_translate(protein,nAtoms,coordinates,num_bond,bond)
7449  type(txprotein) :: protein
7450  integer :: natoms ! nat_solute being sent in
7451  real(8) :: coordinates(:)
7452  integer :: num_bond
7453  type(bond_type) :: bond(:)
7454  integer :: i,j,mark,offset
7455  type(txbond) :: tmp
7456  integer :: ires ! current residue
7457  integer :: inextres ! starting point of next residue
7458  integer :: atom_res_id ! atom number within residue
7459  integer :: last_valid_atom
7460 
7461  ! First find out how many atoms to translate
7462  ires = 0
7463  inextres = 1
7464  j = 0
7465  do i = 1,natoms
7466  if(i.eq.inextres) then
7467  ires = ires +1
7468  if (ires<nres) inextres = res(ires +1)%start
7469  atom_res_id = 0
7470  end if
7471 
7472  if(iqatom(i).ne.0) cycle ! skip ligand atoms
7473  if(res(ires)%name.eq.'DUM') cycle ! skip dummy atoms
7474  if((tac(iac(i)).eq.'Du').or.(tac(iac(i)).eq.'DU')) cycle ! skip dummy
7475  j = j +1
7476  end do
7477 
7478  protein%num_atom = j
7479 
7480  ! Translate atom coordinates and other stuff
7481  allocate(protein%atom(0:protein%num_atom -1),stat=err)
7482  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7483  protein%atom(:)%valid = 0
7484  ires = 0
7485  inextres = 1
7486  j = -1
7487  do i = 1,natoms
7488  if(i.eq.inextres) then
7489  ires = ires +1
7490  if (ires<nres) inextres = res(ires +1)%start
7491  atom_res_id = 0
7492  end if
7493 
7494  if(iqatom(i).ne.0) cycle ! skip ligand atoms
7495  if(res(ires)%name.eq.'DUM') cycle ! skip dummy atoms
7496  if((tac(iac(i)).eq.'Du').or.(tac(iac(i)).eq.'DU')) cycle ! skip dummy
7497 
7498  last_valid_atom = i
7499  atom_res_id = atom_res_id +1
7500  j = j +1
7501 
7502  top2prot(i) = j ! set topology -> protein translation
7503 
7504  protein%atom(j)%topindex = i ! save topology index of this atom
7505  protein%atom(j)%coor(0) = coordinates(3*(i-1) +1)
7506  protein%atom(j)%coor(1) = coordinates(3*(i-1) +2)
7507  protein%atom(j)%coor(2) = coordinates(3*(i-1) +3)
7508  protein%atom(j)%id = j
7509  protein%atom(j)%atom_res_id = atom_res_id
7510  protein%atom(j)%name = '' ! not used. names are assigned using lib file and index within residue
7511  protein%atom(j)%residue = res(ires)%name
7512  write(protein%atom(j)%res_id, '(I8)') ires ! use internal read to convert integer -> character
7513  protein%atom(j)%ttype = tac(iac(i)) ! ttype and xtype are set by Value_Atom
7514  protein%atom(j)%xtype = 'Un' !protein%atom(i -1)%ttype
7515  protein%atom(j)%type2 = 'Un'
7516  protein%atom(j)%hb = 'N'
7517  protein%atom(j)%valid = 1 ! default
7518 ! if(masks(1)%mask(i+1)) protein%atom(i)%mask = 1 !masks(1)%mask(i+1)
7519  protein%atom(j)%origin = 2 ! This is a protein atom
7520  protein%atom(j)%part = 1 ! regular atom
7521  protein%atom(j)%occupancy = 0.0 ! default
7522  end do
7523 
7524 
7525  ! Count protein bonds
7526  protein%num_bond = 0
7527  do i = 1,num_bond
7528  if(((bond(i)%i<=natoms).and.(bond(i)%j<=natoms)).and. &
7529  (iqatom(bond(i)%i).eq.0.and.iqatom(bond(i)%j).eq.0)) protein%num_bond = protein%num_bond +1
7530  end do
7531 
7532  allocate(protein%bond(0:protein%num_bond-1))
7533  j = 0
7534  offset = 0
7535  do i = 1, num_bond
7536  if(((bond(i)%i<=natoms).and.(bond(i)%j<=natoms)).and.(iqatom(bond(i)%i).eq.0.and.iqatom(bond(i)%j).eq.0)) then
7537  protein%bond(j)%id = j +1
7538  protein%bond(j)%valid = 1
7539  protein%bond(j)%atom_1 = top2prot(bond(i)%i) +1
7540  protein%bond(j)%atom_2 = top2prot(bond(i)%j) +1
7541  protein%bond(j)%ttype = sybyl_bond_type(bond(i)%cod)
7542 ! write(*,*) i, ' ', protein%atom(protein%bond(j)%atom_1-1)%ttype, ' ', protein%atom(protein%bond(j)%atom_2-1)%ttype, ' ', protein%bond(j)%ttype
7543  j = j +1
7544  else
7545  offset = offset +1
7546  end if
7547  end do
7548 
7549  ! Bubble sort bonds in increasing atom order
7550  do
7551  mark = 0
7552  do i = 0, protein%num_bond -2
7553  if((protein%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.protein%bond(i+1)%atom_1).and. &
7554  (protein%bond(i)%atom_2.eq.protein%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) goto 2
7555  if(protein%bond(i)%atom_1 < protein%bond(i+1)%atom_1) goto 2
7556  if((protein%bond(i)%atom_1.eq.protein%bond(i+1)%atom_1) .and. &
7557  (protein%bond(i)%atom_2<=protein%bond(i+1)%atom_2)) goto 2
7558 
7559  ! If no rule triggered, the bonds are in the wrong order
7560  mark = 1
7561  tmp = protein%bond(i)
7562  protein%bond(i) = protein%bond(i+1)
7563  protein%bond(i+1) = tmp
7564 2 end do
7565  if(mark.eq.0) exit
7566  end do
7567 
7568  ! Reset bond id
7569  do i = 0,protein%num_bond -1
7570  protein%bond(i)%id = i +1
7571  end do
7572 
7573 end subroutine xprotein_translate
7574 
7575 subroutine protein_show_contents(protein)
7576  type(txprotein) :: protein
7577 
7578  write(*,*) 'Protein molecule: ', adjustl(trim(protein%name))
7579 
7580  call protein_show_atoms(protein)
7581  call protein_show_rings(protein)
7582  call protein_show_bonds(protein)
7583 end subroutine protein_show_contents
7584 
7585 subroutine protein_show_atoms(protein)
7586  type(txprotein) :: protein
7587  integer :: i
7588 
7589  write(*,*) 'Total number of atoms in this molecule = ',protein%num_atom
7590  write(*,'(t1,a)') 'id vld. type xtype type2 res r_id name &
7591  &weight r eps q XR logp solv hb occ. bfct ring origin &
7592  &part #neib #nonh neib[0..6] bond[0..6] hb root[0..2]'
7593 
7594  write(*,'()')
7595  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
7596  write(*,'(t1,i4, t6,i2, t11,a, t18,a, t27,a, t34,a, t39,a, &
7597  &t45,a, t52,f5.2, t59,f4.1, t63,f4.1, t67,f4.1, t71,f4.1, &
7598  &t75,f4.1, t79,f4.1, t85,a, t89,f4.1, t93,f4.1, t100,i1, &
7599  &t105,i1, t112,i1, t117,i1, t123,i1, t130,i4,t134,i4,t138, &
7600  &i4,t142,i4,t146,i4,t150,i4,t154,i4, t158,i4,t162,i4,t166, &
7601  &i4,t170,i4,t174,i4,t178,i4,t182,i4, t186,f5.1,t191,f5.1, &
7602  &t196,f5.1)') &
7603 
7604  protein%atom(i)%id+1, &
7605  protein%atom(i)%valid, &
7606  protein%atom(i)%ttype, &
7607  protein%atom(i)%xtype, &
7608  protein%atom(i)%type2, &
7609  trim(protein%atom(i)%residue), &
7610  trim(protein%atom(i)%res_id(5:10)), &
7611  trim(protein%atom(i)%name), &
7612  protein%atom(i)%weight, &
7613  protein%atom(i)%r, &
7614  protein%atom(i)%eps, &
7615  protein%atom(i)%q, &
7616  protein%atom(i)%XR, &
7617  protein%atom(i)%logp, &
7618  protein%atom(i)%solv, &
7619  protein%atom(i)%hb, &
7620  protein%atom(i)%occupancy,&
7621  protein%atom(i)%bfactor,&
7622  protein%atom(i)%ring,&
7623  protein%atom(i)%origin,&
7624  protein%atom(i)%part,&
7625  protein%atom(i)%num_neib,&
7626  protein%atom(i)%num_nonh,&
7627  protein%atom(i)%neib(0),protein%atom(i)%neib(1), &
7628  protein%atom(i)%neib(2),protein%atom(i)%neib(3), &
7629  protein%atom(i)%neib(4),protein%atom(i)%neib(5), &
7630  protein%atom(i)%neib(6), &
7631  protein%atom(i)%bond(0),protein%atom(i)%bond(1), &
7632  protein%atom(i)%bond(2),protein%atom(i)%bond(3), &
7633  protein%atom(i)%bond(4),protein%atom(i)%bond(5), &
7634  protein%atom(i)%bond(6), &
7635  protein%atom(i)%root(0),protein%atom(i)%root(1),protein%atom(i)%root(2)
7636  end do
7637 end subroutine protein_show_atoms
7638 
7639 subroutine protein_show_rings(mol)
7640  type(txprotein) :: mol
7641  integer :: i
7642 
7643  write(*,'(a,i4)') 'Total number of rings in this molecule = ', size(mol%ring)
7644  write(*,'(t1,a)') 'id vld. type size atoms (first-last) centroid'
7645 
7646  do i = 0,size(mol%ring) -1
7647  if(mol%ring(i)%valid.ne.0) then
7648  write(*,'(t1,i3, t6,i1, t10,i1, t15,i2, t23,i5,t29,i5, t43,f5.1,t49,f5.1,t56,f5.1)') &
7649  i+1, mol%ring(i)%valid,mol%ring(i)%ttype,mol%ring(i)%num_member, &
7650  mol%ring(i)%atom_id(0),mol%ring(i)%atom_id(mol%ring(i)%num_member-1), &
7651  mol%ring(i)%centroid(0),mol%ring(i)%centroid(1),mol%ring(i)%centroid(2)
7652  else
7653  write(*,'(t1,i3, t6,a)') i+1, 'invalid'
7654  end if
7655  end do
7656 end subroutine protein_show_rings
7657 
7658 subroutine protein_show_bonds(protein)
7659  type(txprotein) :: protein
7660  integer :: i,j,filestat
7661  character(len=4) :: buf
7662  character(len=16) :: ring,slask,ar,pol,planar,charge,hb,bondtype,mask
7663  character(len=64) :: ringpath,neibs,bonds
7664 
7665 
7666  write(*,'(a,i6)') 'Total number of bonds in this molecule = ',protein%num_bond
7667  if(input%show_bonds.eq.'YES') then
7668  write(*,'(a)') ' ID TYPE ATOM-ATOM RING NEIGHBOURING BONDS'
7669 
7670  do i = 0,protein%num_bond -1
7671 ! if(protein%atom(protein%bond(i)%atom_1-1)%mask.eq.0 .OR. protein%atom(protein%bond(i)%atom_1-1)%mask.eq.0) cycle
7672  ring = ''
7673  if(protein%bond(i)%ring.eq.1) ring = 'ring'
7674  if(protein%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'1') bondtype = 'single'
7675  if(protein%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'2') bondtype = 'double'
7676  if(protein%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'3') bondtype = 'triple'
7677  if(protein%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'ar') bondtype = 'ar'
7678  if(protein%bond(i)%ttype.eq.'am') bondtype = 'amide'
7679 
7680  neibs = ''
7681  do j = 0, protein%bond(i)%num_neib-1
7682  write(buf,'(i4)') protein%bond(i)%neib(j)
7683  neibs((j)*5+1:(j+1)*5) = buf
7684  end do
7685 
7686  write(*,'(t1,i4,t6,a, t14,i4,t19,i4, t25,a, t31,a)') &
7687  i+1, bondtype, protein%bond(i)%atom_1,protein%bond(i)%atom_2, ring, neibs
7688  end do
7689  end if
7690 end subroutine
7691 
7692 subroutine protein_define_pocket(protein,ff, ligand, cutoff)
7693  type(txprotein) :: protein
7694  type(txligand) :: ligand
7695  type(txff) :: ff
7696  real :: cutoff
7697  integer :: i,j,mark,count
7698  real :: d
7699  integer :: num_pocket_res
7700  type(txresidue),pointer :: pocket_res(:)
7701  type(txring) :: tmp_ring
7702 
7703  num_pocket_res = 0
7704 
7705  allocate(pocket_res(0:300 -1),stat=err) ! worst case? not my idea...
7706  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7707  ! find pocket atoms on the protein and label their valid as '2',
7708  ! including the waters close to the ligand
7709  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
7710  if(protein%atom(i)%valid<=0) then
7711  goto 1
7712  end if
7713 
7714  ! filter out all of the non-polar hydrogen atoms
7715  ! since X-Score uses unit-atom model
7716  if((protein%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'H').and.(protein%atom(i)%residue.ne.'COF')) then
7717  protein%atom(i)%valid=0
7718  goto 1
7719  end if
7720 
7721 
7722  ! check if this atom is close to the ligand
7723  mark=0
7724  do j = 0,ligand%mol%num_atom -1
7725  if(ligand%mol%atom(j)%valid<=0) then
7726  goto 2
7727  elseif(ligand%mol%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'H') then
7728  goto 2
7729  else
7730  d=distance(protein%atom(i)%coor,ligand%mol%atom(j)%coor)
7731  if(d>cutoff) then
7732  goto 2
7733  else
7734  mark=1
7735  exit
7736  end if
7737  end if
7738 2 end do
7739 
7740 
7741  if(mark.eq.0) goto 1 ! not a pocket atom
7742 
7743  protein%atom(i)%valid=2
7744 
7745  ! if this atom is a water or a metal ion, do not check its residue
7746  if(protein%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'O.w') goto 1
7747  if(protein%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'M+') goto 1
7748 
7749  ! for regular atoms, check if it has been included in a
7750  ! known pocket residue if not, add that newly found pocket residue
7751  mark=0
7752 
7753  do j = 0,num_pocket_res -1
7754  if((protein%atom(i)%residue.eq.pocket_res(j)%name).and. &
7755  (protein%atom(i)%res_id.eq.pocket_res(j)%id) .and. &
7756  (protein%atom(i)%chain.eq.pocket_res(j)%chain)) then
7757  mark=1
7758  exit
7759  else
7760  goto 3
7761  end if
7762 3 end do
7763 
7764  if(mark.eq.0) then ! new pocket residue found
7765  pocket_res(num_pocket_res)%name = protein%atom(i)%residue
7766  pocket_res(num_pocket_res)%id = protein%atom(i)%res_id
7767  pocket_res(num_pocket_res)%chain = protein%atom(i)%chain
7768  pocket_res(num_pocket_res)%valid = 1
7769  num_pocket_res = num_pocket_res +1
7770  end if
7771 1 end do
7772 
7773  ! now check if the binding pocket is well defined
7774  count=0
7775  do i = 0,num_pocket_res -1
7776  if(pocket_res(i)%name.eq.'HET') goto 4
7777  if(pocket_res(i)%name.eq.'COF') goto 4
7778  if(pocket_res(i)%name.eq.'WAT') goto 4
7779  if(pocket_res(i)%name.eq.'HOH') goto 4
7780  count = count +1
7781 4 end do
7782 
7783  if(count<3) then ! there should be at least 3 residues as pocket!
7784  write(*,'(a,i1)') 'Error: not enough binding pocket residues on the protein. Residues found = ', count
7785  write(*,*) 'Probably the ligand has not been docked with the protein.'
7786  stop
7787  end if
7788 
7789  ! define all the left atoms in pocket residues as pocket atoms
7790  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
7791  if(protein%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 5
7792  if(protein%atom(i)%valid.eq.2) goto 5
7793  if(protein%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'O.w') goto 5
7794  if(protein%atom(i)%hb.eq.'M') goto 5
7795 
7796  do j = 0,num_pocket_res -1
7797  if(protein%atom(i)%residue.ne.pocket_res(j)%name) goto 6
7798  if(protein%atom(i)%res_id.ne.pocket_res(j)%id) goto 6
7799  if(protein%atom(i)%chain.ne.pocket_res(j)%chain) goto 6
7800  protein%atom(i)%valid=2
7801  exit
7802 6 end do
7803 5 end do
7804 
7805  ! now detect all of the aromatic rings within pocket residues
7806  ! this information is need for later scoring purposes
7807  if(associated(protein%ring)) then
7808  do i = 0,size(protein%ring) -1
7809  call ring_clear(protein%ring(i))
7810  end do
7811  deallocate(protein%ring)
7812  end if
7813  protein%num_ring=0
7814 
7815  do i = 0,num_pocket_res -1
7816  if(pocket_res(i)%name.ne.'PHE' .and. &
7817  pocket_res(i)%name.ne.'TYR' .and. &
7818  pocket_res(i)%name.ne.'HIS' .and. &
7819  pocket_res(i)%name.ne.'TRP') goto 7
7820 
7821  call ring_clear(tmp_ring)
7822 
7823  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
7824  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.ne.2) goto 8
7825  if(protein%atom(j)%part.ne.1) goto 8
7826  if(protein%atom(j)%ring.ne.2) goto 8
7827  if(protein%atom(j)%chain.ne.pocket_res(i)%chain) goto 8
7828  if(protein%atom(j)%residue.ne.pocket_res(i)%name) goto 8
7829  if(protein%atom(j)%res_id.ne.pocket_res(i)%id) goto 8
7830 
7831  !tmp_ring%atom_id%push_back(j+1)
7832  call int_pushback(tmp_ring%atom_id,j+1)
7833 
7834  tmp_ring%centroid(0) = tmp_ring%centroid(0) + protein%atom(j)%coor(0)
7835  tmp_ring%centroid(1) = tmp_ring%centroid(1) + protein%atom(j)%coor(1)
7836  tmp_ring%centroid(2) = tmp_ring%centroid(2) + protein%atom(j)%coor(2)
7837 8 end do
7838 
7839  tmp_ring%num_member = size(tmp_ring%atom_id)
7840 
7841  if(tmp_ring%num_member>0) then
7842  tmp_ring%centroid(0)=tmp_ring%centroid(0)/tmp_ring%num_member
7843  tmp_ring%centroid(1)=tmp_ring%centroid(1)/tmp_ring%num_member
7844  tmp_ring%centroid(2)=tmp_ring%centroid(2)/tmp_ring%num_member
7845  tmp_ring%valid=1
7846  tmp_ring%ttype=2
7847 
7848  !this->ring%push_back(tmp_ring)
7849  Call protein_add_ring(protein, tmp_ring)
7850  protein%num_ring = protein%num_ring +1
7851  end if
7852 7 end do
7853 
7854  call ring_clear(tmp_ring)
7855 
7856  deallocate(pocket_res)
7857 end subroutine protein_define_pocket
7858 
7859 subroutine protein_add_ring(m,r)
7860  type(txprotein) :: m
7861  type(txring) :: r
7862  integer :: i,j
7863  type(txring),pointer :: tmp(:)
7864 
7865  if(.not. associated(m%ring)) then
7866  ! Adding first ring to molecule, need to init pointer
7867  allocate(m%ring(0:0),stat=err)
7868  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7869 
7870  Call ring_copy(m%ring(0),r)
7871  else
7872  ! Adding a second (or more) ring to molecule
7873 
7874  i = size(m%ring)
7875 
7876  ! Increase size of ring-array
7877  allocate(tmp(0:i-1),stat=err)
7878  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7879  do j = 0,i -1
7880  call ring_copy(tmp(j),m%ring(j))
7881  end do
7882 
7883  deallocate(m%ring)
7884  allocate(m%ring(0:i),stat=err)
7885  if(err.ne.0) write(*,'(a)') 'Fatal: Out of memory.'
7886  do j = 0, i-1
7887  call ring_copy(m%ring(j),tmp(j))
7888  end do
7889 
7890  do j = 0,i-1
7891  call ring_clear(tmp(j))
7892  end do
7893  deallocate(tmp)
7894 
7895  ! Add ring
7896  call ring_copy(m%ring(i), r)
7897  end if
7898 end subroutine protein_add_ring
7899 
7900 
7901 subroutine protein_value_atom(protein,flag,lite_run)
7902  type(txprotein),intent(inout) :: protein
7903  integer,optional :: lite_run
7904  integer :: flag
7905  integer :: slask,i
7906 
7907  ! assign the parameters for all atoms, only done once
7908  if(.not. present(lite_run)) then
7909  do i=0, protein%num_atom -1
7910  if(protein%atom(i)%iscofactor.eq.0) slask = forcefield_assign_patom_parameters(protein%atom(i))
7911  end do
7912  end if
7913 
7914  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
7915  if(protein%atom(i)%iscofactor.ne.0) protein%atom(i)%valid = 1
7916  end do
7917 
7918  ! build connection tables, must assign parameters first
7919  call protein_detect_connections(protein,lite_run)
7920 
7921  ! calculate H-bond root
7922  if(flag.ne.0) call protein_calculate_hb_root(protein)
7923 end subroutine protein_value_atom
7924 
7925 subroutine protein_calculate_hb_root(protein)
7926  type(txprotein) :: protein
7927  integer :: i,j,id,count
7928  real :: tmpx,tmpy,tmpz
7929 
7930  ! (1) we do calculate root for polar hydrogens
7931  ! (2) we do NOT calculate root for non-HB atoms
7932  ! (3) we do NOT calculate root for metal ions
7933  ! (4) we do NOT calculate root for waters
7934  ! (5) we do calculate root for the oxygen atoms on SO4 and PO4
7935 
7936  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
7937  if(protein%atom(i)%valid<=0) then
7938  goto 1
7939  elseif(protein%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'H') then
7940  goto 1
7941  elseif(protein%atom(i)%xtype.eq.'O.w') then
7942  goto 1
7943  elseif(protein%atom(i)%hb.eq.'N') then
7944  goto 1
7945  elseif(protein%atom(i)%hb.eq.'H') then
7946  goto 1
7947  elseif(protein%atom(i)%hb.eq.'P') then
7948  goto 1
7949  elseif(protein%atom(i)%hb.eq.'M') then
7950  goto 1
7951  end if
7952 
7953  if(protein%atom(i)%num_neib.eq.0) goto 1
7954 
7955  tmpx=0
7956  tmpy=0
7957  tmpz=0
7958  count=0
7959 
7960  do j = 0,protein%atom(i)%num_neib -1
7961  id=protein%atom(i)%neib(j)-1
7962 ! write(*,*) i,j, id
7963  if(protein%atom(id)%ttype.eq.'H') then
7964  goto 2
7965  else
7966  tmpx=tmpx + (protein%atom(id)%coor(0))
7967  tmpy=tmpy + (protein%atom(id)%coor(1))
7968  tmpz=tmpz + (protein%atom(id)%coor(2))
7969  count = count +1
7970  end if
7971 2 end do
7972 
7973  if(count.eq.0) goto 1
7974 
7975  protein%atom(i)%root(0)=tmpx/count
7976  protein%atom(i)%root(1)=tmpy/count
