7977  protein%atom(i)%root(2)=tmpz/count
7978 1 end do
7979 end subroutine protein_calculate_hb_root
7980 
7981 subroutine protein_detect_connections(protein,lite_run)
7982  type(txprotein) :: protein
7983  integer,optional :: lite_run
7984  integer :: i,j,k,count,id
7985  integer :: mark
7986  real :: cutoff,d
7987 
7988  ! build the connections for regular atoms first
7989  cutoff=2.00 ! covalent bond distance cutoff
7990 
7991  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
7992  if((protein%atom(i)%valid.eq.0)) then ! allow invalid cofactor atoms
7993  goto 1
7994  elseif(protein%atom(i)%part.ne.1) then
7995  goto 1
7996  elseif(protein%atom(i)%num_neib>0) then
7997  goto 1 ! already done
7998  end if
7999  count=0
8000 
8001  if(present(lite_run)) goto 100
8002 
8003  ! find internal connections inside the same residue first
8004  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8005  if(i.eq.j) then
8006  goto 2
8007  elseif(protein%atom(j)%valid.eq.0) then
8008  goto 2
8009  elseif(protein%atom(j)%part.ne.1) then
8010  goto 2
8011  elseif(protein%atom(i)%chain.ne.protein%atom(j)%chain) then
8012  goto 2
8013  elseif(protein%atom(i)%residue.ne.protein%atom(j)%residue) then
8014  goto 2
8015  elseif(protein%atom(i)%res_id.ne.protein%atom(j)%res_id) then
8016  goto 2
8017  end if
8018 
8019  ! there is no bond between hydrogen atoms
8020  if((protein%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'H').and.(protein%atom(j)%ttype.eq.'H')) then
8021  goto 2
8022  end if
8023 
8024  ! now check whether atom i and atom j are covalently bound
8025  if(forcefield_patom_connection_test(protein%atom(i),protein%atom(j)).eq.1) then
8026  if(count>=max_atom_neib) then
8027  goto 2 ! already full
8028  else
8029  protein%atom(i)%neib(count)=j+1
8030  count = count +1
8031  end if
8032  else
8033  goto 2
8034  end if
8035 2 end do
8036 
8037 ! JUMP HERE IF LITE RUN
8038 100 continue
8039  ! now detect peptide amide bonds
8040  if((protein%atom(i)%name.eq.'N').and.(protein%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'N.am')) then
8041  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8042  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.eq.0) then
8043  goto 3
8044  elseif(protein%atom(j)%part.ne.1) then
8045  goto 3
8046  elseif(protein%atom(i)%chain.ne.protein%atom(j)%chain) then
8047  goto 3
8048  elseif(protein%atom(i)%res_id.eq.protein%atom(j)%res_id) then
8049  goto 3
8050  elseif(protein%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'C.2') then
8051  goto 3
8052  elseif(protein%atom(j)%name.ne.'C') then
8053  goto 3
8054  end if
8055 
8056  d=distance(protein%atom(i)%coor,protein%atom(j)%coor)
8057 
8058  if(d>cutoff) then
8059  goto 3
8060  elseif(count>=max_atom_neib) then
8061  goto 3
8062  else
8063  protein%atom(i)%neib(count)=j+1
8064  count = count +1
8065  end if
8066 3 end do
8067  elseif((protein%atom(i)%name.eq.'C').and.(protein%atom(i)%ttype.eq.'C.2')) then
8068  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8069  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.eq.0) then
8070  goto 4
8071  elseif(protein%atom(j)%part.ne.1) then
8072  goto 4
8073  elseif(protein%atom(i)%chain.ne.protein%atom(j)%chain) then
8074  goto 4
8075  elseif(protein%atom(i)%res_id.eq.protein%atom(j)%res_id) then
8076  goto 4
8077  elseif(protein%atom(j)%ttype.ne.'N.am') then
8078  goto 4
8079  elseif(protein%atom(j)%name.ne.'N') then
8080  goto 4
8081  end if
8082 
8083  d=distance(protein%atom(i)%coor,protein%atom(j)%coor)
8084 
8085  if(d>cutoff) then
8086  goto 4
8087  elseif(count>=max_atom_neib) then
8088  goto 4
8089  else
8090  protein%atom(i)%neib(count)=j+1
8091  count = count +1
8092  end if
8093 4 end do
8094  end if
8095 
8096  protein%atom(i)%num_neib=count
8097 1 end do
8098 
8099  ! now find the patoms bound to the metal ions
8100  cutoff=3.00 ! M-bond distance cutoff
8101 
8102  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8103  if(protein%atom(i)%valid.eq.0) then
8104  goto 5
8105  elseif(protein%atom(i)%part.eq.1) then
8106  goto 5
8107  elseif(protein%atom(i)%xtype.ne.'M+') then
8108  goto 5
8109  elseif(protein%atom(i)%num_neib>0) then
8110  goto 5 ! already done
8111  end if
8112 
8113  count=0
8114 
8115  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8116  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.eq.0) then
8117  goto 6
8118  elseif(protein%atom(j)%part.ne.1) then
8119  goto 6
8120  elseif((protein%atom(j)%hb.ne.'A').and.(protein%atom(j)%hb.ne.'DA')) then
8121  goto 6
8122  end if
8123 
8124  d=distance(protein%atom(i)%coor,protein%atom(j)%coor)
8125 
8126  if(d>cutoff) then
8127  goto 6
8128  elseif(count>=max_atom_neib) then
8129  goto 6
8130  else
8131  protein%atom(i)%neib(count)=j+1 ! note this
8132  count = count +1
8133  ! here we do not add connections to atom(j)
8134  end if
8135 6 end do
8136  protein%atom(i)%num_neib=count
8137 5 end do
8138 
8139  ! Return if lite run
8140  if(present(lite_run)) return
8141 
8142  ! now build the connections for SO4s and PO4s
8143  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8144  if(protein%atom(i)%valid.eq.0) then
8145  goto 7
8146  elseif(protein%atom(i)%part.eq.1) then
8147  goto 7
8148  elseif((protein%atom(i)%residue.ne.'SO4').and. & ! check this
8149  (protein%atom(i)%residue.ne.'PO4')) then
8150  goto 7
8151  elseif((protein%atom(i)%name.ne.'S').and. & ! check this
8152  (protein%atom(i)%name.ne.'P')) then
8153  goto 7
8154  end if
8155 
8156  if(protein%atom(i)%num_neib>0) goto 7 ! done
8157 
8158  ! now check the satellite atoms for this P or S atom
8159  do j = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8160  if(protein%atom(j)%valid.eq.0) then
8161  goto 8
8162  elseif(protein%atom(j)%part.eq.1) then
8163  goto 8
8164  elseif((protein%atom(j)%residue.ne.'SO4').and.(protein%atom(j)%residue.ne.'PO4')) then
8165  goto 8
8166  elseif((protein%atom(j)%res_id.ne.protein%atom(i)%res_id)) then
8167  goto 8
8168  elseif(index(protein%atom(j)%name,'S').ne.0) then
8169  goto 8
8170  elseif(index(protein%atom(j)%name,'P').ne.0) then
8171  goto 8
8172  end if
8173 
8174  count=protein%atom(i)%num_neib
8175  mark=0
8176 
8177  do k = 0,count -1
8178  if(protein%atom(i)%neib(k).eq.(j+1)) then
8179  mark=1
8180  exit
8181  else
8182  goto 9
8183  end if
8184 9 end do
8185 
8186  if(mark.eq.0) then
8187  protein%atom(i)%neib(count)=j+1 ! note this
8188  protein%atom(i)%num_neib = protein%atom(i)%num_neib +1
8189  end if
8190 
8191  count=protein%atom(j)%num_neib
8192  mark=0
8193 
8194  do k = 0,count -1
8195  if(protein%atom(j)%neib(k).eq.(i+1)) then
8196  mark=1
8197  exit
8198  else
8199  goto 10
8200  end if
8201 10 end do
8202 
8203  if(mark.eq.0) then
8204  protein%atom(j)%neib(count)=i+1 ! note this
8205  protein%atom(j)%num_neib = protein%atom(j)%num_neib +1
8206  end if
8207 8 end do
8208 7 end do
8209 
8210  ! now determine number of heavy atoms for each valid atom
8211  do i = 0,protein%num_atom -1
8212  if(protein%atom(i)%valid<=0) goto 12
8213 
8214  count=0
8215  do j = 0,protein%atom(i)%num_neib -1
8216  id=protein%atom(i)%neib(j)
8217  if(protein%atom(id-1)%ttype.eq.'H') then
8218  goto 13
8219  else
8220  count = count +1
8221  end if
8222 13 end do
8223 
8224  protein%atom(i)%num_nonh=count
8225 12 end do
8226 end subroutine protein_detect_connections
8227 
8228 end module calc_xscore
Generated on Tue Jun 9 2015 09:31:33 for qsource by   1.8.3.1
